story:
The Project coming from the Stars


Summary

Do you like Spaceships? Maybe you prefer huge Battlecruisers?

Or perhaps you even dream of epic battles between space fleets?

In 1999, Games Workshop Ltd released Battlefleet Gothic TM, a specialist miniatures game about "Spaceship battles in the 41st millenium". The game was and is still acclaimed for its ruleset and balance.

Sadly, it has been discontinued and it's getting harder and harder to find the materials.

We are eager to make a game which feels like Battlefleet Gothic TM, a turn-based tactical game on mobile devices.

The rules may be different, but the experience will be as much enjoyable!

Move your units with your fingers like you would with miniatures! Play with your friends remotely or next to each other and enjoy huge battles in deep space!


How will it play

 

Moving your ships will be easy: you will just have to touch the movement line and your ship will go there.

Touching the Helm or the Throttle will allow for precise movement: your ship will move the exact distance to reach the turning spot or its maximum speed.


Shooting with your ships is also straightforward: choose the weapon you want to use. All targets in range and in the arc of fire will become available to select.

Then you will just have to touch the desired target to let guns do the talking.

Video exemple

Here you can see a rough exemple of how the user will manipulate the game. We are still prototyping, so your insights are most welcome!


Who are we ?

We are a team of videogame veterans, that love good games, no matter the platform. We are all nostalgic about tabletop and videogames from past era, and many other things that make us feel old.

We all come from videogame and computer science industry.

Some of us worked on AAA titles like Assassin's Creed: Black Flag, others on more humble mobile platform, and other others on multiplayer games.

We are absolutely confident the game is doable and that it will be great.

What we are doing now is making a prototype, to transform our thoughts into concrete and touchable matter.


Why do we need money and what is that prototype stuff?

Yes, why? The requested amount is not enough to develop a full game, so what does that mean ?

That's all legitimate questions. This campaign is all focused on the playable prototype on Android, and access to game conventions to bear our project like the world on Atlas' shoulders.

The money will be spent there:

  • Allow our super 3-men team of veterans to work day & night on the protoype (and maybe feed them, we'll see).
  • Get hardware devices to confront the prototype with harsh reality, and not only with the dream-world of emulators.
  • Buy Passes to game conventions (Game Connection, Independant Game Festival...) with all the logistics. Our donkeys are tough but crossing the ocean will be hard for them.
The prototype will be used for:
  • Show people we are not kidding. We are not. Really.
  • Challenge the User Interface with our big and messy fingers.

What you will get

The project is clearly in its early stage. We won't lie, it's still a small hydrogen cloud that will eventually become a burning star.

The pledges are low because there is no need for high prices and rewards.

Starting at 5$, you will get a beta access and an account on the dev forum. You'll be able to play the game and tell us your thoughts about User Interface, balance, etc.

If you want to get more invested, you can become a Prime Fleet Captain or Admiral. We will send you a special poster (Captain) or flag (Admiral), with a unique number to show everyone that you were the firsts to support the project. All posters and flags will also be hand-signed by the team!

We will propose several artworks and you'll be able to vote for the one you'd like to see printed (separate votes for Captains and Admirals).

Later, we will invite all Captains and Admirals to post a picture of themselves with their poster / flag. It will be a battle for the best number!

Why no copy of the game as reward?

That's quite strange, isn't it? It's even more questionnable since we are making a mobile game, and the price probably won't go higher than 5$ (and may even not reach it).

So why don't we give free copy for supporting people?

As we said, this campaign is for the prototype. It will allow us to present the game to various investors. Even if the campaign is a success, there is a possibility the the game itself won't make it.

If everything goes well, you will get the final game for sure. However, as we are not 100% sure it will be the case, we'd rather make no false promise.


    Risks

    There are risks. All space travels are risky, you can always hit a ***ing asteroid coming from nowhere and get your cockpit depressurized.

    The major risk is not being able to raise funds for the complete game. In that case, you will get we have (the prototype and/or early builds).


      Want to help more?

      If you really want to see the project finished, there are some things you can help with :
      • Talk to your friends about it. Maybe you are a tabletop player? Spread the word accross your opponents circle.
      • Stay tuned for more info. We will most probably need feedback on the man-machine interface.

story:
Duck Hero

About the game

Duck Hero is a completely free to play mobile game (No in-app purchases) that me and my friend are making.  It's an 8-bit side scroller where you play as the yellow duck and you must fight off waves of ninja ducks, robot ducks and more.
At the time you have :
  • Healthbar
  • Laser shots
  •  Randomly spawning enemies with higher frequency of spawn the longer you survive
  • Randomly generated powerups that you can collect to help you survive longer
Right now the game is very buggy and not polished but we are updating textures/gameplay every single day.

What We Need & What You Get

This is the main things the money will be used on:
  • At the time this is only an android app but we would love to expand to IOS aswell
  • Buy unity pro to make the game even better.
  • If we raise more than we need it will all go into making the game better.  Like buying a better photo editing software

The Impact

When you contribute to our project you are not only making two young men very happy but also telling us that you believe in us to make a great app.

  • We would be able to expand into IOS development
  • We could buy professional software to make even better games

Risks & Challenges

We are updating the game every single day but some days we don't have as much time as others.  We made sure to have the rewards something that we could definitely deliver so we would not disappoint anyone.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help but can't contribute, don't worry these simple tasks help just as much:

  • Ask people to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign
  • Show them the game when it gets released

story:
The Sewer

The campaign will continue on: http://igg.me/at/thesewer

Italiano più in basso

In a steampunk London, during Jack the Ripper's killing spree, all the inhabitants of the city have recurrent nightmares every night.
A wizened old man, draped in colorful clothing and strange amulets, knocked at your door. He told you he knows the way to stop these nightmares, and free everyone. The cure is buried in the sewers, protected by members of a strange cult, eager to sacrifice you to their alien Other Gods, or feed you to one of the horrible creatures that haunt the sewers.
This is a first person dungeon crawler, in which you are investigating the London sewers about this epidemic of nightmares, while other creatures try to kill you. The underground is randomly generated, so every playthrough is different. The player can be one of many character classes: you can be a member of a street gang, a scholar of the hermetic arts or a scoundrel that lives in the thin line between light and dark, or many other classes. There will be an online marketplace to trade the items you will find in the dungeon with other players playing The Sewer.
Development of the game is already underway, and will continue even after the first release of the game, to add new features and enhancements.
While the game is being developed, we're going to use temporary 3D models . Until the modelling studio can be paid (which amounts to half of the costs of the project itself), we'll be forced to use these, so the< screenshot don't represent the final graphical appearance of the game.

Updates will be added (often!) here and on the game's website (
http://sewer.sfrajone.org ).

The game will be developed using the Unity 3D engine and will be
multiplatform (Windows, Mac,
Linux) and also on mobile device (iOS and Android).

The funds are required to:
- Buy a Unity Pro license;
- Pay a 3D professional studio to realize the models for the game;
- Pay the hardware needed for the development;
- Pay for the internet hosting for the servers.

 Some notes on development:
We're going to adopt the "no number" method, explained in the page (link).
Stats and values within the game won't be shown to the player as numbers, but rather as a series of adjectives, each of which will encompass a range of numbers.
For example, the quality of an object could be: excellent, good, normal, poor.
"Hit Points", or the amount of damage you'll still be able to sustain without dying, are going to be represented either graphically or with a percentage (this is still being decided), while the relative strength of enemies compared to the character will be shown by a difference in size: stronger enemies will be bigger than the character, while weaker ones will be smaller.

A note regarding objects:
Every object will have a durability, determining its quality. When speaking of armor and equipped items, it'll be a set number of damage points that it will be able to absorb, whereas weapons will have a set number of damage points they will be able to inflict.

Items which will occupy an equip slot will be able to be augmented by a Talisman (made by Hermetic Students) or an Artefact (made by Engineers), gaining bonuses.

Item shops (located outside the Sewers) will buy items from you. Valuable items will also be pawnable to a pawn shop, in exchange for a monthly interest. If they're not reedemed in time, they'll be auctioned to all the other players.
In addition, every player will be able to auction their items to other players directly.

You can see current development status here: http://sewer.sfrajone.org/roadmap.html

The estimated delivery time is december 2013

 

The Sewer

In una Londra steampunk, al tempo degli efferati omicidi di Jack lo Squartatore, gli abitanti della città hanno incubi ricorrenti tutte le notti.

Un vecchio uomo raggrinzito, vestito con colori sgargianti e strani amuleti, bussa alla tua porta. Ti dice che conosce il modo per fermare questi incubi, e liberare tutti. La cura è seppellita nelle fogne, protetta da membri di strani culti, desiderosi di sacrificarti per le loro strane Altre Divinità, o diventare cibo per una delle creature orrende che infestano le fogne.

E' un dungeon crawler in prima persona, in cui stai investigando nelle fogne di Londra riguardo l'epidemia di incubi, mentre altre creature provano a ucciderti. Il sottosuolo è generato casualmente, così che ogni partita sia diversa. Il personaggio può appartenere a una delle diverse classi: puoi essere il membro di una gang di strada, uno studente di arti ermetiche o una canaglia che vive nella sottile linea tra la luce e l'oscurità, o varie altre classi. Ci sarà anche un mercato online dove poter vendere gli oggetti che trovi nel dungeon agli altri giocatori che giocano a The Sewer.

Lo sviluppo del gioco è già in corso, e continuerà successivamente anche dopo il rilascio della prima versione del gioco, per aggiungere nuovi funzionalità e migliorie. Mentre sarà sviluppato verranno usati modelli 3d temporanei. Finché non sarà possibile pagare uno studio di modellazione (metà della cifra indicata per tutto il progetto) dovremo usare questi modelli provvisori e la grafica che vedrete negli screenshoots non rifletterà l'aspetto grafico finale. Potrete trovare gli aggiornamenti su Facebook ( https://www.facebook.com/TheSewerGame ) o sul sito web ( http://sewer.sfrajone.org)

Il gioco è sviluppato usando Unity 3d e sarà multipiattaforma (Windows,Mac, Linux) e girerà anche su device mobili (iOS e Android).

Potete trovare la raccolta fondi per lo sviluppo su http://igg.me/at/thesewer

I fondi sono richiesti per:
- Acquistare la licenza di Unity PRO;
- Pagare professionisti di modellazione 3d per la realizzazione della grafica del gioco;
- L'hardware necessario per lo sviluppo;
- Pagare i server internet per l'hosting.

Alcune note sullo sviluppo
Verrà adottato il metodo "no number" spiegato nella pagina http://mu.ranter.net/design-theory/general-topi...
Le statistiche e i vari valori all'interno del gioco non saranno visualizzabili dal giocatore come numeri, ma verranno utilizzati degli aggettivi che corrisponderanno a uno spettro di valori numeri. Ad esempio la qualità di un oggetto potrà essere: eccellente,buona, normale, scarsa.
I punti ferita che indicano quanti danni è possibile subire ancora verranno rappresentati solo graficamente o attraverso percentuali (questione ancora da valutare), mentre per capire quanto un avversario sia più o meno forte del personaggio, verrà modificata la dimensione rispetto ad esso: I nemici più forti saranno rappresentati fisicamente più grandi mentre quelli più deboli relativamente più' piccoli.

Note riguardanti gli oggetti.
Ogni oggetto al suo interno avrà dei punti ferita che determinano la qualità. Nel caso dell'equipaggiamento sono un numero a scalare di punti d'impatto, mentre nel caso di armi sono un numero di punti di danni che riesce a infliggere.

Oltre gli oggetti che occuperanno uno spazio nel proprio personaggio, sarà possibile associargli equipaggiato un talismano fatto dagli studenti ermetici o un artefatto fatto dagli ingegneri per potenziare i bonus.

Gli oggetti possono essere venduti dai commercianti presenti all'esterno del sistema fognario, in cambio di soldi. Oppure attraverso il banco dei pegni, se gli oggetti sono di un certo valore, possono essere impegnati in cambio di una cifra gravata di interessi per un mese, se non verranno riscattati in tempo, finiranno all'asta e possono venire acquistati dagli altri giocatori.
Altrimenti direttamente il giocatore può vendere direttamente gli oggetti all'asta agli altri giocatori.

Potete vedere lo stato dello sviluppo su: http://sewer.sfrajone.org/roadmap.html

 FAQ

Come mai IndieGoGo mi chiede direttamente il pagamento, e non al raggiungimento del goal come Kickstarter ?

La piattaforma di finanziamento è stata scelta in questo modo per poter accedere in ogni caso ai fondi che permettono di avere dei miglioramenti o velocizzare lo sviluppo e nella resa del prodotto finale. In ogni caso, e' garantito al 100% a chi preoacquista il gioco di averne una copia una volta finito lo sviluppo, i soldi spesi non andranno buttati, anche perché secondo l'accordo con IndieGoGo, presuppone che i perks reclamati vengano consegnati obbligatoriamente in ogni caso.

Cosa succede se nn si raggiungono i fondi ? Il gioco uscirà lo stesso ?

Si, il gioco uscirà lo stesso. La raccolta fondi serve per riuscire a stringere i tempi, e per pagare risorse che altrimenti non saranno utilizzate o saranno utilizzate in tempi più laschi

Quando uscirà il gioco ?

Tenteremo di far uscire il gioco per l'inverno del 2013, ma la data diverrà certa con l'andamento della raccolta fondi. Speriamo che la data di rilascio in ogni caso non slitti più' di tanto. Verrà data priorità alla versione per computer rispetto alla versione per dispositivi mobile.

Come mai IndieGoGo mi chiede direttamente il pagamento, e non al raggiungimento del goal come Kickstarter ?La piattaforma di finanziamento è stata scelta in questo modo per poter accedere in ogni caso ai fondi che permettono di avere dei miglioramenti o velocizzare lo sviluppo e nella resa del prodotto finale. In ogni caso, e' garantito al 100% a chi preoacquista il gioco di averne una copia una volta finito lo sviluppo, i soldi spesi non andranno buttati, anche perché secondo l'accordo con IndieGoGo, presuppone che i perks reclamati vengano consegnati obbligatoriamente in ogni caso.Cosa succede se nn si raggiungono i fondi ? Il gioco uscirà lo stesso ?Si, il gioco uscirà lo stesso. La raccolta fondi serve per riuscire a stringere i tempi, e per pagare risorse che altrimenti non saranno utilizzate o saranno utilizzate in tempi più laschiQuando uscirà il gioco ?Tenteremo di far uscire il gioco per l'inverno del 2013, ma la data diverrà certa con l'andamento della raccolta fondi. Speriamo che la data di rilascio in ogni caso non slitti più' di tanto. Verrà data priorità alla versione per computer rispetto alla versione per dispositivi mobile.

story:
The 8-BIT Gaming Bar

Update #1 - 22nd June

Great news!
YouTube legend Dan Bull (http://www.youtube.com/user/douglby) has offered to let us add some of his music as contributor perks, and we couldn’t be happier!
Probably most famous for his Skyrim Epic Rap, his support to this project is incredible, and a huge boost in morale and confidence for everyone involved.

You can watch it here

 

Summary

This is a campaign to raise the final bit of funding needed to bring my dream to life - a full, comprehensive Gaming-themed bar for my hometown of Falmouth, Cornwall. With the only remotely similar bar closed and moved to London, the time is ripe to make this happen!
 
The plans include
  • Three dedicated HDTV sets, one each for Sony, Nintendo, and Microsoft
  • Another HDTV easily switchable between a Megadrive, SNES and N64
  • A full-size standing Arcade Cabinet, boasting over sixty popular, classic titles (Including a number of Street Fighter and Mortal Kombat titles, Metal Slug, Bubble Bobble, Donkey Kong, Pacman etc.)
  • A dedicated, seperate area for either card gaming or the playing of RPGs (Need a specific night for your group? Hire the space!)
  • Full, free, high-speed customer Wi-Fi

And that's just the gaming side of it!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have a premises picked out at 29 High Street, Falmouth (Currerntly "The Underground"), and we already have £35,000 in funding - it's enough to cover the premises and all expenses with buying the remainder of the lease. This is in part personally, and in part bank funded, but the amount we have isn't quite enough, though the hard part is done!

What we need now is the capital to furnish and stock the Bar, and bring it to life.

The £5,000 funding we're asking for is going to the following places.

  • £1,200 for out standing arcade cabinet. This is already picked out, and earmarked for us!
  • £1,000 for the purchase of all four major consoles, and enough peripherals to enable simultaneous four-player on each, at once.
  • £1,800 for four Samsung 42" 5-series 1080i Full-HD TVs, including wall-mounting
  • £1,000 budget for the purchase of a wide range of titles for the consoles. The aim is to have a comprehensive, if not exhaustive range of titles for each system to keep everyone entertained. Any remainder from this sum will be kept seperate to fund new releases as they happen!

Overfunding

If we manage to get over our target (!) we'll be spending the money on the bar, in the same vein as above. Every single contribution will go straight into enhancing the bar for every single customer, in the following order.

  1. £1,100 A tabletop-style arcade maching to compliment the seating area, of the same quality and depth of choice as our standing arcade cabinet (From the same people).
  2. £950 A ceiling-mounted projector to turn the back wall of the bar into the ultimate competitive gaming ground. Life-Size Mario Kart, anyone?
  3. £450 An accompanying surround-sound system for the projector, making it the focal piece of an evenings competitive gaming. You've never played Guitar Hero like this, I promise!

And on, and on, and on!

The Perks

Alright, so besides giving yourselves a new place to drink and enjoy the latest games, with friends, in spacious, comfortable surroundings, what's in this for you?

Well, at the very least, (£5) you'll have your name (Or your gamertag, if you prefer!) drawn into a mural in the hallway leading from the front door, forever showing every person to walk through the door exactly who made this possible. You!

At £10, you'll get yourself a free drink, and ten free credits for our standing arcade cabinet, to spend as you wish.

At £25, we'll make that three drinks, double your number of free arcade credits to 20, and make sure your name is listed higher in the list of thanks!

At £50, we'll sweeten the deal even further. You'll get the choice to inspire either a cocktail or a shot/bomb from your favourite game, name it, and see it immortalised on the menu, alongside your name! You'll of course get three free samples of your creation to help "playtest" it. Not only that, you'll still get thirty (30!) free games on our Arcade Cabinet, three more drinks of your choice, and your name will be even higher on the Mural of Thanks!

The Impact

Every single penny of your contribution is going straight into making the 8-BIT Bar everything it needs to be. Every person who donates, as well as adding to the dream, re-enforces the idea that this is the right thing to do.

I sincerely and honestly believe in this idea, and that's why I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. Unfortunately, there's just not quite enough money to fill my mouth just yet, and without this comparitively small amount, there will be no Bar.

The whole reason behind choosing Indiegogo for this was the fact that, if some of you believe enough to donate, to fund this wonderful space where we can hang out in an area designed for people who share our interests, then I still get what you put in without meeting that goal. Because this bar will happen. It will. And every penny goes to that eventual goal - Not funding this is not the end. It just delays it a while.
The reason for wanting it funded now is the fact that the premises we've found is perfect. I'm in love with it. Genuinely, I feel this is the best place the bar could ever happen. Missing the goal will mean time to build more funds to reach our target, but also losing out on this beautiful building
 
That's why I'm reaching out to you.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just don't have the funds to help out - that's fine! I understand! You're in no way obliged to donate to help us out. Just get the word out! Let everyone know what we intend, and we'll see you when it happens!

You could always...

  • Post this on Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter etc.
  • Tell your friends!
  • Make new friends by telling people about us, then take them for a drink after we open, find your true love and hold your wedding reception with us! (Or, y'know, facebook is fine too...)

story:
Major Updates

English Translation

As you can see English is a (little) challenge for us but nevertheless we decided us to spend our money into the game developing and not into translating our pitch text. To take care of our community feedback we want to straighten out that for the finalized game we will pay for a professional translation because we want to produce a high-quality product as our published game elements show you.

brief instruction

Today we published a brief instruction for NATIONS the powered board game. Take a look on the most important rules and gameplay:
brief instruction - English
Kurzanleitung - Deutsch

 

innovative battling-system


The interactive battlefield is one of the key components of our new battling-system. If you want to know hot it works you should take a look on our brief instruction

 

Mock up - Espionage (Event)

 

Mock up - Production Points


You can find more mock up's in our gallery

 

Mock up - Espionage

You can find much more images in our gallery

 

Dices in action:

A short demonstration of our dices

 

Shipping costs:

To take care of your feedback about our shipping costs policy - we decided us to change that!
The new shipping costs should fit better your and our needs:
Sketches: FREE SHIPPING
Pre-Order and above:
Austria: FREE
Europe: 10 USD
International: 15 USD

We also offer a free pick-up at Essen 2013.

 

Game graphics:

Take a look on the first game graphics:






 

Team Members:

Our team members about their motivation to create NATIONS the powered board game: Click here to watch it on youtube


NATIONS the powered board game

One little spark

The cloud over Europe after World War II has just settled into a deceiving peace when in the background two new powers set up their army for one final strike. The world is a powder keg ready to burst...and it would only take one little spark to blow it up- NATIONS is telling the story

 

New era of games – powered board games

So called powered board games combine the best of two game-worlds: the fun of classic board games and the power of smart devices (f.e. tablets, smartphones,computers and so on). This combination makes a brand new, breathtaking game experience possible. You can develope complex economic or production mechanics which are easily handled by your smart device. This also gives you the possibility to secretly engage in diplomacy or espionage between you and other players. There are unlimited possibilities - all you need is the elements of a board game and one smart device!

 

The Gameplay

In NATIONS every player chooses a leading nation of one of the three fractions (capitalism, communism and neutrals). The goal is to find the right mix between military power, diplomacy, science and espionage to conquer the whole world. Some of the game elements like the map, soldiers, dices are printed. Others like military supplies, science, diplomacy and espionage are controlled from your tablet. We created a special combination with real dices, virtual battlefields and special weapons on the tablet for a completely new battling system. To build up power you have to occupy countries. Depending on the external borders the player gets production points (=the money in the game) for each country he's taking over. After a turn the active player passes the tablet on to the next player so it is possible to play the game with only one device!

 

Better together – Our team of developers

We are a team of five who for the most part know each other since childhood. The shared passion of playing any kind of games lead us to the decision of creating our life’s dream: telling you a breathtaking historical story while playing a special thrilling kind of game.

You want to know more about us:

  • Manfred Lamplmair, Project Manager
  • Reinhard Kern, Art Director
  • Chris Rallis, Illustrator
  • Daniel Lang, Programmer
  • Gertrude Kurzmann, Community Manager


It’s all about the money

Help us to take the next step and reach our goal

The main goal is to raise $8,000 ,which is going towards the complete playable game including two fractions fully illustrated, the whole app for Android and iOS, the dices and all printed game pieces.

Any additional money will give us the ability to expand and add even more features to the game.

If we don’t reach our goal,your contributions aren’t lost! NATIONS the powered board game will be launched either way, even if in that case our hard working team will have to eat humble pie.

 

Run, Forrest run! - Step by Step

#1: learn to walk ($300)
Basic elements like the map, dices and printed elements for game organization

#2 we stand in a row – man by man ($900)
First units (soldiers, heroes, spy and diplomat) fully illustrated

#3 to be or not to be ($1.800)
The four science categories military, society, economy and technology fully illustrated

#4 one world – one nation ($4.500)
Completed production of the first playable nation in NATIONS!

 

Stretch the goal

#1 Strike – you are great! ($8.000)
Strike! It is possible to produce a tiny version of NATIONS with all printed elements (maps, dice,…), two fractions (capitalism and communism), Android and iOS App for tablets,…

#2 Attention ($10.000)
Adding our own plastic miniatures

#3 A man needs his own land and property ($13.000)
Fantastic – we will add 25 different battlefields to NATIONS

#4 Give peace a chance ($15.000)
You make it possible to create and add the complete third fraction (neutrals)

#5 Show me your weapons and I will tell you who you are ($20.000)
This goal enables a special battle supply pack which includes for example: artillery and air strikes

#6 I need a partner ($25.000)
We will now double the number of nations. Every fraction has now two completed playable nations: United States, United Kingdom, Germany, France, Russia and China

#7 What happened? ($30.000)
Amazing – 25 random events will be fully illustrated and yes we will try to animate some of them

#8 Tribute to Felix Baumgartner ($39.045)
You really like the project – Thanks a lot now we can add two more plastic miniatures – tanks and aircraft

 

Claim your perk

We created some special perks as you see on the right side to honor your contributions.

Upgrade a perk
You want to upgrade your perk? No problem! Just contribute the difference between the two perks and write us an e-mail: nations@powered-board-game.com

How much is shipping?
The perks (game) will be dispatched from Austria – shipping costs depend on the destination.

Sketches: FREE SHIPPING
Pre-Order and above:
Austria: FREE
Europe: 10 USD
International: 15 USD

We also offer a free pick-up at Essen 2013.

When do I get the stuff?
Generally: As soon as possible!
Fan-Articles can be sent immediately after your contribution.
The game will be published in fall 2013!


Thanks in advance, any help is much appreciated!

Yes we need money to realize NATIONS the powered board game but you can do more:

Spread the word
Post this link: http://www.indiegogo.com/nations on your social network like facebook and twitter. Tell your friends about Nations and invite them to support this great project. The Indiegogo share tools (you find them below the video on the top) will be useful for that!

Helping Hands and Ideas
If you like to be part of the team, you have a special ability,great ideas regarding NATIONS - just let us know and e-mail us: nations@powered-board-game.com

Anything Else?
Yes? Don’t hesitate to contact us!

story:
The Story


           The Story begins as our hero (Baltog) saves an old babaylan's life (Eliseyah) against the Ati Tribe of Sorgaron. He will then learn from him the name of theperson (Kareem) responsible for nearly wiping out his entire clan 10 years ago. Eliseyah will train Baltog to be a warrior that would defeat Kareem and after 5 years he will then embark on a journey in pursuit of the said perpetrator only to find himself traveling to a different dimension and encountering creatures that he had never seen before.


The Producer

Brief Background :
               Hi, My name is John and i have always been a gamer since i was little. I grew up in a small town called "Albay" of Legazpi City, Bicol Region, Philippines and graduated with a course of Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering. I've worked as a Technical Support Representative for the last five years but my passion for game and arts never left me. Early of 2012 i decided to work and study at the same time and took up the course of 3D arts and Animation in First Academy of Computer Arts in Makati City. There, i fell in love with Maya and started to explore other 3d softwares that helped me enhance my skills. When Unity was introduced i literally flipped and became addicted on how the software works. Latter of that year, i quit my job as a level 2 Technical Support Representative and started a new career as 3D freelance artist. From there on i have worked with gaming companies as a home based freelance artist.
                Early of the year 2013 i became an in-house 3D artist of a gaming company here in the Philippines and with the help of my previous colleagues we conceptualized a game that will show our Philippine Culture but at the same time will also have western feel on it and so came to be the team "Lakbay Studios" and gave birth to the game "Ang Babaylan" (The Sorcerer).

Goal :         
               The main goal of the campaign is to gather enough funds to support the production of the game. Currently we have finished the first level and the story, however, with the current team, finishing the entire game will take much longer as we are only composed of a few. This Campaign will enable the team to expand and hire individuals needed to shorten the time of production thus giving an acceptable Milestone upon finishing the game. In addition, the funds will also help the team  purchase software licenses and additional hardware needed to speed up the production process.


The Team


Who are we?

Lakbay Studios was founded on the first quarter of 2014. The Company's main goal is to bring about a game that will entice the imagination of the players and at the same time introduce cultures of the founders origin. "Lakbay" is a Filipino word that means "Journey" , as the company embarks a journey to create a fun filled exciting game for the general audiences.

..We have only one mission...

To Have Fun!! 


Who Makes the team :


                 

What We Need & What You Get


What We Need :


Softwares that our team uses are basically trial softwares, and the machines / hardwares that we have are each personally owned. With your help we can purchase necessary licenses and machines intended for the project.
Herewith is the breakdown of how or where the funds will go :
For unity, since the game will be released in multiple platforms the following are needed:

       
Unity pro license
Add-on license:
  iOs
  Android Pro
  Team License
_________________________________


Additional Hardware :
Mac computer are needed to build the game for ios mobiles :
2 Mac Computer / cost
  3.4GHz quad-core Intel Core i5
  Turbo Boost up to 3.8GHz
  8GB (two 4GB) memory
  1TB hard drive1
  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M with 2GB video memory
________________________________________


2 PC computer
Windows computers are needed to have the game build for Android mobiles:
Intel® Core™ i7 Extreme Processor
Windows 8.1
16GB Memory
Dual NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 graphics with 4GB total (2x 2GB) GDDR5
_________________________________________
 

we also need Autodesk licenses :

 mudbox  x 4 units
 autodesk MAYa x 4 units 
 license for Motionbuilder  x 4 units
________________________________________________

Place rental,Electricity bill, Food and water etc.

What YOU get :

The Follower ($ 10.00 USD  donation)

- A big big Thank you from our team! we will give you free "pilak" in-game gold amounting to 10000 you can use this to upgrade or purchase weapons ingame and your name will be included on the Credit list of the game as well.


The Faithful ($ 50.00 USD  donation)

- A Huge Thank You from Lakbay Studios Team! we will give a free in-game gold amounting to 50000, plus a MUG with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, and your name will be included also on the credit list. A big thank you  for having faith in our team!


The Explorer ($ 100.00 USD donation)

-A Huge Thank You from Lakbay Studios Team! we will give a free in-game gold amounting to 100000, plus a MUG with "Ang babaylan" logo on it and T-shirt with the game characters print on it and your name will be included also on the credit list and it will have the title "The Explorer". Thank you for exploring new heights with our team!


The Dreamer ($ 250.00 USD donation)

- A humongous Thanks from Lakbay Studios Team! you will have a free in-game gold amounting to 250000, plus a MUG with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, a T-shirt with in-game characters printed, plus a poster of ang babaylan characters. You also will have a free item called "hiyas" 2pcs. this will enable the character to boost experience rate x2 on a given time span. Also your name will be on a special section of our credits with the title "The Dreamer" on it.


The Visionary ($500.00 USD donation)

- Thank you for having the same vision as our Team! you will have a free in-game gold amounting to 500000 pilak, plus 2 MUGs with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, a T-shirt with in-game characters printed, a jacket, plus a poster of ang babaylan characters. You also will have a free item called "hiyas" 5pcs. this will enable the character to boost experience rate x2 on a given time span. You get the chance to name or design a "Mob-Monster" of your own choice in the game plus CD soundtrack of the game. Also your name will be on a special section of our credits with the title "Visionary" on it.



The Enthusiast ($1000.00 USD donation)

- Thank you for inspiring our team! you will have a free in-game gold amounting to 1000000pilak, plus 2 MUGs with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, 2 T-shirts with in-game characters printed,a jacket, plus a poster of ang babaylan characters. You also will have a free item called "hiyas" 10pcs. this will enable the character to boost experience rate x2 on a given time span. You get the chance to name or design a "Mob-Monster" of your own choice in the game plus CD soundtrack of the game. Also you will have your own avatar in the game, whether it be a Boss-Monster or a sub-character in the game will be up to you,it will be named after you as well.Also your name will be on a special section of our credits with the title "The Enthusiast" on it.



The Noble ($5000.00 USD donation)

- Thank you for being part of the team! you will have a free in-game gold amounting to 5000000pilak, plus 5 MUGs with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, 2 T-shirts with in-game characters printed,a jacket, plus a poster of ang babaylan characters. You also will have a free item called "hiyas" 100pcs. this will enable the character to boost experience rate x2 on a given time span. Also you will have your own avatar in the game, whether it be a Boss-Monster or a sub-character in the game will be up to you,it will be named after you as well.You get the chance to create your own "side-quest story".Also your name will be on a special section of our credits with the title "The Noble" on it.


The Teammate ($10000.00 USD donation)

- You are part of the team! you will have a free in-game gold amounting to 10M pilak, plus 5 MUGs with "Ang babaylan" logo on it, 2 T-shirts with in-game characters printed,a jacket, and the title "Teammate" on the back, plus 5 posters of ang babaylan characters. You also will have a free item called "hiyas" 500pcs. this will enable the character to boost experience rate x2 on a given time span. You get the chance to name or design 5 "Mob-Monsters" of your own choice in the game plus CD soundtrack of the game. Also you will have your own avatar in the game, whether it be a Boss-Monster or a sub-character in the game will be up to you,it will be named after you as well.You get the chance to create your own "side-quest story",and a small town will be named after you.Also your name will be on a special section of our credits with the title "The Teammate" on it. - Should the team not meet the goal needed for this campaign, we will still push through with the project, for we believe in what we do, and our hearts passion is to have the game completed.


The Impact

 The main aim of the project is to showcase bits of information of Philippine culture and folklore through the game. We feel that Filipinos are ready to compete and go with whatever is out in the gaming industry.

The game, if proven successful, will serve as a major step of the team (Lakbay Studios) in creating fun-filled exciting games. We hope that this will serve as a beginning of many more gaming projects to come.


Risks & Challenges

In the early production of the game, the team found it very difficult as it requires a huge amount of time consumption in producing the game itself. Some colleagues needed to choose between their regular day job and the team, unfortunately our numbers began to lessen as we move further on the production. Though we barely made it, we were able to overcome these hurdles by focusing our time and effort on the game, sticking on a tight pipeline. Time management, maximizing resources and with best effort of the remaining team members, we were able to at least partly finish a level of the game.

Great Passion and Dedication these are the main elements of what makes the team profound, and i believe with your help we can make this game happen.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    -Though some may not be able to help financially , there are ways to help the team. We ask you guys to spread the word about the game and share or post it on social networking site, such as Facebook, twitter etc. so that people would know of the games existence. 

    - We understand that there's a lot of people that's very busy so spreading the word through your friends, through text, posting on Facebook or twitter will very much likely make the game happen!

    - Feel free to leave comments, suggestions or donate, vist our website at www.angbabaylan.com

      - We hope that we all work together to have a fun-filled gaming experience with the "Ang Babaylan" Game.

      So Let's Make it Happen!
story_txt:
The Story           The Story begins as our hero (Baltog) saves an old babaylan's life (Eliseyah) against the Ati Tribe of Sorgaron. He will then learn from him the name of theperson (Kareem) responsible for nearly wiping out his entire clan 10 years ago. Eliseyah will train Baltog to be a warrior that would defeat Kareem and after 5 years he will then embark on a journey in pursuit of the said perpetrator only to find himself traveling to a different dimension and encountering creatures that he had never seen before.

The Producer
Brief Background :               Hi, My name is John and i have always been a gamer since i was little. I grew up in a small town called "Albay" of Legazpi City, Bicol Region, Philippines and graduated with a course of Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering. I've worked as a Technical Support Representative for the last five years but my passion for game and arts never left me. Early of 2012 i decided to work and study at the same time and took up the course of 3D arts and Animation in First Academy of Computer Arts in Makati City. There, i fell in love with Maya and started to explore other 3d softwares that helped me enhance my skills. When Unity was introduced i literally flipped and became addicted on how the software works. Latter of that year, i quit my job as a level 2 Technical Support Representative and started a new career as 3D freelance artist. From there on i have worked with gaming companies as a home based freelance artist.                Early of the year 2013 i became an in-house 3D artist of a gaming company here in the Philippines and with the help of my previous colleagues we conceptualized a game that will show our Philippine Culture but at the same time will also have western feel on it and so came to be the team "Lakbay Studios" and gave birth to the game "Ang Babaylan" (The Sorcerer).
Goal :                         The main goal of the campaign is to gather enough funds to support the production of the game. Currently we have finished the first level and the story, however, with the current team, finishing the entire game will take much longer as we are only composed of a few. This Campaign will enable the team to expand and hire individuals needed to shorten the time of production thus giving an acceptable Milestone upon finishing the game. In addition, the funds will also help the team  purchase software licenses and additional hardware needed to speed up the production process.The Team


Who are we?


            Lakbay Studios was founded on the first quarter of 2014. The
 Company's main goal is to bring about a game that will entice the 
imagination of the players and at the same time introduce cultures of 
the founders origin. "Lakbay" is a Filipino word that means "Journey" , 
as the company embarks a journey to create a fun filled exciting game 
for the general audiences.
             

               ..We have only one mission...
            

To Have Fun!! 

Who Makes the team :



                  
  What We Need & What You Get
What We Need :
Softwares that our team uses are basically trial softwares, and the machines / hardwares that we have are each personally owned. With your help we can purchase necessary licenses and machines intended for the project. Herewith is the breakdown of how or where the funds will go :For unity, since the game will be released in multiple platforms the following are needed:         Unity pro license Add-on license:  iOs   Android Pro  Team License_________________________________Additional Hardware :Mac computer are needed to build the game for ios mobiles :2 Mac Computer / cost   3.4GHz quad-core Intel Core i5  Turbo Boost up to 3.8GHz  8GB (two 4GB) memory  1TB hard drive1  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M with 2GB video memory________________________________________2 PC computerWindows computers are needed to have the game build for Android mobiles:Intel® Core™ i7 Extreme ProcessorWindows 8.116GB MemoryDual NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 graphics with 4GB total (2x 2GB) GDDR5_________________________________________ we also need Autodesk licenses : mudbox  x 4 units  autodesk MAYa x 4 units   license for Motionbuilder  x 4 units ________________________________________________ 
Additional Individuals required :Project Pipeline minimum of mos required is about 6 mos.2 x 3D modellers/animator2  x 2D artist/graphic 1  x Sound Engineer 1  x additional programmer _______________________________________________The Remaining will be intended for miscellaneous fees like : Place rental,Electricity bill, Food and water etc.Should donations go beyond $70,000 it will double also the production rate, the more people on the team the less time it will take us to finish the game.

story:
The Project

I have been a tabletop gamer all of my life and the game that originally got me hooked was the Games Workshop tabletop American football styled game ‘Blood Bowl’. I played this for many years as a child and have recently got back into the hobby as an adult, regularly attending tournaments in the UK and Europe playing this particular system.

I have seen other manufacturers creating frog teams in the past but have never seen one that gripped me. With the many different systems available nowadays to play games of this style I thought it would be great to introduce this to the world myself.

The main objectives that I wanted to achieve with the project were for the miniatures to:

·  Have lots of character and a classic look

·  Actually look like they are wearing a fantasy version of American football gear

·  Be beautifully sculpted

·  Stick to the 28mm scale

·  Be cast in high quality white metal

My favourite fantasy football miniatures of the last few years have all been sculpted by one man, Pedro Ramos. In my opinion his style was absolutely perfect for this project and he was the first sculptor that I approached. Luckily, he was keen to do this project and we quickly began to bounce ideas off one another on how the frogs should look.

The next consideration was who should cast the miniatures themselves. After doing some research I discovered that Griffin Moulds JJP Ltd. (casters of the incredibly well manufactured Guild Ball miniatures) were only an hour’s drive from my home. After visiting them and running through the project with them I was convinced of not only their professional nature but also the incredibly high quality of their work.

What is needed to push the project forward and what are the risks?

This project is fairly unique in that the miniatures sculpts for the main campaign are already complete. I have invested thousands of pounds of my own money in order to create the team up front, greatly reducing the risk to the backers of the campaign. The masters are completed, the casters are on board and everything is geared up to start producing the teams once the campaign achieves its funding goal.

However, I am not running this as my main business (I have a career that I enjoy) and will need to redeem my initial investment before production can begin. This is where you come in. I have set the campaign goal at a figure that will ensure that I cover the costs of my initial investment and the production of the miniatures that I plan to be sending out to you all in the near future. Also, as this is not to be my main source of income I may not produce the team indefinitely after the campaign has ended so the teams you purchase may be quite a limited edition.

What will you get for backing my campaign?

There are various different perk levels that allow backers to contribute whatever they can afford and these will give whatever collection of items that is detailed in the description. However, backers of any of the ‘TEAM’ deals will receive not only what is detailed in the description but also all of the unlocked stretch goals (excluding the newly added 'ADD-ON' stretch goals). These unlockable stretch goals will include a mix of star players, variant positional poses, side-line miniatures, exclusive miniatures and more depending on how much is raised! If the total raised is far above and beyond what is expected then ‘add-on’ perks may be added to give backers more options as well. Regardless of your contribution, all backers will receive FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on their perks.


The Team Itself

The team itself is designed specifically to provide a great representation of all of the positionals commonly used in fantasy football games. Linefrog 7 is designed to look more like a quarterback / leader in order to allow it to be utilised as a thrower, allowing the team to be used in game as a broader mix of teams. At present there are just two unique blitzer poses which will be doubled up in the 'team' deals (although they will be provided with a head sprue in order to allow customisation of these figures). Once the second stretch goal is reached another two blitzer poses will be produced in order for every single miniature in the team to be a unique sculpt. This stretch goal will also unlock the head sprue to be purchased as a separate perk (*See update below)

Due to the buzz around this team it looks certain for many of the stretch goals to be unlocked, making all of the 'team' perks even better value and allowing us to produce even more fantastic miniatures! Once these miniatures are unlocked they will be available as separate perks for everybody to purchase, not just 'team' backers.

UPDATE: Now that the 2nd stretch goal has been reached, all teams will come with 4 unique blitzer sculpts (currently work in progress) and all positional player perks will have these extra blitzer sculpts to choose from

The Miniatures

The Perk Options

ADD-ONS

STRETCH GOALS (INCLUDED IN ALL 'TEAM' DEALS)

ADD-ON STRETCH GOALS (NOT INCLUDED IN 'TEAM' DEALS. AVAILABLE AS EXTRA PERK LEVELS)

FINAL €34,000 STRETCH GOAL! (INCLUDED IN ALL 'TEAM' DEALS)

story:
Short Summary

Jashan (17) and Davinder (28) are born and raised in Patiala, northern part of India. They are suffering from very rare disease called limb girdle muscular dystrophy. With this disease both siblings had a normal childhood till the age of 11 and then suddenly they started losing muscular strength in their legs. By the age of 13, both have been bed ridden with zero muscular strength in their lower body. Both are high school graduates and love life. Jashan is a sweet girl with a high acumen and Davinder is a brave boy with multiple face offs with death. His latest trip to ER has changed his perspective towards life and now he just wants to make others happy and travel.

Their father is the sole bread winner and retired last year. Post retirement life has been tough for the family. This one time campaign is to help Jashan and Davinder. Funds raised during this campaign will directly benefit them for paying off their bills and day to day needs. All funds will be transferred to their account and we will provide all proofs of fund transfer.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise minimum of 1000$ for the family. More money we raise, longer we will keep this family afloat. All contributors will be notified of all the updates and will receive the blessings of the Jashan, Davinder and family. 

Our secondary goal is to create awareness about this rare disease and more we share it among our friends and family, better it is to create the awareness. We do want to continue this secondary goal beyond this find raising campaign and we will continue posting updates on campaign facebook page.


The Impact

Impact of financial help is huge for this family. Awareness about this disease has potential to recognize these people in our communities and help them.


Risks & Challenges

No risk and challenge is big enough as compared to risks and challenges faced by this family every day. Davinder latest trip to ER where he was pronounced dead has changed our perspective to deal with risks. We all believe he is a gift for all of us and our campaign will help him in so many ways including financially and emotionally.


My commitment:

As part of our commitment to this cause, Gagandeep Singh Bachhal will take on a ride up on one of the highest mountain roads in Colorado, USA, Pikes Peaks on his Royal Enfield (Bullet) in the month of August 2015. Both Jashan and Davinder approved my goal and they are equally excited.


Other Ways You Can Help

This is one time campaign we are creating to help them for immediate need but if you are willing to help them long term, please feel free to contact us.

God bless y'all

Gagan & Aman

body. Both are high school graduates and love life. Jashan is a sweet girl with
a high acumen and Davinder is a brave boy with multiple face offs with death.
His latest trip to ER has changed his perspective towards life and now he just
wants to make others happy and travel.
Their father is the sole bread winner and retired last year. Post retirement life has been tough for the family. This one time campaign is to help Jashan and Davinder. Funds raised during this campaign will directly benefit
them for paying off their bills and day to day needs. All funds will be transferred to their account and we will provide all proofs of fund transfer.

What We Need & What You Get
 Our goal is to raise minimum of 1000$ for the family. More money we raise, longer we will keep this family afloat. All contributors will be notified of all the updates and will receive the blessings of the Jashan, Davinder and family. 
Our secondary goal is to create awareness about this rare disease and more we share it among our friends and family, better it is to create the awareness. We do want to continue this secondary goal beyond this find raising campaign and we will continue posting updates on campaign facebook page.

The Impact
 Impact of financial help is huge for this family. Awareness about this disease has potential to recognize these people in our communities and help them.
    
Risks & Challenges
No risk and challenge is big enough as compared to risks and challenges faced by this family every day. Davinder latest trip to ER where he was pronounced dead has changed our perspective to deal with risks. We all believe he is a gift for all of us and our campaign will help him in so many ways including financially and emotionally.




My commitment:
As part of our commitment to this cause, Gagandeep Singh Bachhal will take on a ride up on one of the highest mountain roads in Colorado, USA, Pikes Peaks on his Royal Enfield (Bullet) in the month of August 2015. Both Jashan and Davinder approved my goal and they are equally excited.



Other Ways You Can Help
 This is one time campaign we are creating to help them for immediate need but if you are willing to help them long term, please feel free to contact us.
   God bless y'allGagan & Aman

story:
ContraSpace

Playing games was the first I've discovered having touched my first computer Apple II. I really love playing computer games and personally I find the multiplayer online games as most exciting so two years ago decided to put all my experience toward game development. Having played a couple of really good Sci-Fi online games I came up with an idea for a game much simplified more strategic-oriented but optimized for mobile platforms. A game that can be played at any time no matter where you are – at home, in the buss, walking on the screet, having coffe on the corner or even having a break, just log in and have fun.

The game is a huge virtual persistent universe where all players interact with each other in real time. The game does not define rules or stereotype to play. Everyone decides how to play and what to do. In game you have an avatar, a character that presents you. Your first rookie ship is small and mostly suitable for traveling. It would not sustain against any warfare vehicle even against a small frigate. You will need to learn more skills to gain more experience and get able to fly other ships, modify their configurations, trade or produce stuff and more.

Contraspace is a social game. Players are provided with the environment and delegated with freedome to design and build the virtual life of this universe. One will chose to play solo while othrers will prefer to play in team. The players can found corporations to play togehter having one goal sharing corporative financial and material resources.

The economy of Contraspace is entirely players driven. The prices are regulated by supply and demand and depend on location in the universe where buy and sell orders are placed. Sometimes it might be better to transport valuable stuff between regions for better income but be wise! Never fly alone when the wealth in your cargo might be of interest to somebody else.

The most exciting side of Contraspace is PVP. For those whiling to demonstrate experience in the battle CS provides with a huge stage. The players can fly solo or form in fleets to perform as single unit following every single command of the leader.

On this screenshot you see a station inner environment. The player's ship is docked on bottom you see the cockpit. In the middle is the ships health indicator currently on 95%. Bellow all currently mounted modules and finally the local chat channel. Players can communicate via instant or offline messages very like "emails". Chat channels have every solar system so called "local" and corporations in game. A player can establish a private conversation by sending an invitation to another player.

In the overview you see another two players docket. Once docked you can modify your ship configuration by mounting or unmounting modules. Some modules modify ships characteristics like hull, cargo capacity, shield resistance, velocity and etc.

 

By mounting the right modules on your ship you can get as most of it. Of course, the fittings schema depends on the purpose the ship is being prepared for. The count of mounting points "slots" you can use is limited so you need to find the best cobination of modules to achieve better results.

Some equipments require from your character skills in engineering and machanics skill groups so you will need to have them all complete, before you be able to use that modules.

On this view you see your ship current configration, all mounted modules and the free slots that you may still use. On top you can change the assets view range - ship, your station private hangar, the region you are currently located in. Finally you can see all your assets spread across the universe.

 

  

This is the battle view. You are currently in outer space in front of a space station. At the same time there are two other ships as well. One of them, Danin has already locked you and perhaps is ready to open fire. You have them locked as well. Your laser turret and smart bomb are lunched against your first target. It is a matter of time to get the target down if your ship can sustain the enemy fire. If you see your ship gets damaged faster than the damage you do you should try warp out, if you could. Just pray your enemies do not have your warp drive disrupted otherwise you wount be able to fly away. It would be wiser to get in battle only when your ship is properly fitted with all offensive but defenseve modules as well.

In critical moments you can always send your firends a signal that you need help. Keep in mind that they will probably need some to time to arrive into location you are.

 

This is a belt. Huge stones freely flying around, some of them containing very valuable minerals. We use the belts to mine ores that we can sell or use as basic ingredients for production industry. Some ores are very rare and expensive. The outcome from trading them is wealth for every miner. That's why it is very important for every miner or corporation in game to find such belts and keep them from enemies as long as possible.

 

 




 



 

What I need and what you get

Donating for Contraspace you get part of this project where your generosity is well appreciated. As giving the favor back you can select one of the following perks:

  • Give a space ship a name

  • Give a solar system a name

  • Give a missions agent a name

  • Give a missions agent a face

Ships and solar systems names are unique and must follow the same pattern. They are usually a single word as short as possible and easy to be remembered. A name cannot be a personal name, a verb or adjective and preferably should be a word from an old language not used any more. The agents names make exceptions from this pattern and can be any name your fantasy may say.

If you have chosen to donate for an agent face you must send us a portrait of you. Only personal portraits are accepted. The portrait will be cartooned. You will be offered with up to 3 versions. You can request changes to one of them, if any. The agent face will be deployed into the content once you are agreed with the final version.

 

 

The Impact of your donations

The smart phones today are part of our daily life.The decision to make the game for mobile devices is intended. Having the lovely applications everywhere at any time is something making our life easier and more exciting. The freedom to have a persistent connection with your family and friends communicating or sharing funny moments or emotions is something new to us the mobile era made true. Think if you can play your lovely online sci-fi game with your friends at any time no matter where you are. It is great, is not it?

There is something more. Contraspace is not just an idea. As you can see the game is already under development but I need financial support to complete and release it. I have invested time and money to bring the game to a stable working condition. Supported by you I will be able to complete and release it witin the next few months. That's why I am here.

You can help in any way

Cannot donate? No problems. You can help in any way. Just sharing a link to this campaign in Facebook is a big step toward. The more players get known to this initiative the sooner we will be enjoying the game.

 

Testers wanted

Everyone willing to participate as testser can email me at: support@contraspace.com. Initially the game will be released for iOS and later for Android platforms as well.

story:
PLEASE NOTE: this project is on HOLD. We are no longer accepting pledges. If you would like your money back, please get in touch.

Lose your friends, lose your faith, lose your mind - HyperNormal is one girl's journey through the darkness of her reality.

What is HyperNormal?

HyperNormal is a first-person survival horror game for PC, Mac and Linux, developed using Unity. A sleepy London borough turns to Hell as a young woman named Angel begins to lose her mind.

Lose your friends

In the world of HyperNormal you can trust no one - friends become enemies as they turn monstrous and against you. Battle the monsters made out of Angel's friends and explore what made them that way.

Lose your faith

Why is this happening? Why is this happening to you? Why would God forsake you? Explore a world in which a girl loses her faith and is forced to confront her demons.

Lose your mind

Make bad decisions, dig yourself deeper into madness. HyperNormal's unique "Anguish" meter measures not only physical damage sustained by Angel but her deteriorating mental state.

What risks do you face?

Being able to finish the game - at the end of September my interns move on, and bringing a game to market is a lot of work! Successfully funding the game will mean I will be able to hire the help I need to finish the game on time.

What risks have you already mitigated for?

'Getting people to buy' - we're building a fanbase and even using IndieGoGo to help spread the word about HyperNormal.

Project management - a project manager has agreed to work with us for free, and has already provided so many insights it's untrue! He will be keeping us on track to release the game on time.

What if you can't fund the game through IndieGoGo?

Maybe the game doesn't get published - maybe I don't get to live my dream. You want to help me live my dream, right?! I jest, but seriously, we want to get this finished and we want to do it right. We want to bring you the best game possible, and that'll be a lot quicker to happen if we get funded.

When do you plan to release?

 If all goes to plan, the game should be released in March of 2015.

story:
Help us to complete the Popolvuh Videogame made by a Mexican father and an 11 years old son


The team.   We are a team, pioneered by a father and a Son (monarres family), who started a  dream back in December 2012, when we were getting ready for chirstmas times. We decided to begin a great project together: to bring the PopolVuh myth into a videogame for children. Me, the father, with more than 20 years of software development experience offered my services  to my little son, who has more than 7 years of videogame experience and a great imagination :) 



The story.  We chose the most electrifying story that we all study, in Mexico and Latinamerica when going to elementary school: The popolvuh, the creation story of the Maya...

  Here is the story of the beginning, 

  when there was not one bird, not one fish,

  not one mountain.

  Here is the sky, all alone.

  Here is the sea, all alone.

  There is nothing more

  –no sound, no movement.

  Only the sky and the sea.

  Only Heart-of-Sky, alone.


The videogame.   Certainly, we needed to adapt the story to make it videogame attractive, so we decided to divide it in 7 different chapters, which offer 7 different videogame levels, where children will have the opportunity to join the two princes brothers who crossed 7 Mayan kingdoms, braving dangers and getting new friends.


Children will have great fun using special powers to defeat the evil reptilian and monsters who persecuted the princes during the 7 worlds.

Our videogame production will be coming to the market by parts, in the form of a Popopulvuh videogames saga:

Chapter 1: "The Kingdom of Birds"!!

Chapter 2: "The Animal Kingdom"!!

Chapter 3: "The Kingdom of Mud"!!

Chapter 4: "The Kingdom of Wood"!!

Chapter 5: "The Kingdom of the Apes"!!

Chapter6: "The Kingdom of the Mayan Warriors"!!

Chapter 7: "The Return of the Birds"!!


The production.  This is certainly our first videogame production, we are still learning on the go, however we are highly excited and motivated to achieve our goal together.

Although we started with a group of only 2 people (father and son), time after, we managed to organize and compile the effort of many highly talented freelancers from many parts of the world: writers, cartoonists, modelers, programmers, musicians, translators and voice actors. With a good project management methodology and spending all our savings :)  ...  we managed to build up step by step a videogame production, which we believe, will bring a unique message and a lot of fun to worldwide children.


Our production is based in the concept of family ties, it counts the story of Popolvuh, underlining the family feelings and love among brothers, parents, grandparents and friends.

We used the narrative style, which offers narrative segments like a movie and gameplay elements which work together to create a fantastic world of entertainment.


The fisrt chapter to be completed.   Our videogame production is right now in phase of testing for Chapter1, looking forward to come out to the market with: Chapter 1: "The Kingdom of the Birds" - The origin of the Maya begins …



The internationalization.  Our production  includes more than 1,000 words in the form of videos, dialogues and voice instructions, which were made completely in Mayan language and another 16 worldwide languages:  English, Spanish from Mexico, Spanish from Spain, Portuguese, Chinese -Mandarin, Hindi, Bengali, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Russian,  Japanese, Korean, Turkish and Indonesian. How did we do that? ... "fiuhh, it was a great experience interacting on the web  with so many people from all over the world, who helped us as voice actors :)   ... We will give special thanks to all of them, actually we made a very nice 3DMax video credits for that"



The music.  You know that all nice video games include a special song, so we made our own song. We didnt have money to pay an important and famous musician, so we we made it on our own. You won't believe how good this song sounds. Sorry that I am not attaching here videos and songs right now, since we are still protecting all this material for the moment that we come out to the market with the complete production.

We made the song in a rock style, I wrote it on my own, I learned some Mayan expressions, so I composed the song beginning with some  lyrics in Mayan language, then English words and then the chorus in Spanish alternating with English Spanish. Everyone who has listened to the song, they really adore it. They say the song is  very lively and rhythmic, so that will help us to send a great message to the world :) 


The videogame platform. We used Unity3D as platform of development to integrate our videogame production. That means that potentially we could publish the resulting videogame to be played upon multiple console platforms such as PC, Mac, Xbox, Play Station , Nintendo and Wii.  


However it is almost impossible to get a  license to publish upon those dominant worldwide console platforms when you are nobody :) ...  So we will have to start deploying the videogame to be played upon Web PC. Eventually, when we make good noise in the market then we could think of talking to the other big companies. 

Our web videogame on testing...



The financial challenges we need to overcome. At this moment, we have invested so much money during 16 months continuously that we cannot keep the rythm any longer, but we need to finish testing and  cleaning many small tech details of the mentioned first chapter to be able to launch it to the market and have a great quality product to compete with another productions. We have already talked to some International publishers who are very interested on our product, mainly because it is something very different, no violence and rich of culture.  



So we need a package of money in order to (1) finish the production with our local freelancers and (2) to bring the production to Japan to be played and corrected by another group of more experimented professionals (a specialized studio to publish INDIE productions) who can help us to clean it, so we can finally finish it and launch it to the international market.



The estimated date to launch the production to the market: 

Looking forward to be in the market on November 1st, 2014


We will appreciate your financial support infinitely 

As we mentioned above, we need at least $100,000 USD in order to achieve our goal by launching a historical videogame production to the market.

  • We will use $30k USD in salaries for mexican freelancers (4 people, 4 months) to complete the production (testing and cleaning) 
  • We will use another $30k USD for traveling expenditures to go to Japan to correct the production final details (flights, accomodation, food and local transport for 4 people during 8 weeks)
  • We will use another $40k USD to pay initial consulting fees (additionaly of 30% for success fees that we have negotiated with them)

Your help, whatever it is, will make a great change in our lives. Thank you for believing on us.

The impact of your money on us.  If we get more financial support than we are initially requesting here, then we will use that money to go right ahead and start the  next chapters of our production at the same time that we complete the first chapter:

  • Upto $100k USD then we'll complete Chapter 1: "The Kingdom of Birds"!!
  • Upto $300k USD then we'll also make Chapter 2: "The Animal Kingdom"!!

  • Upto $400k USD then we'll also make Chapter 3: "The Kingdom of Mud"!! 

  • Upto $500k USD then we'll also make Chapter 4: "The Kingdom of Wood"!!

  • Upto $600k USD then we'll also make Chapter 5: "The Kingdom of the Apes"!!

  • Upto $700k USD then we'll also make Chapter6: "The Kingdom of the Mayan Warriors"!!

  • Upto $800k USD then we'll also  make Chapter 7: "The Return of the Birds"!!

  • More than $800k USD then I will open a formal studio for videogame productions with a quality assurance department and  to focus entirely on completing the complete Popolvuh videogame saga.  If we have gone so far using only  late nights and weekends, I am sure that we could make great productions in a top quality level when focusing full time 



What do we give in exchange for your help?


These are the rewards for you:

$10.00 USD help

Rewards:  Exclusive digital wallpaper using our original Popolvuh videogame images to adorn your PC’s desktop , signed by all the team and with a special thanks for you!


$25.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus a free PREMIUM version of the game!


$50.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus your name on the thank you  credits page of the game website

 

$80.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus the Popolvuh Original Soundtrack with some introductory words thanking your full name for your help


$100.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus  the OFFICIAL game poster sent directly to your door signed by our Producers (Monarres Father and Son) and with a special thanks for you!

**National orders, please add an additional $10 USD to your contribution.

**International orders, please add an additional $18 to your contribution.


$125.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus  a signed postcard, with special thanks for your help, of Mayan Pyramids of "Chichen Itza" city, which was one of the largest Maya cities and it was likely to have been one of the mythical great cities. The city is located in the Mexican state of Yucatán (close to Cancun beach)

**National orders, please add an additional $10 USD to your contribution.

**International orders, please add an additional $18 to your contribution.


$250.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus an exclusive Popolvuh main characters T-Shirt signed by our Producers (Monarres Father and Son)  and sent directly to your door

**National orders, please add an additional $20 USD to your contribution.

**International orders, please add an additional $28 to your contribution.


$500.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus  a cartoon character made specially for you, using the style and scenery of Popolvuh. Just send us over any picture you want and one of our cartoonists will draw a fantastic character out of it.   We will use photoshop to give wonderful colours.  


$1,000.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus  a 10 seconds video made specially for you, using our digital material from Popolvuh scenes and the Original Soundtrack. We can make any voice acting to animate your required dialogue in any of the 17 Popolvuh videogame languages.


$5,000.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus  a personalized assistance to invite you to visit Mayan piramids at Cancun Mexico. We can help you to book flight tickets, hotels, taxis and the best tours at your own convenience so you spend the best vacations that you ever imagined.


$10,000.00 USD help

Rewards: Everything above, plus a package of five nights for 2 people at Ocean Maya Royale Hotel -  It is an all inclusive 5 stars resort for adults located in the heart of the Riviera Maya, just 6 miles from Playa del Carmen and 53 miles from Cancun Mexico.

(Ocean Mayan Resort at Cancun Mexico)


Our final words to kindly request your help

We believe that with this production we will send a worldwide message of peace and love. In sum, regardless of the language and nationality, we want to make people feel that we are not that different when we come to the moment of letting our children to play videogames, We all enjoy and appreciate meaningful stories.


    We are aware of risks and challenges

    We are aware that we are in high risk of not receiving the support that we are looking for, no problem, whatever it happens, we will try to accomplish our dream in one way or another one. However, you can help us a lot if you also forward this site link to another people and maybe you can also talk to your friends and relatives about our campaign.  


    Best wishes and thanks a lot for having read our campaign ;)
