story:
About us

Meiko Miniatures is a small company producing miniatures for Fantasy Football. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams. To achieve this we always work with the most talented sculptors.

We have made 6 previous Indiegogo campaigns: Lizardmen, Kaos Dwarves, Ratmen, Undead / Necromantic, Kaos Pact and Kaos. All the packages of these six campaigns were shipped just 3 months after the end of each campaign, accomplishing the estimated shipping dates stated on the campaign descriptions.


Why crowdfunding?

The Meiko Miniatures new project is the Ultimate Norse Team. This team will include the following 16 Players: 1 Snow Troll, 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Blitzers/Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers / Runners, and 7 Norse Linemen. The campaign will also include 5 Star Players that can play with the Norse Team (including a Snow Troll Star Player) and several more items: two pitches  (Rollable Gaming Mat and Puzzle-like Hard Pitch), a Norse Football, a Norse Range Ruler, one Norse Injury Dice, a Set of 3 Norse Block Dice, a Set of 2d6 Norse Dice, Two Turn and RR Counters and Two Prone / Stunned Snow Troll Tokens.

We are pretty excited with this project, since this is the first Meiko Team totally designed with 3D sculpting. We want to make clear that in the future, Meiko Miniatures will keep launching teams traditionally handmade sculpted. But from now on, we will also launch 3D sculpted teams, alternating them with handmade sculpted teams. This Meiko Norse Team is the one than starts this new stage for Meiko Miniatures regarding sculpting. 

The sculptor of this team is Sergi Torras, the acclaimed 3D sculptor of several popular Fantasy Football Teams, like the Iron Golems Dark Elf and Human Teams or the Star Player Miniatures Wood Elf Team, among others. Before being hired by Games Workshop for the Warhammer line Sergi Torras sculpted the Meiko Norse Team. Sergi is considered by many Fantasy Football fans as one of the best and most talented Fantasy Football 3D sculptors worldwide. We all hope that in the future he will work again for the Fantasy Football community. Franarcilla will sculpt using 3D the upcoming Star Players if their Stretch Levels are near to be unlocked . 

All the miniatures will be casted in metal. The sculpting of most of these miniatures has already been made. We need your help to speed up the casting process. That way, we will be able to release the Meiko Norse Team much sooner than what was initially planned. Using Indiegogo as a platform to rise funds helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures and other interesting items, obtain feedback from our customers and it gives us confidence to keep working on. In exchange you will get some cool rewards.

How do these Norse look like?

How can you support this team?

LEVEL 1 

13 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Set of 2 Berserkers. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 5 or higher.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 15 EUR (2 EUR Discount)

LEVEL 2 

13 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Set of 2 Catchers. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 5 or higher.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 15 EUR (2 EUR Discount)

LEVEL 3 

13 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Set of 2 Throwers. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 5 or higher.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 15 EUR (2 EUR Discount)

LEVEL 4 

16 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Set of 2 Ulfwerners. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 5 or higher.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 20 EUR (4 EUR Discount)

LEVEL 5 

16 EUR

You will receive a Snow Troll. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. Free shipping included.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 17 EUR (1 EUR Discount + Norse Football + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 6 

29 EUR

You will receive a Norse Rollable Plastic Gaming Mat and one Norse Range Ruler. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. Free shipping included.

This Range Ruler is made of flexible plastic and is 1 mm thick. That is the same thickness than a plastic Credit Card.

The Plastic Gaming Mat is printed in oilcloth, so it’s waterproof and you will be able to easily roll it for a comfortable transportation.

The Gaming Mat includes 2 Dugouts with their 3 sections: Bench, Unconscious and Dead-Injured. Also includes Re-roll, Turn and Score Counters, two Throw-in templates and two Quick Reference Lists with all the possible results of the Kickoff, 2 marks where players usually throw the kickoff, a colored Table to establish Ranges when throwing the ball, a Weather Table and a Scatter template.

Retail Price of this Level at stores = 31 EUR (2 EUR Discount + Norse Football + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 7 

39 EUR

You will receive a Norse Puzzle-like Hard Pitch and one Norse Range Ruler. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. Free shipping included.

This Range Ruler is made of flexible plastic and is 1 mm thick. That is the same thickness than a plastic Credit Card.

The Puzzle-like Hard Pitch is divided in six pieces. These puzzle-style pieces allow you to quickly do and undo the field, so you will be able to easily fit it in your travel bag.

When mounted  the pitch size is 60 cm wide x 90 cm long, while the size of each single piece is of 30 cm x 30 cm. Due to the small size of the single pieces they are really handy to transport. The pitch is made with a light and water-proof resistant plastic material.

The pitch includes 2 Dugouts with their 3 sections: Bench, Unconscious and Dead-Injured. Also includes Re-roll, Turn and Score Counters, two Throw-in templates and two Quick Reference Lists with all the possible results of the Kickoff, 2 marks where players usually throw the kickoff, a colored Table to establish Ranges when throwing the ball, a Weather Table and a Scatter template.

Retail Price of this Level at stores = 41 EUR (2 EUR Discount + Norse Football + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 8  (only 20 available)

55 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included. (only 20 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 75 EUR (20 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping)   

LEVEL 9  (only 20 available)

60 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included. (only 20 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 75 EUR (15 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 10  (only 30 available)

65 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included.  (only 30 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 75 EUR (10 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 11  (only 20 available)

65 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 1 Snow Troll, 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included. (only 20 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 92 EUR (27 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 12  (only 20 available)

70 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 1 Snow Troll, 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included. (only 20 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 92 EUR (22 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 13 

70 EUR

You will receive one Norse Team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included.

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 75 EUR (5 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 14  (only 30 available)

75 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Norse Team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 1 Snow Troll, 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included. (only 30 available) 

Future Retail Price of this Level at stores = 92 EUR (17 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 

LEVEL 15 

80 EUR

You will receive one Norse Team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 1 Snow Troll, 2 Ulfwerners, 2 Berserkers, 2 Throwers, 2 Catchers and 4 Linemen (Lineman nº 1, Lineman nº 2, Lineman nº 3 and Lineman nº 4). All the miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one Norse Football. This Level will also include all the unlocked Free Reward Levels (3 New Norse Linemen, Norse Star Players, Dice, Tokens, etc). Free shipping included.

uture Retail Price of this Level at stores = 92 EUR (12 EUR Discount + Norse Football + All Unlocked Free Levels + Free shipping) 


STRETCH GOALS and REWARD GOALS


If we reach 3.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Norse “Dirty Player” Lineman nº 5. This miniature is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.

If we reach 4.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Norse “Fatso” Lineman nº 6. This miniature is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.

If we reach 5.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Norse Sara Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This miniature is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.


If we reach 6.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Norse Lineman nº 7. This miniature is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.

If we reach 7.000 EUR  All contributors will get one Norse Injury Dice for just 3 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. Just roll a dice to find out the result of the injury!!! These are the 6 sides of the Norse Injury Dice: 3 "Badly Hurt" (BH) Sides, 1 "Misses Next Game" (MNG) Side, 1 "Serious Injury" (SI) Side, 1 "Dead" (RIP) Side: the drawing that you can see on the picture. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 8.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Set of Two Norse Counters (one RR Counter and one Turn Counter). These two Counters are 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.

If we reach 9.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Set of 3 Norse Block Dice for just 5  EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 10.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Set of Two Snow Troll Tokens (one Prone Token and one Stunned Token). These two Tokens are 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.

If we reach 11.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Snow Troll Star Player for just 16 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 12.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Dwarf Bombardier Star Player. This miniature is sculpted by Pedro Ramos.

If we reach 13.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Norse Chainsaw Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 14.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8 or higher will get for free a Set of 2d6 Racial Norse Dice

If we reach 15.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Werewolf Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 17.000 EUR… more Reward and Stretching Levels to come!


NORSE RR - TURN and SNOW TROLL TOKENS UNLOCKED!!!

NORSE D6 RACIAL DICE UNLOCKED!!!

We’re glad to let you know that since the campaign is going to finish in 7 days, we decided to unlock the Turn – RR Tokens and the Snow Troll Prone – Stunned. We also unlocked the Set of 2d6 Norse Racial Dice. That way, all the backers that wish to get any of those items can pledge for them now. Each set of two tokens is 7 EUR and the set of 2d6 dice is 4 EUR. Thanks for your support!


IMPORTANT: if we reach the amount that unlocks any of those levels, we will refund via Paypal all the backers the pledged for them. For example, if we reach the 8K we will refund all the backers that pledged for the Set of Two Turn – RR Tokens. Of course, those backers will receive the same those tokens, since they will be a new free reward, which will be added to the 3 Norse Linemen already unlocked.


Estimated shipping date: October 2016

hope that in the future he will work again for the Fantasy Football community. Franarcilla will sculpt using 3D the upcoming Star
Players if their Stretch Levels are near to be unlocked .  
 All the miniatures will be
casted in metal. The sculpting of most of
these miniatures has already been made. We need your help to speed up the casting process. That way, we
will be able to release the Meiko Norse Team much sooner than what was
initially planned. Using Indiegogo as a platform to rise funds helps us a lot
since we can finance new miniatures and other interesting items, obtain
feedback from our customers and it gives us confidence to keep working on. In
exchange you will get some cool rewards.

the size of each single piece is of 30 cm x 30 cm. Due to the small size
of the single pieces they are really handy to transport. The pitch is made
with a light and water-proof resistant plastic material.
 
The pitch includes 2 Dugouts with

STRETCH GOALS and REWARD GOALS
If we reach 3.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Norse “Dirty Player” Lineman nº 5. This miniature
is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.
 If we reach 4.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Norse “Fatso” Lineman nº 6. This miniature is 3D
sculpted by Sergi Torras.
 If we reach 5.000 EUR  All contributors will get a
Norse Sara Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it.
This miniature is 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras. This Stretch Level will be
created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.
 If we reach 6.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Norse Lineman nº 7. This miniature is 3D sculpted
by Sergi Torras.If we reach 7.000
EUR  All contributors will get one Norse Injury Dice for
just 3 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. Just roll a dice to find out
the result of the injury!!! These are the 6 sides of the Norse Injury Dice: 3
"Badly Hurt" (BH) Sides, 1 "Misses Next Game"
(MNG) Side, 1 "Serious Injury" (SI) Side, 1
"Dead" (RIP) Side: the drawing that you can see on the picture. This
Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated
above.
 If we reach 8.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Set of Two Norse Counters (one RR Counter and one
Turn Counter). These two Counters are 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.If we reach 9.000
EUR  All contributors will get a Set of 3 Norse Block Dice
for just 5  EUR, adding the Stretch
Level for it. This Stretch Level will be created once the campaign reaches the
amount stated above.
 If we reach 10.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Set of Two Snow Troll Tokens (one Prone Token and
one Stunned Token). These two Tokens are 3D sculpted by Sergi Torras.
 If we reach 11.000 EUR  All contributors will get a
Snow Troll Star Player for just 16 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it.
This miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be
created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.
 If we reach 12.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Dwarf Bombardier Star Player. This miniature is
sculpted by Pedro Ramos.
 If we reach 13.000 EUR  All contributors will get a
Norse Chainsaw Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for
it. This miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be
created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.
 If we reach 14.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 8
or higher will get for free a Set of 2d6 Racial Norse Dice
 If we reach 15.000 EUR  All contributors will get a Werewolf
Star Player for just 7 EUR, adding the Stretch Level for it. This
miniature will be sculpted by Franarcilla. This Stretch Level will be created
once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.If we reach 17.000 EUR… more Reward and Stretching Levels to come!NORSE RR - TURN and SNOW TROLL TOKENS UNLOCKED!!!NORSE D6 RACIAL DICE UNLOCKED!!!We’re glad to let you know that since the campaign is going to finish in 7 days, we decided to unlock the Turn – RR Tokens and the Snow Troll Prone – Stunned. We also unlocked the Set of 2d6 Norse Racial Dice. That way, all the backers that wish to get any of those items can pledge for them now. Each set of two tokens is 7 EUR and the set of 2d6 dice is 4 EUR. Thanks for your support!IMPORTANT: if we reach the amount that unlocks any of those levels, we will refund via Paypal all the backers the pledged for them. For example, if we reach the 8K we will refund all the backers that pledged for the Set of Two Turn – RR Tokens. Of course, those backers will receive the same those tokens, since they will be a new free reward, which will be added to the 3 Norse Linemen already unlocked.
Estimated shipping date: October 2016

story:
What is it?

 Its a classic jump & run game with puzzle and exploration elements optimized for mobile devices.

The Gameplay

Based on classic jump& run games, you run and jump through different levels and collect coins and collectibles. Solve physic based puzzles and explore different environments.

The World

Get into Netrocity and discover different areas into a living city with his own culture, explore skyscrapers, the Streets and the suburbs, dive into the underground and the bayarea, or get a nice run in the woods.

Storyline

Oh no! Someone stole a lot of your stuff! Walk out to try find them and met other strange characters in this artsy world!

Current State

- 10/20 levels are done so far, each level round about 1-4 minutes

- changing level design in every area

- different ways to play: run fast to the goal or take some time to explore

- hidden locations

- working title screen and settings

- game data saves automatically

- Levels got a rating after finish

- Coins, collectibles and the counter

- different plattforms and interactable objects

- some background music and effects

What need to be done?

- more Levels!

- polish: a lot more details, better transitions, better lighting, some visual effects

- better and individual music and sound effects

- animating cutscenes

- animate npc`s

- implement text windows (eventually with voice acting!)

Graphics

Stylized "sketchy" graphics

Here are some examples:

Details

Jumping Sprite Sheet

The Dev

Hi! I`m Jan, a 25 year old graphic/web designer and Illustrator from the german coast based in Kiel, an ambitious gamer playing videogames with a lot of love and passion for over 20 years nearly every day. (I´ve got the first gameboy in my hands before i could walk!) So now i would love to give some content back to the gaming community and make a living out of the best hobby in the world!

Stretchgoals

- 750€ Super Jump Paradise will be released on Android and iOS!

- 900€ get a port for Steam!

- 1000€  More characters you can met

- 1200€ work on better and more dialogs

- 1400€ voice acting

- 1750€ Cutscenes

- 2000€ twice as much levels

Why Indiegogo?

The development process started 4 months ago, i´ve spend a lot of time and nearly all my savings on those last months. The main game mechanics are working, i can do a lot by my own but there are some things i need help:

- a professional musician for a well produced individual soundtrack

- pay the release fee for Android, iOS and Steam

-  more time for polish and more Levels

There is even more i would love to add if the game will be funded (,it´s not necessary but it would make the game even better):

- short animated Cutscenes

- voice acing

-more storytelling

Thanks for having a look at this game! Please help, to get the most out of this project. Every contribution will help and get the best quality out of it. Thanks a lot!

Rewards

 

The digital Artbook (PDF)

finished design can be different, visual example

 

The 500€ bundle:

0,8m x 1m handmade acrylic painting on canvas

Risks

The prototype (core game) is running on pc and mobile devices, the release date can change during the amount of refunds or if other artists and devs join this project to make it even bigger.

Other Ways you can help

If you like to support, you can share the trailer, this campaign or just tell your friends about it. I appreciate every sort of help, thanks!

 

Music used in the trailer:

Depart (cdk mix) by cdk (c) copyright 2015 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/cdk/50347 Ft: Tekno Eddy

story:
About us

Workbench Studios is a team of young game designers from Skopje , Macedonia.

Our dream is to become game developers one day and make awesome games that people will enjoy playing. We're currently giving our best and putting a lot of effort in our first game. We're working everyday , designing and discussing about new ideas and what can be implemented into the game , removing bad things and trying to be as creative as possible. We're four members at the moment and looking to expand with people willing to help us achieve our dream.

                 

                     About Wounded

Wounded is a first person horror game that offers an immersive and realistic environment along with many strange things and mysteries that you will soon uncover. 

The game puts you in a role of a father who finds himself in a strange , abandoned place after having a car accident while returning from a family trip with his daughter Lisa. After waking up you realize that things are not like they look like and Lisa is gone missing from the passenger seat. As you start to look for her you find out new things about the place and as far as you know they are not very pleasant.

      Why do we need your support?

         

  • We need your support because we're currently only four people working on the game and our programmer recently quit because he couldn't find the time to work enough and he didn't want to slow us down.
     
  • We have a bit of trouble with money that we need to continue developing since we're too young to have a job. 

    Also the game is being made with the free version of Unity , we are planning to buy Unity Pro if our project gets funded. 


                                 Risks & Challenges

    We're aware that we're not the only one out there trying to make their dreams come true and achieve their goals. That is why we are giving our best to make it happen. 

    We're also aware of the risks on our way to achieving our goal for example : 
    - Our project doesn't get funded and we may not continue our progress.
    - We do not find another programmer.
    - Someone also has to quit for some other reasons.

                          Other Ways You Can Help

            Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

      Anyone who supports us but cannot donate for some reason , can help us in many other ways!  

      - Any programmer , 3D modeler , Animator who wants to help us with the developing of Wounded can contact us on our Facebook page and join the team.
      - If you liked the announcement trailer feel free to leave a like or share it with other people.  
      - Share our campaign with others.

      Please note that we accept any ideas for the game and if you have any thoughts on how we can improve feel free to contact us on our Facebook page. 

      We respect all opinions even if they are bad so please feel free to tell us. It will help us improve!

story:
Let's Go Outside and Play Together!

GrowGames has Three Goals for Food Action:

1. GAME:  #SeedstheGame are mobile games that teach you how to grow and then get you gardening outside in real life

2. JAM: Game jams connect you to local players to form or join teams and clubs to design, garden, and play together

3. THRIVE:  Receive useful tools and vibrant seeds through our rewards and for tackling challenges in the game and then use them to grow with your friends

Seeds is a Series of Mobile Games Created with YOU

We want to shift the way people use technology: instead of shutting you off from the world, our games showcase the most beautiful and amazing things growing around us and then challenge you and your friends to go out and find them in real life.
We LITERALLY put the tools, and the seeds, in your hands to grow the kind of garden you've always dreamed of.

Join us as a seed planter, designer or developer at a game jam, a beta testing player growing food with friends or action hero garden expert to level up your guild and share knowledge worldwide. Clues to gameplay are hidden in our series of videos starting with the first video above and releasing weekly every Wednesday in 2014. Come back to watch the updates and learn how to level up with Grow Games.

Connect Gardens Worldwide & Play an Ecosystem of Experiences 

We connect gardens in gratitude with our shared heritage and we tell this story in our games.  Whether you're an individual gardener or part of an established organization, this is your invitation to join us and get in first for our soundtrack of music, games, game jam events and actions in your area to grow together in guilds and food leagues.
Play now - use the hashtag #SeedstheGame to be in one of our next videos and earn points as we build the community!


Together with dozens of our favorite artists we are offering this limited edition game jam alpha release for you, straight from the best festivals and events around the world as a preview for music in gameplay. With your support we are launching a series of mobile games in 2015 and you will get the first download codes & access. The more we raise together, the faster we can produce this series for you. 

Grow Food, Play with Friends, Save Money: GAME JAMS

We mix permaculture education, game design and community playtesting into local events to engage people who may be new to game development and gardening. 
Some of our games like Symponix and Pested include great music - all of our games are tools designed to help you grow food together. We create together at game jams with community experts and game designers from many backgrounds.

Open Game Jam Access to Design with Us!

Join us at a GAME JAM to become a Grow Games Insider with special access as we develop this series of games - internships and design partnerships are welcome. This crowdsourcing harvest season is your opportunity to get first in line for game releases, downloads with the limited edition music jam.
Companies can go big with Grow Games to reach new people! Organizations and enterprises can sponsor game jam events with first access to market/shelf space in many games - the farmers market features prominently in gameplay.

Soundtrack benefit album + free downloads with all rewards over $13

As a thank you for helping us build these games we are producing a mix of our game music together with our favorite musical artists. You, the perfect beta testers, get the perfect seed album to start your garden adventures.

We are creating healthy homemade perks including custom food items with our gardeners and city farmers if we meet our goals. Stay tuned for our video releases every Wednesday including our PERKS video coming soon and help us sell out and share more SEEDS!

A Gratitude Garden Jam for you to enjoy anywhere 

Mixed by Jesse Wright (Lightning in a Bottle, Artist Director) joined by a huge harvest of artists with gratitude for all of their amazing hard work. We will be announcing artists every week and you can head over to our Soundcloud for more music to garden by.

Seed Packs & Special Gift Packs with Sensors

We are making gift baskets with special perks for our first beta testers and supporters including jewelry from artist Cristina McAllister, one of our character designers. Some of the perks listed include shipments of sensors for the home, school or community garden including arduino-based soil sensors and weather stations. Gameplay will help you link your sensors to play in coming iterations and we encourage you to make your own data centers in your garden to keep track of your soil health and climate needs for healthy gardens. 

Early Bird Worm Specials & Farm to Table Play

Get in first for early access to the downloads and beta codes! Seed packs and special gift packs include extras to share. In-game our early worm will give you insight on your soil health and help you get in first for our games and apps even before they are released to the public. You can sign up to be an early playtester and come to our game jams to get involved in game and app development....plus get in on the secret prizes available only for the first week of this campaign.

Seeds Launch Party in Vista

In 2015 we will be hosting an event for our top crowdfunding supporters where they will receive all sorts of wild infusions of new seeds and special prizes. This will be a once in a lifetime event featuring many of the artists on our soundtrack album along with a full farm to table feast for the senses. You can schedule your own Farm to Table event with our expert chefs at the Emerald Village catering your feast for 16 from our gardens and farms to your table. We'll help you grow new food at home.
Our games connect gardens, people and food systems worldwide. 

This is our Gratitude Garden and You are Seeds in the Game.

We join you to host interactive events to activate your school or community play with food, water and soil systems -Your contribution now includes your first pass ticket in for events, music, games and experiences in 2015 and 2016 with Grow Games & #SeedstheGame. Take a pic and tag it now to start playing! We will be sharing your pictures in our supercuts throughout this campaign and game series.

Employee-Owned Social Benefit Game Company

Our biodiverse team is a Southern California Social Benefit Corp striving to be the first gaming B-Corp with a focus on global food and ecosystem resiliency:

  • We love games and create/play together at game jam events
  • Our team is a mix of women and men from all backgrounds and orientations
  • We are disaster relief geeks with 25+ years experience working with nonprofits, government, education and sustainable business practices
  • You can join us for events by sponsoring an award or bounty achievement at a development game jam in a city near you

Our nonprofit partners such as Growcology in Riverside and Project Nuevo Mundo host volunteer events where we partner to host a mix of game jam and educational events to level up real world gardening skills. We are happy to be working with great nonprofits such as the Seed Libraries Network and local food action and permaculture alliances. Join us at a game jam or local event to get started as a playtester, artist or game designer with Grow Games Interactive.

Action Engine EXPERIENCE with Food Systems

Our team includes amazing leaders in biodiversity and permaculture, technology and game development, interactive storytelling and educational applications.

GROW GAMES INTERACTIVE is a social benefit company in California:
Nick Heyming: CEO and Director of the Flow with experience in eco-friendly development and media, providing FLOW DOJO workshops as a premium reward for those who want to learn jedi arts with friends at home or at his ecovillage.
Evonne Heyning: Chair of the Board and Executive Producer ~ experienced with interactive production and games of all types, creative lead making limited edition jars of SEED JAM with homegrown pomegranate and lotus seed as a sugar-free spread.
Peter Kwok:  Technical wizard, operational lead and board member specializing in data integration with hardware and software experience from Apple to Google. Active gamer, designer and climate data/disaster response specialist.
Sonya Meline: Active in permaculture as culture-building through events and tech companies, focusing on great relationships and healthy organizational development as we grow
Michelle Perrales: Our volunteer and project coordinator with the passion for people, the planet and playtesting with our team, designing great user experiences and interfaces for action.

SOME OF OUR AMAZING ARTISTS (and more to be announced!)
Jesse Wright: A top headlining DJ at Coachella and Lightning in a Bottle, Lead music director and artist liaison for live music & DJs
Cristina McAllister: Character, avatar and fine artist with experience in tabletop and RPG gaming, crafting epic bugs and female heroes such as the Autumn Queen in our early prototypes
Nahko and Medicine for the People: Live music with a message for the people of the earth from the native voice
Imperial Highness:  Produced by FABIAN ALSULTANY with KAZUHIRO ITOH, the Globesonic world DJ's latest project mixes global music masters
Al-Insan Lashley:  Interactive designer and artist for game board and posters 
Mr. Lif: HipHop & Spoken Word artist with Terra Bella
SEEDS ADVISORY TEAM
Don Tipping:  Author, workshop and educational leader at Seven Seeds Farm
Native Seeds/SEARCH: Non-profit Indigenous Seed Saving and Education
Eric Stephens:  Gardening and composting expert and youth outreach

Daniel Goldman:  Founder/systems designer with SimCity/Maxis

Jon Everett: Project Manager/Flow master, Unity Developer and Animator
Kevin Byall: Senior CG Artist/Animator with SimCity/Sims at EA
Jacki Morie: 30 years interactive design/production for games and simulations, advisor and curator/producer for SIGGRAPH
Maya Zuckerman:  Founder of Transmedia SF, Interactive Producer
Marco Barrantes: Permaculture expert, Founder of La Loma Development
Bianca Chavez Memory Heyming: Native Landscaping and Storytelling Expert
Dr. Nicole Radziwill:  Technology/Computer Quality Systems + Climate Data, JMU
Dr. Victor Zordan:  University of California Professor in Video Game Production
Tom Munnecke: Systems design sensor advisor for hardware and internet of things
Ursula Leyva:  Permaculture education and level/achievement design, Spanish language learning specialist
Selena Wilson: Visual Artist, School Garden Liaison, Youth Outreach
Olivia Zanfardino: Advisor for Aquaculture, education and dashboards for data analytics with agencies and public sector partners

ADDITIONAL THANKS TO OUR GREAT TEAM AND GAME JAM CREATIVES!

Manny, Tina, Mari, Blake, Hayley, Mario, Adam, Ariel, Dalia, Joshua, Thom, Toren, Chaos, Adam, Jessica, Natalia, Jesse, Selena, Mike and everyone at the Emerald Village, including our playtesting volunteers and field experts. 

How We Work with You & Your Guilds

We are raising support to pay for stipends for our creative leaders who have given generously of their energy and to host GAME JAMS WITH YOU:
  • Our company will invest the first $20K raised in game jams to produce a series of design, strategy and development events with you where we produce game elements together with field experts. 
  • The next $40-50K is invested in staff cost for hiring developers and production team from game jam talent, internships and awards for events including sponsored awards for the game jam series.
  • We aim to raise $100K for first app releases by 2015 from a mix of crowdfunding, angels and ecosystem product partners. 
  • We have raised $25K so far to start Grow Games as an employee-owned social benefit company over the last year starting with a team of 3 and featuring hundreds of volunteers, playtesters and guest stars.

Be the First Expert, Plant a New Field 

  • SOCIAL ACTION GAMING IS HOT: Ingress is challenging millions to make a map of the world's art while losing weight taking portals. 
  • We start with the SEEDS geo-play social action engine + mapping local food systems + games + garden experiences and make it participatory for all ages.
  • Field expert perks may include Grow Games moderator permissions for forums, sensors for community gardens and guilds, Eddefy expertise & knowledge sharing across the game network + honors and recognition in-game. 
  • Talk to us about your integrated projects! We love teaching gardens.

#SeedstheGame Global Impact

Have you ever wanted to play a game that creates real value?

Playing Seeds the Game apps over the last year has saved our playtesters an average of $100 in food! Our games connect games and gardening to grow healthy ecosystems starting at home and in our neighborhoods.

When challenged by disaster, drought, outbreaks and epidemics:

  • Real-time data mapping of local food systems provides a lifeline
  • Global play can help eradicate pest challenges and adapt to climate change
  • Games and actions can be added to address specific, local, urgent needs
  • Special games and actions address organizational challenges as they happen

We are happy to meet with your organization to discuss mods and gameplay on top of your existing data sets and challenges.

A Story for Thrivable Futures
  • Our storytellers Bianca (English/Native American) and Ursula (Peruvian) share the importance of food, soil, water and ecosystem care from indigenous voices as climate-appropriate landscape masters
  • We are building on five years of educational experience in permaculture and food systems with Growcology, our partner for educational scholarships and design awards
  • Our action engine includes nonprofit and local food actions, connecting people to community gardens and opportunities to do more together

Take control of your food system....and get in a great flow perk! 

Our intrepid leader Nick Heyming began this work after rebuilding in Cuzco, Peru and after Hurricane Katrina in Louisiana where he taught the basics of growing new systems and flow arts, the jedi training that mixes the art of the garden with movement arts such as fire and staff spinning. Only a few of his special flow dojo workshops are available in this campaign and he will come to you or you can come visit him at the Emerald Village for your customized flow workshop.

Send photos & videos #SeedstheGame to play

  • Tag your best food systems & garden work #SeedstheGame to be featured on our site, in weekly video series and in gameplay.
  • Indiegogo share tools make it easy to Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/Pinterest us as much as you wish. Run amok, don't be shy. We love you too.
  • Join us at a game jam! We're in Pasadena, San Francisco, Vista, Los Angeles and San Diego this month....Reach out and send us a message to join our crowdsourced game team @GrowGames and tag #SeedstheGame anywhere to share & connect.
story_txt:
Let's Go Outside and Play Together!

GrowGames has Three Goals for Food Action:
1. GAME:  #SeedstheGame are mobile games that teach you how to grow and then get you gardening outside in real life
2. JAM: Game jams connect you to local players to form or join teams and clubs to design, garden, and play together
3. THRIVE:  Receive useful tools and vibrant seeds through our rewards and for tackling challenges in the game and then use them to grow with your friends
Seeds is a Series of Mobile Games Created with YOU

We want to shift the way people use technology: instead of shutting you off from the world, our games showcase the most beautiful and amazing things growing around us and then challenge you and your friends to go out and find them in real life.

We LITERALLY put the tools, and the seeds, in your hands to grow the kind of garden you've always dreamed of.


Join us as a seed planter, designer or developer at a game jam, a beta testing player growing food with friends or action hero garden expert to level up your guild and share knowledge worldwide. Clues to gameplay are hidden in our series of videos starting with the first video above and releasing weekly every Wednesday in 2014. Come back to watch the updates and learn how to level up with Grow Games.

Connect Gardens Worldwide & Play an Ecosystem of Experiences 

We connect gardens in gratitude with our shared heritage and we tell this story in our games.  Whether you're an individual gardener or part of an established organization, this is your invitation to join us and get in first for our soundtrack of music, games, game jam events and actions in your area to grow together in guilds and food leagues.

Play now - use the hashtag #SeedstheGame to be in one of our next videos and earn points as we build the community!


Together with dozens of our favorite artists we are offering this limited edition game jam alpha release for you, straight from the best festivals and events around the world as a preview for music in gameplay. With your support we are launching a series of mobile games in 2015 and you will get the first download codes & access. The more we raise together, the faster we can produce this series for you. 

Grow Food, Play with Friends, Save Money: GAME JAMS
We mix permaculture education, game design and community playtesting into local events to engage people who may be new to game development and gardening. 

Some of our games like Symponix and Pested include great music - all of our games are tools designed to help you grow food together. We create together at game jams with community experts and game designers from many backgrounds.


Open Game Jam Access to Design with Us!
Join us at a GAME JAM to become a Grow Games Insider with special access as we develop this series of games - internships and design partnerships are welcome. This crowdsourcing harvest season is your opportunity to get first in line for game releases, downloads with the limited edition music jam.
Companies can go big with Grow Games to reach new people! Organizations and enterprises can sponsor game jam events with first access to market/shelf space in many games - the farmers market features prominently in gameplay.


Soundtrack benefit album + free downloads with all rewards over $13
As a thank you for helping us build these games we are producing a mix of our game music together with our favorite musical artists. You, the perfect beta testers, get the perfect seed album to start your garden adventures.
We are creating healthy homemade perks including custom food items with our gardeners and city farmers if we meet our goals. Stay tuned for our video releases every Wednesday including our PERKS video coming soon and help us sell out and share more SEEDS!
A Gratitude Garden Jam for you to enjoy anywhere 

Mixed by Jesse Wright (Lightning in a Bottle, Artist Director) joined by a huge harvest of artists with gratitude for all of their amazing hard work. We will be announcing artists every week and you can head over to our Soundcloud for more music to garden by.

story:
DOWNLOAD BINK!


KICK OFF 2015 on the right foot and be a part of the Bink! movement.

Receive special CODES to exclusive private games on 
our Twitter feed @thebinkworld. 

It all starts soon.

WHAT IS BINK!?

Bink is a mobile game where players are asked to navigate to a target area in the real world and recognize (scan) an image with their smartphone camera to unlock and win a reward with the option to Pay-it-Forward to participating NGOs!

The Game is all set to go! We just need YOUR help with the reward fund to start populating the real world with Bink quest spots! Players will search for secret logos on the streets of San Francisco and with your help all across the globe, unlocking $100s in cash rewards!

Once you complete a quest we'll provide you a money transfer code you will be able to use at any Money Gram / Western Union location.

Will players keep rewards or pay them forward to NGO...? The leaderboard will show.

 



FACTS:

For the 1st time ever, we are spending more time on our smart devices that in front of the television, over 5 hrs. a day. Our kids are on their devices in the car, at the dinner table, practically everywhere, from the moment they wake until the moment they sleep. We are building relationships with our smartphones rather than our families. It is through our smartphones that, Bink! reconnects us with what really matters, the real world. Get back to reality and experience real world adventures with your friends playing Bink!





BINK! WILL LAUNCH A GAME SOON!

All you have to do is get to the location where a secret hidden object is located, find the special image and scan it with the Bink! mobile application. You will unlock a $100!!! reward and can either collect the cash or Pay-It-Forward to a partnering non-profit organization and help those in need.

We love real world adventures and video games! Now you can enjoy these loves at the same time while earning rewards, even cash money ($$)!

THE COOLEST THING

As the Indiegogo campaign takes place we are adding more locations into the Bink! World for players to win. The more you contribute the more challenge areas we will release! After the 3rd week of January we will begin to notify players that have downloaded the app about new Bink! challenges. 

Get out and play Bink!

This is an adventurous mobile game that presents each player with a unique opportunity to reconnect with the real world and enjoy a healthy active activity. (Hint: Be on the lookout, as Bink! grows so will the competition.) If you seek the feeling of achievement then this is right up your alley. 

ABOUT BINK! WORLD:


  1. Every day new challenge areas will be activated.
  2. Players will see challenges on the map inside the Bink! app.
  3. Using the clue provided players will have to find a secret image that is hidden inside the area and scan it with the Bink! app.
  4. Whoever manages to scan the image first gets the reward! Cash rewards can be redeemed in as little as 15 minutes from completion of the challenge. We  use a money transfer service provider, like Money Gram or WesternUnion, they have locations all over the USA. It's cash right here and right now. Special offers will be redeemed at participating vendor's storefronts.
  5. Each winner can donate a portion of their reward to a participating non-profit. We are looking for new partners. Email us at join@thebrandedapp.com and check out the $1 Non profit perk.

HOW IT WORKS?

|     1. Get notified      |  
|     2. Goto the location      | Run, jog, drive, ride... 


|     3. Solve the clue      | Test your location based awareness 

|     4. Discover the hidden image      | Find it
|     5. Scan it with the Bink! app      | Be there 1st! 


|     6. Unlock the reward     | Achievement and success!

 |     7. Pay-It-Forward     | Help those in need

|     8. Tell your friends      | Feel great about doing good 
|     9. Stay on top the leaderboard      | Compete often 
|     10. Make change happen!      | Your turn!
|     11. Bink all over again!

THE GAME IS READY:

We've tested the technology with over 1000+ graduate and undergrad students in San Francisco. Together with HULT International Business School we've helped students to explore the streets of San Francisco in a competitive team building manner. 


SUPPORT US TODAY AND GET ONE OF OUR LIMITED TIME PERKS

What we need & what you can look forward to:
We have the 1st version ready to release during the month of January. We need your help with the reward fund. It's simple, the more perks and contributions we get the more rewards we will release into the Bink World! 

We are looking for $2,000 to pay forward to players and NGOs. $20,000 would be amazing and we will run another campaign in February to help reach this stretch goal.

We believe that having a reward fund we can make the real world around us so much more fun and support a global community of adventureres we all belong to as well as those in need.

At the end of the day, the more you contribute:
=  more challenges
=  more rewards
=  players and non-profits win!

Who are you & why Bink! works for you:

Adventurous individual: seeking real fun with an option to win awesome rewards and/or help those who need .

– Download the app and join the Bink! game. (The app is in approval process now)

Business, small or big: looking to increase revenues and foot traffic to your storefront? What about increasing your brand awareness?
– Check out our perks we can do this!

Non-profit Organization: need to increase awareness and build fundraising campaigns around your good cause or charity? 
– Check out our $1 NGO Partnership perk

Corporate: looking for a team building scavenger hunt?
– Check out our perks we can do this too!

The Impact:


We believe that Bink! will:

  • Merge the border between real world adventures and video gaming excitement
  • Support the community of local adventurers! It’s a super fun way to explore the world around.
  • Local vendors will be able to create their own challenges, awarding players with special offers.
  • Donating a portion of their reward to non-profits, players will be able to support a good cause while having fun! 


Our first NGO to join the game is Asante Africa: http://www.asanteafrica.org

Asante Africa's mission is to educate and empower the next genration of change agents, whose dreams and actions will tranform the future of Africa and the world.  

Players will be able to support Asante Africa by donating a portion of their reward.

    Risks & Challenges:

    We have a very talanted team of enthusiasts with skills covering anything from legal analysis to technology. However there one risk we would like to share as we want to be absolutely open and transparent with our players and contributers: 

    • Without a reward fund we might not be able to offer enough daily challenges and rewards.
    • Other than that the only risk is to get too excited playing the game! 

    Other ways you can help:

    We appreciate any input that would help us to let more people enjoy Bink!. If you know of an NGOs (charities, good causes, non-proftis) that would like to be a part of our game please ask them to contact us at:
    join@thebinkworld.com
    If you are a local vendor who wants to create a Bink! challenge around your storefront with a specific reward attached feel free to contact us at:
    vendors@thebinkworld.com
    Or simply tell your friends about the game and spread the word about Bink!

    Share! Post and Tweet!

    FAQ

    Q: What do I need to do when I get to the location?
    A: Players will have to find the hidden image and scan it with their Bink app, unlocking special offers from vendors or cash prizes ($100 up to $1000) having an option to donate a certain part of their prize to a participating NGO and in turn making the world a better place.

    Q: What does it mean to Pay-It-Forward?
    A: We keep track what portion of any prizes that you win in a live leaderboard. It shows how much money is paid forward to non-profits and how much is kept by the players. Our hope is that the community will autonomously balance itself and that greed will not overshadow giving; eventually we see Bink creating a sustainable way for non-profits to fund raise on a global scale through our game platform and this IndieGogo campaign. 

    Q: Where is this going to happen?
    A: We will begin the Bink effort in San Francisco and have an interesting method to scale...we are keeping this hush hush for the moment, but you will be the 1st to know when it happens ;)

    Q: Do I need to pay to play?
    A: The game is absolutely free to play and every player is equal. To play the game it is totally free. 

    Q: Is there any way to increase my chances to win? What if I contribute more, will my chances improve?
    A: Every player in the Bink world is equal, there is no correlation between your donations and ability to enter or play the game. Bink! is not a lottery and we don't charge any money to enter it. 

    Community testimonials:

    From the HULT International Business School pilot:

    "It was great to experience the culture more. It involves you, its not like you are just walking around. It gets you engaged with your environment."

    "It was an awesome day having the treasure hunt, we got to know a lot about each other, just figuring out the activities, where to go, our sense of orientation and direction. I feel like I know the city better. I know how to get around better. It was a pretty awesome day. It really was!" 

    "The app was great. It was slick. It was fresh. No bugs. You could track live scores of other teams and see how they are doing. It was a lot of fun and we had an amazing time. Great app!!"

    "The best part was that as we were roaming all over the streets without knowing anything about the city at all. Bink! rocks! Its awesome to move through the San Francisco streets. I enjoyed the game. Keep rocking!"

    "The best part was that it tracked our live progress and showed us in the map; instead of using a piece of paper to mark something. Here we can see that a visual effect is much better than a written response. It was a bonus to see that once we uploaded a picture we could see that other teams we competing."

    "The apps clarity, inclusion of the logo scan, the presence, the positioning of the logos, and featuring a leaderboard, that was amazing.  That was something that I found to be new to an app. The integration of the scan and the GPS was the best thing that I saw. It was the best activity to start our MBA program. I have lived and roamed around the city these past few days, I feel that I know it better now.  Good job guys!"

    "It’s an exclusive stand-alone app for adventure. It makes complete sense to use something like this because you have exact locations to goto. You have activities to do once you have reached the goal. It would be great for any brand to consider using this platform."

    "It was the excitement to cover all the spots that drove us to do this. We were having great fun out there. I really want to thank you for the application that you prepared. It's very useful. Each and every college, I would advise them that they should create this kind of activity that will enhance our knowledge and skill along with motivating us. Something new is good and this is good. It created some serious positivity for me!"

    The Team:

    We are a talented team of professionals with a diverse skill set and experience in delivering innovate products to the market.
story_txt:
DOWNLOAD BINK!


KICK OFF 2015 on the right foot and be a part of the Bink! movement.


Receive special CODES to exclusive private games on our Twitter feed @thebinkworld. 



It all starts soon.





WHAT IS BINK!?

Bink is a
mobile game where players are asked to navigate to a target area in the real world and recognize (scan) an image with their smartphone camera to unlock and win a
reward with the option to Pay-it-Forward to participating NGOs!
The Game is all set to go! We just need YOUR help with the reward fund to start populating the real world with Bink quest spots! Players will search for secret logos on the streets of San Francisco and with your help all across the globe, unlocking $100s in cash rewards!
Once you complete a quest we'll provide you a money transfer code you will be able to use at any Money Gram / Western Union location.
Will players keep rewards or pay them forward to NGO...? The leaderboard will show.




 





FACTS:
For the 1st time ever, we are spending more time on our smart devices that in front of the television, over 5 hrs. a day. Our kids are on their devices in the car, at the dinner table, practically everywhere, from the moment they wake until the moment they sleep. We are building relationships with our smartphones rather than our families. It is through our smartphones that, Bink! reconnects us with what really matters, the real world. Get back to reality and experience real world adventures with your friends playing Bink!









BINK! WILL LAUNCH A GAME SOON!
All you have to do is get to the location where a secret hidden object is located, find the special image and scan it with the Bink! mobile application. You will unlock a $100!!! reward and can either collect the cash or Pay-It-Forward to a partnering non-profit organization and help those in need.



We love real world adventures and video games! Now you can enjoy these loves at the same time while earning rewards, even cash money ($$)!



THE COOLEST THING
As the Indiegogo campaign takes place we are adding more locations into the Bink! World for players to win. The more you contribute the more challenge areas we will release! After the 3rd week of January we will begin to notify players that have downloaded the app about new Bink! challenges. 
Get out and play Bink!
This is an adventurous mobile game that presents each player with a unique opportunity to reconnect with the real world and enjoy a healthy active activity. (Hint: Be on the lookout, as Bink! grows so will the competition.) If you seek the feeling of achievement then this is right up your alley. 



ABOUT BINK! WORLD:










Every day new challenge areas will be activated.
Players will see challenges on the map inside the Bink! app.
Using the clue provided players will have to find a secret image that is hidden inside the area and scan it with the Bink! app.
Whoever manages to scan the image first gets the reward! Cash rewards can be redeemed in as little as 15 minutes from completion of the challenge. We  use a money transfer service provider, like Money Gram or WesternUnion, they have locations all over the USA. It's cash right here and right now. Special offers will be redeemed at participating vendor's storefronts.
Each winner can donate a portion of their reward to a participating non-profit. We are looking for new partners. Email us at join@thebrandedapp.com and check out the $1 Non profit perk.





HOW IT WORKS?

|     1. Get notified      |  |     2. Goto the location      | Run, jog, drive, ride... 


|     3. Solve the clue      | Test your location based awareness 
|     4. Discover the hidden image      | Find it|     5. Scan it with the Bink! app      | Be there 1st! 

|     6. Unlock the reward     | Achievement and success!
 |     7. Pay-It-Forward     | Help those in need
|     8. Tell your friends      | Feel great about doing good |     9. Stay on top the leaderboard      | Compete often |     10. Make change happen!      | Your turn!|     11. Bink all over again!THE GAME IS READY:

We've tested the technology with over 1000+ graduate and undergrad students in San Francisco. Together with HULT International Business School we've helped students to explore the streets of San Francisco in a competitive team building manner. 



SUPPORT US TODAY AND GET ONE OF OUR LIMITED TIME PERKS



What we need & what you can look forward to:



We have the 1st version ready to release during the month of January. We need your help with the reward fund. It's simple, the more perks and contributions we get the more rewards we will release into the Bink World! 


We are looking for $2,000 to pay forward to players and NGOs. $20,000 would be amazing and we will run another campaign in February to help reach this stretch goal.

We believe that having a reward fund we can make the real world around us so much more fun and support a global community of adventureres we all belong to as well as those in need.


At the end of the day, the more you contribute:=  more challenges =  more rewards =  players and non-profits win!






Who are you & why Bink! works for you:


Adventurous individual: seeking real fun with an option to win awesome rewards and/or help those who need .
– Download the app and join the Bink! game. (The app is in approval process now)
Business, small or big: looking to increase revenues and foot traffic to your storefront? What about increasing your brand awareness? – Check out our perks we can do this!
Non-profit Organization: need to increase awareness and build fundraising campaigns around your good cause or charity? – Check out our $1 NGO Partnership perk
Corporate: looking for a team building scavenger hunt? – Check out our perks we can do this too!


The Impact:





We believe that Bink! will:



Merge the border
between real world adventures and video gaming excitement


Support the community
of local adventurers! It’s a super fun way to explore the world around.


Local vendors
will be able to create their own challenges, awarding players with special offers.


Donating a portion
of their reward to non-profits, players will be able to support a good cause while having fun! 





Our first NGO to join the game is Asante Africa: http://www.asanteafrica.org




Asante Africa's mission is to educate and empower the next genration of change agents, whose dreams and actions will tranform the future of Africa and the world.  
Players will be able to support Asante Africa by donating a portion of their reward.


  


Risks & Challenges: We have a very talanted team of enthusiasts with skills covering anything from legal analysis to technology. However there one risk we would like to share as we want to be absolutely open and transparent with our players and contributers:  
Without a reward fund we might not be able to offer enough daily challenges and rewards.
Other than that the only risk is to get too excited playing the game! 






Other ways you can help:
We appreciate any input that would help us to let more people enjoy Bink!. If you know of an NGOs (charities, good causes, non-proftis) that would like to be a part of our game please ask them to contact us at:
join@thebinkworld.com
If you are a local vendor who wants to create a Bink! challenge around your storefront with a specific reward attached feel free to contact us at:
vendors@thebinkworld.com
Or simply tell your friends about the game and spread the word about Bink! Share! Post and Tweet!




FAQ
Q: What do I need to do when I get to the location?A: Players will have to find the hidden image and scan it with their Bink app, unlocking special offers from vendors or cash prizes ($100 up to $1000) having an option to donate a certain part of their prize to a participating NGO and in turn making the world a better place.
Q: What does it mean to Pay-It-Forward?A: We keep track what portion of any prizes that you win in a live leaderboard. It shows how much money is paid forward to non-profits and how much is kept by the players. Our hope is that the community will autonomously balance itself and that greed will not overshadow giving; eventually we see Bink creating a sustainable way for non-profits to fund raise on a global scale through our game platform and this IndieGogo campaign. 
Q: Where is this going to happen?A: We will begin the Bink effort in San Francisco and have an interesting method to scale...we are keeping this hush hush for the moment, but you will be the 1st to know when it happens ;)
Q: Do I need to pay to play?A: The game is absolutely free to play and every player is equal. To play the game it is totally free. 
Q: Is there any way to increase my chances to win? What if I contribute more, will my chances improve?A: Every player in the Bink world is equal, there is no correlation between your donations and ability to enter or play the game. Bink! is not a lottery and we don't charge any money to enter it.

The Team:

We are a talented team of professionals with a diverse skill set and experience in delivering innovate products to the market.

story:
Agent Ready Revolutionary Global Real Estate Mobile App

  • My name is Penn Mason, I am a experienced Real Estate agent in Nashville TN
  • I created Agent Ready to help consumers connect with Agents Live in real time.
  • We are patent pending globally and need to now hire engineers to create the actual software which is very expensive . Your contributions will make it possible. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are funding the agreement with World Patent Marketing to partner with the CEO Scott Cooper
  • Perks: Get your name on the list of contributors of the application for your contribution globally!
  • All funds will go towards the creation of the software 

The Impact

Agent Ready will change the way we start our Real Estate Journey


  • Connect With a Real Estate Agent in Real Time
  • Find Exactly What Your Looking For Quickly
  • Get Help With Home Funding Locally
  • Stop Blindly Searching The Internet
  • See Top Reviews On Each Agent 
  • Secure And Verified Real Estate Professional
  • Local Search Via GPS Mapping
  • Let Your Agent Help You Through Every Step
  • Make Your Home Buying Or Selling Easy
  • Your Agent Can Connect You To All Your Service Needs
  • Connect to Builders, Remodeling, Mortgage Brokers and More Via Your Personal Agent!
  • See The Agent Ratings via Goolge,Yelp,Yahoo,Zillow and more all integrated into the agent profile.


Agent Ready will be a real estate mobile application like non other on the market. The small and short of it. This application allows you the buyer or seller to..once logged in and verified pull the GPS map via your location see the Real Estate Professionals in your exact location or nearest to you that are (Ready) to help you with your real estate needs. You will be able to see the agents information and online ratings before you connect so that your confident your connecting with a true real licensed real estate professional. Once you connect you both decide whether you and  the agent will  be a good fit for each other. 

  • So how will Agent Ready help the buyer or seller? 


Currently in the real estate market today most consumers start with online searching tools. Typically buyers and sellers of real estate go to home search sites like Zillow,Redfin and many more to do home searches. So whats the problem with that? Well allot of the property information is inaccurate. 80% of it is proven not correct. Buyers can not really tell if the property is even really available or not. They end up contacting a agent only to find out that the perfect property dream home they have found under a contract or SOLD and becoming very frustrated and it happens over and over again. This also puts a strain on the relationship at first contact with a Realtor because the agent has to give their potential client bad news right from the get go. 

   

        

  Consumers should always start with an real estate agent that can provide the buyer and seller with the tools and answers they need from the first step in your real estate journey. This is the key to saving time and frustration during the home search and purchasing process. Professional licensed real estate agents are trained to get all the most relevant information and provide that to their clients in a honest and professional manner. That is a huge part of a Real Estate Agent Code of Ethics.Remember Realtors want to help. They will provide you with the representation you need during the entire process. And as you probably know the process is not always easy. This is why it is so important to contact your agent from the very first step on your real estate journey.

"Agent Ready will change the way we all start our Real Estate journey"

  • So how will it work?

 Agent Ready will allow the buyer or seller find a licensed professional live in real time via the mobile application using GPS mapping location technology. Showing real estate agents that are live and waiting to connect with the buyer or seller within up to a 50 mile radius from the buyers or sellers pin point location. On the consumer side of the application the buyer or seller will be able to tap on any real estate agent  profile and see feedback from other Agent Ready consumers. The profile will also show the agents Yelp ,Google ,Yahoo and more online ratings. This allows the consumer to make a smart decision while choosing a Realtor. Agent Ready will be the first real estate mobile application of its kind. 

Agent Ready will have two service sides to the application.


  1. The Consumer Side ( Free Sign Up)
  2. The Real Estate Agent and Real Estate Services Side (Subscription Sign Up)
  3. Low Cost Download And Subscription Fee
  • 1st Ever Real Time Real Estate Agent Lead Generation
  • Lowest Price For Lead Generation
  • New Technology Mobile Application
  • Local Buyer And Seller Leads
  • No Other App Allows Live Real Time Targeted Buyer And Seller Leads
  • Works With Residential Real Estate
  • Works For Commercial Real Estate
  • Create A Network Of Business Partners Within Your Profile
  • Premium Pre-Approved Buyer and Seller Leads

story:
Keep using your mouse and keyboard as before and add an entirely new input channel! Do more at the same time and speed up your gaming. Handle even complex key bindings with a simple twitch of your foot.

Making use ot the broadly established HID (Human Interface Device) Protocol, the Bcon automatically works with all games and software that support keyboard controls - no need for any driver installation.
 

From OBS, to 3D modeling, to all sorts of creative software. Bring efficiency and comfort into your professional life with a device that works with every established software out of the box.


The Bcon’s broad compatibility brings motion control even to your SmartTV or cell phone!

 

The Bcon's Dynamic Sensor System combines the results of the constant measurements within fractions of milliseconds to achieve optimal results in different situations.
 

The wearable recognizes four effortless moves: lift heel or lift toes (pitch), tilt right or tilt left (roll) and translates real-time measurements into precise input.

The device measures your movements at a velocity of 1,000 measurements per second and is capable to recognize changes at up to 2,000 degrees per second for responsiveness and accuracy when it matters most.The Bcon compensates for non-mono-directional movement patterns by ignoring small values on the alternative axes.

Seamlessly stall all actions triggered by the Bcon whenever you need it!

Allocate Pause to any keyboard key to temporarily prevent the Bcon from sending any command to your PC. This allows you to easily switch games and even leave your computer without removing the device. After your break just remain in a relaxed position and continue to game on!

The Bcon is designed for highly complex key bindings giving you up to 24 additional hotkeys or 4 key sequences of up to 6 keys each through the versatile configuration software.
 

Freely adjust the device’s sensitivity and decide when you want a command to be sent. Whether it´s just a quick press of a single hotkey or keeping multiple keys pressed - experience the full spectrum of your keyboard at a flick of your foot.

Chain up multiple keys to create powerful combos without any automation!
 

Each combo is created within the device’s firmware, achieved without automation scripts for authenticity and can be interrupted at any point to react to changing game contexts.

We’ve taken into account the unconscious movement, position shifting, and the natural flow of gaming.
 

To prevent the Bcon from triggering unwanted or unconscious commands (its hard to keep your feet still in the heat of the moment!) we have integrated a -5° to 5° protection zone on both the longitudinal and lateral axis. To keep up with your individual habit of fidgeting we additionally made this protection zone fully adjustable beyond the -5° to 5° range.

Freely change your sitting position!

The player can reset the zero point at any time and the Bcon will interpret movements according to its new spatial orientation. As gaming sessions tend to become long, feel free to stretch out, jump up, and change positions as necessary without losing functionality.

The Bcon clings magnetically and is both securely fastened and easily removed by hand. The socket’s elevated boundaries mechanically absorb centrifugal forces and protect the Bcon against falling off while in use. The socket possesses an attached webbing customizable in length to accommodate different types of usage. Barefoot naturally requires less length than using the Bcon with your shoes on.

The Bcon has been actively tested by gamers – even live on stream! The valuable feedback gathered went straight into the development process, making the Bcon a true gaming device.
 


 

No matter what life throws our way, we are appreciative that creativity, innovation, and tech can empower people to overcome situations and improve the quality of life for themselves as well as for others in similar or varying circumstances. The Bcon is a true aid for players unable to use standard peripherals - competitive gaming for all gamers!

story:
The Game

Project Gaia is a mobile game, focused around the concept that every action, regardless of how small, has the potential to completely alter the future of yourself and those around you. The game is heavily story driven, bordering on a novel with turn based game play mechanics, giving it a similar feeling to that of a "choose your own adventure" novel. The player is given control of a main character, and throughout the game they make many decisions, dictated through both actions and dialogue options, which effect the game world around them. 

About Us, What We Need, & What You Get

I am a New Media student at Ryerson University, and this game is to serve as my thesis project, and will be available on mobile app stores. I have hired a writer, an artist, a composer, and a game developer, though in order to make this project a more polished reality, more help is required. The funds raised through this campaign will go towards the cost of art asset creation, and thus will increase the visual quality of the game.

So what do you get for donating? 

$10

Want to Learn More?

Visit the Project Gaia process blog to get all the latest information and content updates as we work towards completion.

http://www.projectgaia.combinedesignonline.com/
