The game is heavily story driven, bordering on a novel with turn based game play mechanics, giving it a similar feeling to that of a "choose your own adventure" novel. The player is given control of a main character, and throughout the game they make many decisions, dictated through both actions and dialogue options, which effect the game world around them. 
About Us, What We Need, & What You Get
I am a New Media student at Ryerson University, and this game is to serve as my thesis project, and will be available on mobile app stores. I have hired a writer, an artist, a composer, and a game developer, though in order to make this project a more polished reality, more help is required. The funds raised through this campaign will go towards the cost of art asset creation, and thus will increase the visual quality of the game.
So what do you get for donating? 
$10
Want to Learn More?
Visit the Project Gaia process blog to get all the latest information and content updates as we work towards completion.
http://www.projectgaia.combinedesignonline.com/

story:
Short Story of Bringing a Game Store to Life

A little over a year ago my wife and I started a campaign to upgrade our tiny flea market booth into a real, community based brick-and-mortar video game store founded by gamers, for gamers. Our friends and family around the world helped us achieve our goal. The campaign ended on a higher note than we ever expected-- surpassing our financial goal! We quickly started laying the ground work to open the store, and after a few months of looking, we finally found the perfect store location nestled in the up-and-coming Lakeshore area of Jacksonville, Florida. On February 8th, 2014 we officially opened our doors, and it has been a wonderful, crazy roller coaster ride ever since. 

We started this so called "geek sanctuary" to help the community embrace their inner child and to create a safe place for learning, playing and gamer-related networking. After a little less than a year, we're already running out of room to house the weekly tournaments (Smash Bros, Starfox, Pokemon Stadium) and monthly events (Gamer Girl Night, Munchkin Demos and Cards Against Humanity rallys). We would like expand our store to include a true retro arcade and create a Cafe Nostalgia, a local quick-dining establishment catering to the needs of busy gamers and card players alike. 

Video Game Rescue, a deeply seeded, community oriented, family owned establishment has started to establish itself as "the" premier video game store of Jacksonville. But we're not happy with stopping there! It's time to take our involvement to the next level! A large space has become available next door to our current location. We have a really good offer (as well as unwavering support) from the building owner, and about half of the money needed to open the doors.

Together, we can create something unique here in Jacksonville! Let's build a retro arcade and cafe right next to Video Game Rescue for the entire gaming community to enjoy!

Imagine having a place to hold Super Smash Bros, Mario Kart 8, Starfox 64 and Pokemon Stadium tournaments. Imagine a huge area dedicated to play board and card games like Munchkin, Settlers of Catan, Pathfinders, Risk and Cards Against Humanity! Imagine a gamer-themed cafe where the barista knows your name, your order, and realizes you need to have it before your turn starts again! We are attempting to create the ULTIMATE game room and cafe, created BY gamers, FOR gamers!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have exactly half of what we estimated it would cost to open up the game room, arcade and cafe this winter. To open the doors, we will need roughly $12,000 and are asking for $6,000 in crowdfunding. That price includes demolition, build out, high performance TVs, tables, gaming inventory, food, soda machines and more.  

  • Tons of cool perks like dice-shaped stress balls and stadium cups
  • Limited edition t-shirts ONLY available by donating
  • Game Room advertisement, sponsorship and more!

The Impact

This campaign is more than just about opening a game room. Video Game Rescue is all about creating a place, a safe haven even, where gaming communities can grow and prosper. We'll finally have a place large enough to host multiple Munchkin events, Street Fighter tournaments and even host a few charity gaming events!

  • Create a safe & fun environment for gaming communities
  • Play hard to find video games or compete competitively 

Risks & Challenges

Opening a game room, arcade and cafe is risky, but very rewarding if done right. A lot of board/card shops either lack the community support, or make bad business decisions (bad location etc). We believe with our business model, and high level of community involvement, we'll be able to tap into multiple demographics and make our game room a staple of the community. The arcade will take quarters and the game room will be based on an hourly/daily rate.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Maybe you can't contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

    Here's what YOU can do:

    • SPREAD THE WORD and make some noise about our campaign (social media and word-of-mouth are our best friends)
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools. The person with the most shares at the end of this campaign will get a $100 gift certificate to our website!

    FAQs:

    - What is in a Premium Membership?

    Memberships are good for one year from date of issue. The cost is non-refundable and limited to the owner of the membership.

    Membership Coupons - The customer receives 20% off one regular priced item (including tournament fees) four times a year.

    Event Ticket - Also receive (1) event entrance per month.

    Arcade Day Pass (1) all day pass into the arcade each month.

    *Coupons cannot be combined with customer rewards or other offers

    - What does the shirt look like?


    - Can I get more than one t-shirt?

    Yes, if you would like an additional t-shirt simply donate an additional $25 for each extra t-shirt you would like

    - What does the Dice stress ball look like?

    - What does the cozy & stadium cup look like?

story:
What it is:

The Requiem is an up and coming video game in the making looking for pledges to continue and speed up production. It is an ambitious project, implementing a lot of new features.

The Requiem is about surviving the resistances in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by virus infected humans. Humanity was not unprepared however, several pockets of resistances have been set up in various towns and cities to fend off the threat and start anew. The infected are the least of your problems, your resolve will be tested by the harsh political climate of the resistances in a decimated world.

The Requiem is built in the powerful Unreal 4 Engine. It allows for both great flexibility and high quality graphics culminating into a formidable game experience.

We plan to release The Requiem for PC initially within the Pre-Alpha and Beta stages, then moving on to console release further down the pipeline development. The reason for console release being delayed until final launch is purely because we want the final launch to be fantastic, with minimal bugs; making sure we deliver the best experience possible to the players. Also at the current stage of the game, we could not afford to support console at this stage.


Faction System

Several different factions have set up after the fall of structured governments plunging the world into anarchy. Resistances may not see eye-to-eye on how the world should be restructured, or even if it should be. Beware of bandits.

Inventory and Crafting

An inventory and crafting system will assure that you can make use of various objects found around the world. It will allow you to repair any broken items, or build new ones altogether.

Bartering

With currency devalued, the only way for you to trade is with possessions. The age old system of bartering assures that some kind of economy still remains.

Dynamic Weather System

A realistic weather system will assure an environment with a constantly changing weather climate.

Notoriety

We want your decisions to have proper impact. Your decisions will affect how you are viewed by the different factions in the game. Traders will also be affected by your decisions, whether it is their stock or their price.

Favour System

Since The Requiem is set in a post-apocalyptic setting, the lack of tradable goods can impede on your progress and negatively impact your chances of survival. Luckily, some of the citizens of the new world might be willing to negotiate with favours instead of items.

Vehicles

Although the number of working vehicles has drastically decreased, the general rule is the vehicle is mechanically intact and has fuel, you can drive it.

Weapons

We want to provide you with an experience unlike any other, we plan to implement over 100 different usable weapons.

Your impact:

Development

The development of the game will be the main expenditure, it will allow us to work on the game full time. At the moment, the team on board fund themselves and want to take the project to a new level, where we can take on more developers to speed everything up. The pledges will be invested into the game within several different categories.

Design

The game does not only need to be functional, but also visually stunning. It is very important to us to provide you with high quality textures for both the environment and objects.

Audio

To assure that we can provide the highest quality game, an important factor is the audio. Whether it is ambient sounds or NPC communication. Your pledge will help us invest in proper tools and software to produce quality sound.

Software

A big expenditure will be software. A plethora of tools are required to make a high quality game, ranging from the game engine to design tools that help us populate the world with wonders.

Detail

Polishing is also a very important aspect. This means that attention to fine detail will be necessary. This also includes testing.

Hosting

Hosting can get quite expensive after a while, but with your help we can keep the boat afloat.

Rent and food

Your pledges will also bring us food to the table so that we may keep working full-time in providing you a quality game.

New Staff

We have most of the bases of the game covered, but we'd really like to bring some more staff on board to speed things up and add some quality features.

Milestones:

We really want to add all these features, but with your funding, we can make them happen a lot sooner.

£25k- Single Player campaign

Donations will go a long way into providing a feature length game (150 hours) with a gripping and original plot in The Requiem's harsh world environment. The story will force you to make decisions that will change the path you are on, sometimes quickly. We want to make a realistic and engaging plot that keeps you hooked for the whole plot.

£50k- Multi-Player Zombie Arena

So we basically want to create a multiplayer arena with one team against another, except there are also NPC zombies within the maps (which have environmental dangers), who will try and kill you too. Want to take someone out with a loud shotgun? Be careful of the zombie horde that will chase you afterwards!

£100k- MMORPG

We want to release an MMORPG that uses the huge landscape of the singleplayer and patch it together. With leveling, daily quests, clans and skills, it will be interactive and stimulating- unlike other MMORPGs on the market in the same genre.

£250k- Console release!

With a large amount of funding, we would be able to release the game on Xbox and Playstation. We are already in talks with distributors, who are really interested in shipping the product to stores such as Game. 

Help us make this ambitious, awesome project happen

At the end of the day we want to create this game for the people. Our goal is to build a long lasting community which will work with us to expand the game as a whole, both concept wise and game play wise.

story:
Summary

Hello, Friends. My name is Jeff Sorenson, and I’ve produced a game for country music fans that requires actual human interaction.

So You Think You’re Right: Classic Country Music Trivia is the perfect game for a gathering of family or friends to enjoy some time around a table in good natured fun…

A throw-back to the good ole days? Maybe. But in the fast paced world, is that such a bad thing? I think it’s just what the doctor ordered!

It’s taken me three years of working with a small team of amazingly talented, creative peeps, to make this game a tangible, playable, challenging, entertainment reality….but I've taken this project as far as I can by myself.

I need your help. I know I’m asking for a lot of money. $150,000 is a lot of pocket change, but I've done my homework, and that’s the amount of money it will take to make this entity a success. If you watched my video, then you know that 25% of American music lovers call themselves country music fans.

That’s a potential market of 54,000,000 people…Wow…that’s a lot of zeroes!

I know what you’re thinking. How many of those 54-million people will invest in a board game? Isn't this a digital age? Well…you might be surprised to learn that board games are becoming cool again! Statistics show we’re in a board game Renaissance. While sales of board games of the past are seeing a slight decline, every year for the past ten years NEW board game sales have increased 10-20%. Americans are becoming social again!

First let me explain my game to you in a little more detail; Then I’ll show you where your money will go as we make So You Think You’re Right a country music lover’s "must-have game".

THE GAME

Anyone can play this game. There is only ONE requirement to participate: You must like country music!

It doesn't matter how long you've been a country fan. That’s part of the fun. We've included questions in this game that even country newbies can answer, and when you come across a more challenging question, you’ll learn some really cool country music facts that made this genre of music America’s Music!

So You Think You’re Right: Classic Country Music Trivia is a trivia game that tests your knowledge about country music artists and songs. The graphics were designed by Jerry Palmer, a one-time art director for the TV show Hee Haw, and to make it even more fun, each square on the colorful, top quality board has a significance to country music. 

Try to figure out what each square symbolizes. For example what song does this square bring to mind? 

How about All My Exes Live in Texas? 


Or this square?



Could those be John Conlee’s rose colored glasses?

The game is designed for 2-4 individual players, or for 2-4 groups. Players answer trivia questions--- mostly from multiple choice and true or false options…HOWEVER this game gives ample opportunity for ALL of the players to be invested.

As the pieces move around the board. family and friends actively engage even when it’s another player’s turn. This group participation makes So You Think You’re Right? a wonderful social medium… created to encourage laughter, social interaction and bonding. 

Winner of the game is the first player to make it back to start.

GAME COMPONENTS

game board

4 game pieces

3 sets of playing cards:


Classic Country Trivia Card


Feeling Lucky Card


The Judge Says Card


Examples of The Judge Says Card:

Defense Attorney is calling her next set of witnesses. If you can list the first names of all four Oak Ridge Boys, move ahead 4 spaces.

You’re the reason Our kids are ugly.  Move back two spaces.

If you can tell the judge how many beats a waltz has,  move forward that many spaces.

Plead your case to the jury. Tell the other players How much you love country music. If they believe you, move ahead one space. In case of hung jury, stay where you are.

Judge convicts you of arson. Sing the first two lines of the chorus to The Fireman or head directly to The Crowbar Hotel.

PLEASE HELP / NEED FUNDING

I’ve invested years of my time and money to create this game. I could have asked for help earlier, but I wanted to wait for the RIGHT time to present my dream to the world. That time is NOW. 

The game itself is not simply an idea in my head. It’s an actual thing you can hold… well thought out…creative…smart…fun.

So You Think You’re Right? is ready for mass production. The money we collect will be used In the following ways:

1. Product production of the game in The United States

2. Update our website

3. Production of a :30 TV spot and an ad for print

4. Tiered media campaign involving radio, print and television targeted specifically to media frequented by country music fans. This ain’t cheap, folks, but it’s a necessity for this product to be successful.

The games themselves can be manufactured in less than two weeks…and we've spoken to all media and know their advertising rates and schedules. We hope to be up and rolling by the end of October, so we can capitalize on Christmas sales.

Here is a graph proportioning the amounts designated to bring this game home.


FUTURE PLANS

The production of this game is Phase One of a multi-phase marketing plan.

Phase Two involves the creation of the So You Think You’re Right? Game App… So you can play our game anytime, anywhere. We are working on this phase now.

Phase Three is the production of the So You Think You’re Right? 30-minute

Game show for television and the internet.

And Phase Four is the creation of additional So You Think You’re Right? board games: Classic Rock and sports additions.

BBEC

Seven years ago, I became one of the founders of the BBEC (Baby Boomer’s Entertainment Corporation). I started this organization because I realized that baby boomers make up 25% of America's population, yet control 75% of its wealth.  While most corporations produce entertainment for younger generations, the fact is that the baby boomers (born post WWII 1946-1964) outspend other generations by an estimated 400 billion dollars per year in consumer goods, services and entertainment.  I created BBEC to deliver family friendly entertainment to that under-served baby boomer market.

THANK YOU!

Thank you for watching my video and for reading this proposal. I appreciate your time and consideration more than you could possibly know.

As a token of my gratitude, I’d like to give you a gift for each donation as listed under the PERKS section to your right.

Every dollar you give is important to this project’s success. But with each dollar given, I also see a belief in me and my vision to bring back social interaction.

For that belief, I am eternally grateful.

first names of all four Oak Ridge
Boys, move ahead 4 spaces.



You’re the reason Our kids are ugly.  Move back two spaces.

If you can tell the
judge how many beats a waltz
has,  move forward that many
spaces.

Plead your case to the
jury. Tell the other players How much you love
country music. If they believe you, move ahead one space. In case of hung jury,
stay where you are.

Judge convicts you of
arson. Sing the first two
lines of the chorus to The
Fireman or head directly to The
Crowbar Hotel.













PLEASE
HELP / NEED FUNDING

I’ve invested years of
my time and money to create this game. I could have asked for
help earlier, but I wanted to wait for
the RIGHT time to present my dream to the
world. That time is NOW. 
The game itself is not
simply an idea in my head. It’s an actual thing you
can hold… well thought
out…creative…smart…fun.
So You Think You’re
Right? is ready for mass production. The money we collect will
be used In the following ways:1. Product production
	of the game in The United States2. Update our website3. Production of a :30
	TV spot and an ad for print4. Tiered media campaign
	involving radio, print and television targeted specifically to media
	frequented by country music fans.  This ain’t cheap, folks, but
	it’s a necessity for this product to be successful.




The games themselves can
be manufactured in less than two weeks…and we've spoken to all
media and know their advertising rates and schedules.  We hope to be
up and rolling by the end of October, so we can capitalize on
Christmas sales.

Here is a graph
proportioning the amounts designated to bring this game home.






FUTURE
PLANS

The production of this
game is Phase One of a multi-phase marketing
plan.

Phase Two
involves the creation of the So You Think You’re
Right? Game App… So you can play our game
anytime, anywhere. We are working on this
phase now.

Phase Three
is the production of the So You Think You’re
Right? 30-minute
Game show for television
and the internet.And Phase
Four is the creation of additional So You Think You’re
Right? board games: Classic Rock and sports
additions.
BBEC

Seven years ago, I became
one of the founders of the BBEC (Baby Boomer’s Entertainment
Corporation).  I started this organization because I realized that baby boomers make up 25% of America's population, yet control 75% of its wealth.  While most corporations produce entertainment for younger generations, the fact is that the baby boomers (born post WWII 1946-1964) outspend other generations by an estimated 400 billion dollars per year in consumer goods, services and entertainment.  I created BBEC to deliver family friendly entertainment to that under-served baby boomer market.



























THANK
YOU!

Thank you for watching my
video and for reading this
proposal. I appreciate your time and
consideration more than you could
possibly know.
As a token of my
gratitude, I’d like to give you a
gift for each donation as listed under
the PERKS section to your right.
Every dollar you give is
important to this project’s
success. But with each dollar
given, I also see a belief in me and my vision to
bring back social interaction.
For that belief, I am
eternally grateful.

story:
HALFLING?¡ Are you Sure?¡¡

They seem as imperial human players from a distance. But not so tall...

Nice armor by the way... hope it will do more resistant.

 

 

About us

 

 

Willy Miniatures is a small company producing high quality miniatures for fantasy football and other miniature games. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams. To achieve this we always work with the most talented sculptors.

You can see our full catalogue and contact us here

http://willy-miniatures.blogspot.com.es/

You can see our succeed Chaos Campaign

http://igg.me/p/281384/x/2362463

 

 

 

Why crowdfunding... again?

we had an amazing experience with our late campaign, shorten the time to cast former team in a incredible way. So we could go on producing some miniatures at a time, but with your help we can speed up the whole process again. Using Indiegogo as a platform to rise funds helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures, obtain feedback from our customers and it gives us confidence to keep working on.

we are running two different halfling campaigns, so you can choose the one you like most

igg.me/at/WMultimatehalfling

 

 

IMPERIAL TEAM


This team will be casted on metal.

 

 

 PLEDGES

REWARDS



 

 Size comparison

Estimated delivery: Mid November 2013 (except LEVEL 11 which depends on the painter)

 

chech our other campaign if you like halflings a lot
http://igg.me/at/WMultimatehalfing/x/1791030

story:
Dark's Story

Our Dear Friend Darklessv has been sitting on the sidelines as all his friends are playing those vidya games with next level ear speakers with hq microphones . all he wants is to is play the vidya games with out having to adjust the string tied between the tin can and his computer. Lets all pull together and get the po mo'fo some heads sets.

And that's why we're here our goal is to raise 200 paper moneys to buy him his first legit set of head sets. a brand new set of Steel Series: Siberia Elites.

What we need

All we need is 200 dollars to buy him his first legit set of headsets. a brand new set of Steel Series: Siberia Elites nothing more nothing less !
but the minimum campaign goal is a required 500 dollars . We set it up to flexible funding so we don't have to reach 500 in 30 days.
This is a quest for an individual so there will be no pledge reward but a nice firm pat on the back and a warm feeling in side for helping a gamer.
If we dont reach the goal the money will be set aside and saved till we can raise the intended amount.
Should we reach 200+ we will donate the remainder to the Child's Play charity organization http://www.childsplaycharity.org/

    Risks & Challenges

    many of you will see this and think this is some grade A BS! but a little goes a long way and every little bit helps .

    And that's all there is to it.

story:
WHO we are, WHERE we're going and WHAT we're all about: 

My name is Autumn and I'm a 17-year-old senior living in the greater Atlanta area.  My church, Mount Paran Church of God (come out and see us!), hosts a number of short term and long term mission trips.  The missions cater to people in need all around the world from every continent excluding Antarctica (We're working on it penguins!).  Our youth group supports an annual short term mission trip to Bolivia, reserved specifically for teenagers in grades 9 through 12.  Our youth pastor along with a number of adult leaders take a group of approximately 25-30 high schoolers to build (wells, houses, sheds, fences, playgrounds, etc.), cook/serve food, make long-lasting friendships and ultimately spread God's love with Bolivian children and teens our own age. 

While in Bolivia, we'll team up with local pastors in charge of Operation Restoration (http://www.ywambolivia.org.uk/).  This organization was created in 1991 with one mission: "to show God's love in a practical way, encouraging children and teenagers between 8 and 18 years of age to leave the streets".  Operation Restoration is dedicated to empowering, educating and influencing youth to live a life they never imagined for themselves. 


Making a DIFFERENCE: 

We're seeking $5000 to assist in the cost of airfare, building materials (wood, nails, etc.), food, clothes and gifts for the boys and girls.


PAYING IT FORWARD. What you give and what you get:

What comes around goes around!


1. Keeping us in your prayers and spreading the word- It's not all about the money even if we DO need it.  A big thank you goes out to you and we'll be sending you love from Bolivia!

2. $10 dollars-  Knowing that you're effort is appreciated and that great, fuzzy feeling you get after someone tells you, "you just made my day". Well, you just made my day.

3. $25 dollars-  A beautiful friendship bracelet in an assortment of yarns, strings and colors made by the Bolivian children you'll be supporting.

4. $50 dollars- A postcard/ personalized thank you note sent straight from Bolivia upon our arrival this summer.

5. $100 dollars-  A photo album of a collection of pictures taken in Bolivia this summer (late July).

6. $250 dollars-  All the perks from numbers 1-5! 


You've PRAYED, You've DONATED, NOW WHAT?:

We want everyone to know about our cause! Tweet about it, post in on Facebook, cover the web with our message! Share our mission with the world! Word of mouth can do wonders.

story:
8/29/12 We are so excited as of today we got the official word that Whoopi Goldberg has agreed to do a voice for our game! This is such great news!

Telgara: Karta's Guardians will be a free to play game from the start. There will be no subscription fee or cost to download the client. We will introduce a cross platform media expeirence that will allow you to play aspects of the game on your iPads, smartphone and yes even facebook.

This will be a 3D sandbox MMORPG with some great looking graphics as you can see from the concept art video in the gallery. We are designing a game that will put you in control of your environment. You will be able to:

  1. Develop land for housing, farming and even mining.
  2. Build houses, farms, gardens, guild towns, and even larger cities.
  3. Create your own quests for others to follow. So you can build your own story line if you want, or just have others do work for you, like mining or farming or even building you a house via a quest.
  4. You will be able to harvest genetic material and add it to your current avatar build. Want some dragon wings? I know you do! I know I do! So go kill a dragon, harvest DNA, take it to a genetic scientiest in town and have him build you a pair of wings you can then add to your avatar.
  5. Guild systems will be 100% complete at launch. You will be able to run your own guild, build a guild town, have a guild bank and even go to war or make an alliance with other guilds. It is all up to you.
  6. Unlimited levels as you grow, so will the game.
  7. No standard classes. You will be able to build your own class.
  8. Secret Societies to join and each will have special abilities you can select.

Funding Tiers:

$55,000 - Tech Demo -  A fully playable hero engine game with: account management, character creation, a virtual world server, multiple simultaneously connected clients, quests, basic combat, and player communications - meant for only a few players at a time to show investors, and donors at specific reward levels, not open to the public. Est. completion time is 4 months after funding.

$100,000 - Tech Demo + Additional Content  of 6 new character concepts, modeled and animated; 2 areas concepted and modeled (Town and Dungeon), investor and donor reward access. Not open to the public. Est. completion time is 5 months after funding.

$150,000 - Prototype - Tech Demo + the following:

  • Bosses
  • Shops
  • Basic Skill Tree
  • Custom UI

Investor and donor reward access. Not open to the public. Est. completion time is 8 months after funding.

Partnerships:

Hero Engine:

 
We are very excited to announce that we have chosen to use the hero Engine. Using the Hero Engine will allow us to complete the game faster. Some teams have been able to produce full MMORPGs in less than 15 months with Hero engine. Its Hero Cloud is going to cut our server costs and allow us to scale quickly. Size of office space and equipment will be reduced due to Hero Cloud. Hero Cloud will even reduce the cost and expense of all the back end aspects of the game. They have even agreed to help us get our distribution partnerships together and working. All this allows us to focus on creating more content in less time! Larger game publishers like Pitch Black, Bioware and Zenimax are all either looking at or using Hero Engine, so why shouldn't we!

Pure Bang Games:

Pure Bang Games is a game development studio focused primarily on creating awesome mobile and social games in Baltimore, MD. Led by ex-Bethesda Softworks producer, Benjamin Walsh, their passionate and highly skilled team has a variety of talents that can be applied to game development, website creation, animation, and appplication development.
 
They lend industry experience to the project and have been helpful in refining the vision and producing content for Telgara: Karta's Guardians.

About the Creator:

Check out this Article on Polygon:
Debunked: The strange ride of a millionaire game developer
 

Ellwood "Bunky" Bartlett, CEO and Founder. For the majority of his life Bunky has been a gamer, who has loved and played almost every RPG game out there. His passion as a teen was for D&D. He would play it almost every weekend with friends.  He has played and still does play countless RPGs, MMOs and other games on a daily basis. His current game list includes, but is not limited to WoW, Rift, SW:TOR, Tera, and soon Guildwars 2. He finds gaming very relaxing. He is still seeking, like many other gamers for a good MMO and shares in their disappointments. The search is what has led him to create Telgara: Karta’s Guardians. He has been writing the story of Telgara for over 5 years now. His passion for gaming, his story telling skills and his knowledge of occult studies and secret societies puts him in a perfect position to help guide his team to creating a great game. In order to bring his game to life he has contracted Pure Bang Games to create art assets for the game and  help with the design and programing.

story:
Updates:

04/21/2014 "Punny, Fancy Animals" set designs are finished (here)

05/24/2014 "Punny, Fancy Animals" set digitized and ready for printing (here and below)

06/03/2014 I've decided to put together a giveaway for those who've contributed to this campaign. (: If you're interested in what's in the giveaway, please check out the video below.


My Puns and I

My name is Julia Fang and ever since I was five, I’ve always been fascinated in creating greeting cards. Throughout high school, I made and drew most of the birthday cards, congratulations cards, New Year cards, Christmas cards, and etc to friends and family. I loved the personal feel to them and I loved how some of them had clever things to say on them.

It’s been a dream of mine to have a shop of my own just selling cards that give the charming small antidotes to people for any occasion. I love puns. I love painting. I love greeting cards. So I thought, why not combine it and become a part of that personal experience that people share with each other?

What Is Needed & What You Get

I'm going to be a vendor in this year's DesignerCon in Pasadena, California. It's my first time being a vendor in any type of convention setting and I am absolutely excited about this opportunity, but I do need your help. This campaign's goal is to get $1000 for me to start the line of greeting cards that I want to create for people.

I'm seeking funding for the printing, the blank cardstock cards, proper photography and all of this enough for designed sets of greeting cards for the Designer Convention at the end of the year, and to start the line in general for the brand I want to create.

I will create two series by the end of the period of time this certain cause ends of greeting cards to start out for now to pursue my dreams, and actually one of the ideas I have is already completed: Punny Love Set

Here is the idea for the phrases of the second set. There are more sets that I’d like to create, but I decided to start with two for now. If you want to see the updates on how the "Punny, Funny Animals" set is going, please follow on Facebook here. I will also update pictures and links to them as the campaign goes. (:

Punny, Fancy Animals Set:

Whale hello there, friend.

Owl always be your friend.

Let minnow when you're free!

I'm quite fawned of you!

Pardon me, you're just salmon-chanting.

PERKS

You can choose to be given perks!

Choosing from "Punny Love" set (Perk Amount $5)


Choosing from the 3 original postcard prints (Perk Amounts $20, $35, $50)

Choosing from the 3 original T-shirt designs (Perk Amounts $75, $100, $150)

Shirts are printed on 100% cotton men/unisex H&M white t-shirts.
Available in sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (will update if a size runs out)
Even though shirts are unisex, it is strongly suggested that women order one size smaller.

H&M Size Chart:
http://www.hm.com/us/sizeguide?show=sizeguide_men

When will I receive my perks?

If you have put in money for the campaign, and are wondering when you will be receiving your perks, I will start sending them out when the campaign is drawing to a close near July2014. I will update this as the end of the campaign is nearer in the future.

What will you do with extra funds?

$1200 – If this campaign reaches to this amount, I will be able to work and release the third greeting card set more quickly, and they will for sure be released and sold at DesignerCon.

Anything over is just an amount that I haven’t even been able to plan out as of now, but believe me that I will continue to be creating more and more pieces. There will be more cards and more shirts as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds to contribute to this goal, don't fret. Please share this campaign on your social medias with the Indiegogo share tools! 

If you are interested to see the journey of this project to the end (DesignerCon in November) if just interested to see my journey with art, feel free to follow me on my social medias listed below!

Facebook: colourmoichic

Twitter: @colourmoichic

Instagram: colourmoichic

YouTube: colourmoichic


Thank you for your time! Smile today!

$1200 – If this campaign reaches to this amount, I will be
able to work and release the third greeting card set more quickly, and they
will for sure be released and sold at DesignerCon. 
Anything over is just an amount that I haven’t even been
able to plan out as of now, but believe me that I will continue to be creating
more and more pieces. There will be more cards and more shirts as well.
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you don't have the funds to contribute to this goal, don't fret. Please share this campaign on your social medias with the Indiegogo share tools! If you are interested to see the journey of this project to the end (DesignerCon in November) if just interested to see my journey with art, feel free to follow me on my social medias listed below!Facebook: colourmoichicTwitter: @colourmoichicInstagram: colourmoichicYouTube: colourmoichicThank you for your time! Smile today!

story:
Thanks for tuning into this project.  I created a company called Wholebitmedia as a springboard for animated and interactive projects I feel are long overdue.  Let me tell you more about Genedyne and why I accepted the challenge of making the best mech game!  Feel free to visit my homepage for more info.

Origins of GENEDYNE

I've always enjoyed playing old school 2D side scrolling games be it on Nintendo, Sega, PC, or even on a little known unit called a TurboGraphics 16. Even in my spare time I still work out my frustrations on my Sega Genesis. I've always had a vivid imagination and see the squarelike pixels on the screen as fully realized ideas just waiting for someone to render with a pencil or a pc. I also liked how easy it was to learn how to control the 2D rendered characters on screen.

As someone who likes video games and has spent the better part of my time rendering among other things, GIANT ROBOTS! I've always waited and wanted to see publishers release a game that was as easy to control as the old style 2D games, and as fun to watch as a 3D simulation of a mech battle might be. Thats why Ive started this project and hope you'll be exited enough to contribute ideas and capitol towards its completion. So spread the word!

Thus far, I've contributed code, models, animations, and many years of research concerning the design of different styles of mech robots, transformable and non towards this project. 

 Working with the demo of the Unity Game Engine Technology has been a wonderful tool for learning how to create games, yet this is an area where I must bow to the skills of those who are able to setup networks, manage physics, and some types of artificial intelligence. 


 The ultimate goal will be to setup Genedyne as an online community where users can easily log in, create, compare, and contest the efficiency of their mech designs over the network in various contests of skill.

What We Need & What You Get

As a provision for the further completion of this project into a beta testing phase I am attempting to secure almost 120K. These funds will go towards the the payment of the talented folks whom I know should have the skills to fill in the gaps aforementioned.

 I will also use these funds to secure publishing and software licenses.  I will also be working with virtual and networking  technologies that will assist in making sure this game has a chance at being the best mech based game EVER created.

 Other publishing and promotional materials  will help facilitate that goal and the distribution of your products will need to be allowed for. Additionally, my aim is to bring in some new artists, musician(s), and animators to help design this game.  


Some Points of Gameplay or Strategy

  • different user modes(training, versus, rhythm, random scenario, geography) 
  • mecha style selection/variation(drone, experimental, classic, military, SWAT...)
  • AI programming and placement in geography mode against AI or user(s)
  • Mortal Combat style close combat key combos(swordplay, fighting, blocking)
  • mech control sensitivity (speed, weight, power, surplus...)
  • user transformation into different avatars during combat
  • special power up abilities in some modes(extend health, timed invisibility...)
  • corporate bounty and extension of empire in geography mode  
  • use of radar, heds up, and power gages(armor + surplus)
  • switching to a different mech and having their AI reflect the skill of users


The Perks

In order to be fair to the people who contribute the most my aim is to achieve at least half of my funding goal.  This will allow me to give those people their rewards.  At that stage I can guarantee at least working beta with the possibility of a multiplayer mode.  This does not mean that if you contribute at a lower tier you will not receive your reward, but I do want us to try to honor those who helped us in this way to make this game a reality.

Read the rewards section carefully to know what is included.
Use this e-mail for any questions you have regarding your rewards: 
wholebitmedia@gmail.com

Included:

the percolator will explain breifly what you get and what look for on what level:


Some nice perks are included for those who contribute, take a look!
  • electronic and hard copy Genedyne publications
  • electronic and hard copy music soundtracks
  • official Genedyne t-shirt
  • finished Genedyne game for your PC
  • signed drawing of you depicted as a "mecha"

  • possible credit on a licensed version for PS4, Nintendo, or X-BOX
  • special game modes allowing you to create AI for other users
  • extended resources in a free for all geographic level(darwin mode)
  • 3D prints of your personal mech customization from the selector 
  • a visible production credit on the official release

Thanks!!!

The Impact

After watching the video I'm sure it's obvious that I'm interested in a different kind of game. A game that doesn't suppose that violence is a way of appreciation of a good gaming experience. I look forward to the development of something that truly challenges the mind to be versatile in its thinking beyond a simple us versus them scheme. An experience that encourages teamwork, time and credit management. It will allow those who would not otherwise enter into a complex task such as designing and piloting a mech to easily choose options towards that goal. As you can see, I've already successfully created a demo which some of you viewed/played ect. Now it's time to build a team and go into BETA mode with focus on creating the best Mech Based Game to date!


    Risks & Challenges

    Team Members-some team members who agree to contribute designs or code may have conflicting schedules which result in a delay of the goal of a working beta in a year's time.

    Levels, Physics, and Multiplay- these features and their qualities depend directly on the percentage of the funding goal that is reached or exceeded by funding contributions.

    Reward Delivery-some items(specifically digital publications, music, and newsletters) are subject to delays until deemed complete and of satisfactory quality by the composer(s) of that content. This may be due to a need for pretesting of game features for effective synchronicity.

    Distribution-Delivery of digital and physical items specified within your level of contribution are dependent on the correct information being given to us electronically or verbally by the contributor.

    Quality-In general the overall quality of this game will depend not just on monetary contributions. Also the participation of the pilots in/on any message boards or beta testing available is crucial in a game's development. Their feedback and their ability to relay the need for this project to happen to other willing pilots within their personal networks, or via Facebook, Gooogle+ Twitter, or LinkedIn will allow the Genedyne to uncover the mysterious connection to an unseen dimensional force!


      The Team

      Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

      • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
      • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
      • If you own or publish a blog or write, you could mention seeing this today and how you like manga, cartoons, giant robots, science fiction, videogames...
      • Also contributions can take the form of free office space, donated equipment, computers, trips to the dentist ect.

      And that's all there is to it.  Thanks again for your time and patience!

      If you  want to download a minigame to look at some of the architecture on your PC or MAC visit the interactive page over at wholebitmedia dot com.

story:
WE ARE FUNDED! THANK YOU! 

The campaign is over but you can buy the game at: 

DeckAround.com


You and Your Friends Will Crack Up



Shipping

FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING! Please add $10 to your contribution if you require international shipping. We are still accepting new orders for Deck Around however we can no longer ensure delivery in time for Christmas. 

What the Deck is This? 

Heard this one before? You're having drinks with friends and everyone is on their iPhone. One person is talking about their new diet (nobody cares). 

Deck Around is here because parties need more -- more laughs, more surprise, more ridiculousness. 

  • You'll learn the game in 27 seconds
  • You'll start laughing 1 minute after that
  • Enjoy it with big groups of friends and strangers alike
  • No downtime, no waiting for turns -- no boring shit

The game is designed, thoroughly tested and I've locked down a solid supplier who can make it real! I can't offer the game at this great of a price for all of us unless we purchase a large volume of them -- so that's why I'm trying to get a big order in before Christmas with the funding here on Indiegogo. 

Want a Copy?  

The campaign is over but you can buy the game at: 

DeckAround.com



How to Play

Watch the video above to find out how to play. Here's a quick description for if you can't hear or something: 

  1. You'll get a deck full of slang terms -- words like twerking or Dutch oven -- but more obscure. You pick a random one and everyone writes a made up but convincing definition for the word and anonymously hands it in. 
  2. One person reads all the definitions aloud, including the actual definition of the word, which is randomly mixed in. 
  3. Everyone guesses which definition is the real one. They usually fall for someone else's bullshit definition. 

What's in the Box

The full game has everything you need to Deck Around:

  • 106 rounds of gameplay in a deck of cards -- that’s a big deck!
  • 400 sheets of answer paper, and after that, you’re on your own
  • 6 mini pencils I stole from a public golf course
  • 1 sexy shrink wrapped box with instructions
  • 0 dice, game boards or little plastic houses

If you back the game right here, you're poised to get some great stuff: 

  • Incredible pricing that includes shipping
  • A bonus set of a half-dozen words, exclusive to Indiegogo
  • A PDF you can instantly download, print then and play at home
  • Get your name (or Twitter handle) printed on a card in every box
  • Finish your holiday shopping all in one great deal with 4 copies of Deck Around
  • Create your own word that officially becomes part of the game
  • Print any 5 words you want on every single box

Get it Out There

This game won't make it without your help spreading the word:

  • Join the email list: deckaround.com
  • Email this page to a friend who likes party games
  • Post it on Facebook
  • Tweet it out

Ready to Deck Around?  

The campaign is over but you can buy the game at: 

DeckAround.com

story:
Bumblings -  the funtasy card game is an entertaining card game featuring comic fantasy creatures, funny names, great illustrations and and a lot of unexpected events during the exciting battles. Bumblings is almost ready to be released to public, but we need the funding of our generous backers to begin printing starter decks and the unique dice that’s made specifically for Bumblings.

If we could reach the final goal of our project, we would sell the first decks in summer or even sooner. According to our current plans, we will sell starter packs for 20$ but this price may be cheaper if we collect enough donations. Please, check out the rewards we offer for your support, and help us this game started!

 

The primary and biggest expenses, we need your help for, are printing costs of cards and ordering costs of special dice. Both cards and dice are cheaper in bigger amount, so we’d like to print as many as we possibly can. That’s why we will be able to sell the decks cheaper if we raise enough money: the more donation we get, the less we will charge for the decks! 

Of course, we have other expenses about Bumblings - the funtasy card game: advertising the project and the game, running the website, hiring guest artists and so on. These bills have been paid so far by our staff -  we hope you will find this project as promising as they do.

 

In March of 2012, a little team of enthusiastic young men - fans of trading card games (TCG) and the world of fantasy - decided to make an own fantasy TCG. These young men were us.
While we tried to make up the background story, made up a lot of funny stories and characters based on fantasy. We loved the idea of creating a funny fantasy (or funtasy) card game, which would be a great entertainment for everyone all over the world. We sincereley hope we’ve managed to do that.

 

Bumblings - the funtasy card game is a trading card game with common fantasy creatures in funny situations. Beside the creative names, Mauro Delli Bovi’s fantastic illustrations guarantee the comic feeling of the game.
Two special feature have to mentioned about Bumblings: icons and dice. 


First of all, there are no texts on the cards, except the names. We use simple and clear icons to express the type, cost, ability and other attributes of the card. This is very important, becuse players don’t need foreign language knowledge to play Bumblings, it’s understandable for everybody, it doesn’t matter where they live. 


Secondly, there are no starter and permanent resources (e.g. card drawing at the beginning of each turn): special dice decide about the resource the player can get. These dice are specifically made for Bumblings in order that players have a good time.

For detailed rules check the “How to play” section of our website (www.bumblings.net).

 

We would like to make a special playset that would include the four different starter decks, three special dice and a Rules of play book.

After starter decks are released, we’ll immediately begin making the expansions with brand new cards. As it is a trading card game, we’re also planning collector album and championship to please the fans of this kind of card games.

We also want more types of dice, because selecting the appropriate dice will make deck building more exciting.

And in the farther future we’d like to create the online version of Bumblings, but now it’s still just an idea (nevertheless we hope we will able to put it through).

1. What’s happenning if we don’t reach our goal?

Everybody, who ordered Starter packs and/or dice, will get their order even if we cannot reach the goal of the campaign. In this case, however, it’s not sure that we will be able to keep the deadline we promised, delay (1-2 months) may occur.

2. Only from Europe can I order?

Of course, not! We can send orders to any places all over the world, but only Europian shipping fees are contained by perks.

3. How much is shipping?

Shipping is free in Europe (shipping fees are contained by prices of perks), if you would like us to send your package to a not Europian address, you have to pay the international shipping fee (it is indicated by perks).

4. Will a print ‘n’ play version be released?

Yes, soon it can be reached at our website (www. bumblings.net).

5. Where can I find a downloadable version of rules?

Downloadable (PDF) versions of rules will be available in Hungarian and English languages, German translation is in progress.

Giants, trolls, demons, goblins, orcs and the wizards, samans and witches who can control them. They are strong, frightening and unstoppable...except in the world of Bumblings, where they don't do anything the way they should do.

In the illustrations, the characters have more or less their ordinary look, but the tools, which would "help" them, aren't used properly, so they don't really work efficiently. Thanks to it, these originally terrifying creatures are found in funny situations in the pictures of the cards.

The characters, attachments and action cards of the Starter pack (Broods) are based on the cost of stamina, and characters get combat skills in exchange, especially Ranged fight icons, which make them able to cause rather serious losses for the opponents already at the beginning of the Battle.

Zombies, mummies, ghosts and the wizards, necromancers and witches who may control them. They are creepy and not afraid of death as they know it very well... however, they don't really choose the most efficient way to reach their aim, so in the world of Bumblings they are just funny like everyone else.

In the illustrations, the characters have more or less an ordinary look, but their behaviour is far from ordinary. Thanks to it, these basically scary creatures are found in ridiculous situations shown by the pictures of the cards.

The characters, attachments and action cards of the Starter pack (Damned) are based on the cost of dropping cards, and characters get stamina in exchange, which make them able to survive the Battles and heal again and again.


Have a question about the project? Discuss Bumblings - the funtasy card game at Crowdfundingforum.com!

They are strong, frightening and unstoppable...except in the world of Bumblings, where they don't do anything the way they should do. In the illustrations, the characters have more or less their ordinary look, but the tools, which would "help" them, aren't used properly, so they don't really work efficiently. Thanks to it, these originally terrifying creatures are found in funny situations in the pictures of the cards. The characters, attachments and action cards of the Starter pack (Broods) are based on the cost of stamina, and characters get combat skills in exchange, especially Ranged fight icons, which make them able to cause rather serious losses for the opponents already at the beginning of the Battle.Zombies, mummies, ghosts and the wizards, necromancers and witches who may control them. They are creepy and not afraid of death as they know it very well... however, they don't really choose the most efficient way to reach their aim, so in the world of Bumblings they are just funny like everyone else. In the illustrations, the characters have more or less an ordinary look, but their behaviour is far from ordinary. Thanks to it, these basically scary creatures are found in ridiculous situations shown by the pictures of the cards. The characters, attachments and action cards of the Starter pack (Damned) are based on the cost of dropping cards, and characters get stamina in exchange, which make them able to survive the Battles and heal again and again.

Have a question about the project? Discuss Bumblings - the funtasy card game at Crowdfundingforum.com!

story:
Far away from any known place, in a tiny wonderful archipelago ruled by a revered King, live little guys in harmony and prosperity. Made of nothing but bubblegum-bellies and wire-shaped arms and legs, this people can often be seen with various types of clothes and love chatting and getting to know new people. Forget about everything you know of relationship and embody one of those adorable fellows to take part of a joyful community. Get involved in this people’s daily life and make infrastructure grow and evolve or gather rare items that you can earn throughout your adventure.


Meet new people every day!

My main target is to provide a renewed experience of meeting people in a full imaginary world. At a time when social networks do not allow to get to meet new people anymore, I would find interesting to embody a customized character and expect to meet somebody new at any moment.

Spread tolerance over the world and learn languages!

It is no longer in doubt how the Internet can be powerful when it comes to learn a new language. Applegleam aims at merging people from different countries and making them cooperate to achieve quests together. For instance, you can be asked, as an English speaking player, to enter the Spanish realm to obtain a specific item. Unable to speak a single world of Spanish and thus unable to understand what NPCs ask you to do, you’ll require meeting Spaniards who could help you in your quest, if you can make yourself understood the best way you can…

A chatting device brought up to date

  Embodying an avatar in a virtual realm is something you were probably used to do a bunch of years ago. I would say the Internet is actually full of such websites. But social networks landed and made communication between users way more convenient. Because of this, virtual chats struggle to recover and now mostly look obsolete and boring. Applegleam aims at making this experience back and wants to emphasize what can’t be found with social networks.


Let’s talk about crowd funding. Dreaming is what makes any project come to reality, but dreams remain dreams as long as you don’t have the money to make it come true. I would say there is only a way to keep your money in your pocket and avoid to spend it in things you can make yourself for free. But there comes a time when you can’t go further and money is an essential matter you do have to face. That’s where I am, guys!

But do we have to accept a world in which only big companies with money can express themselves since they are the only ones able to make projects come true? Hell no! And that is the main power of the Internet.

The reason why I need money to keep my project alive is pretty similar to the reason why big companies need money for their games, but on a far lower scale. I would sum it up this way:

The goal I finally set is 2000$, which would allow me to make my smallest project come true. Bigger the funding will get, strongest will be everything I plan. Despite the fact 2000$ represents a lot of money, I think this goal is pretty fair and should fit to what’s essential for Applegleam.

What happens if we don't reach the goal ?

No matter how much we manage to gather, the project won't die instantaneously if we don't reach the final goal. Nevertheless, I will keep working on it with my own means. In that extent, this project would remain low budget and may struggle to become reality. Keep in mind every little coin will make Applegleam closer to its release.

What happens if we get more ?

I assume 1500€ would be a fair amount to make this project come true. But there is no doubt gathering more than the initial goal would be a significant boost for Applegleam, and would allow more features to appear in the game. Be sure this would make me the happiest man on earth !

All that stuff being said, show me that everything is possible and make me proud to make you play the game. Don’t forget that every single coin can make the difference and makes me step toward my goal.

Thanks for reading guys, the choice is now yours.

story:
Frantic Frenzy Vol.1 is a collection of 7 games hand drawn on an ipad by me, Asher Scott.

3 Mini games, 1 Small games, and 3 Big games

Not only do these games vary in size they also vary in game play.

There is everything from strategy to casual.

 

Why go with Flexible Funding?

I have all the cards ready to go, so I wanted a way to get cards to everyone that contributed to them whether the full campaign got funded or not.

 

On to the games...

 

MINI GAME LIST

Witch's Brew

2 players

15-20 min

 

What you get

12 Cards

How to play booklet

2 Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Good Witch dice

2 Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Bad Witch dice

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players try to collect the ingredients needed to make a Witch's Brew.

Players roll dice in hope of getting 4-8 to collect each ingredient.

 

 

Bombs Away 

2 Players

10-15 min

 

What you get

12 Cards

How to play booklet

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Play Mat

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players set bombs out on a grid. They then earn points by setting off those bombs and blowing up opponent's bombs. 

Players take turns placing bombs on the grid. After all 8 bombs are placed players take turns setting off bombs. Each bomb is worth points.

 

 

Elemental Dragons

2 Players

10-15 min

 

What you get

12 Cards

How to play booklet

6 Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Elemental card stands

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players pick Elemental Dragons to fight other Elemental Dragons.

Players pick one of the elements and plays it against their opponent.

 

 

 

 

SMALL GAME LIST

 

Robot Battle Arena

2 Players

20-40 min

 

What you get

48 Cards

How to play booklet

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players put robots out to battle other robots until only one player stands.

Players play cards from their hand to battle and steal cards from their opponent.

 

 

BIG GAME LIST

 

QT

2 Players

30-60 min

 

What you get

104 Cards

How to play booklet

2 20 sided dice

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players battle their way through 4 lands collecting items to help along the way.

Players pick up special cards and fight baddies through each land in hopes of staying alive until the end. 

 

Galaxy Raiders 

2-4 Players

30-60 min

 

What you get

123 Cards

How to play booklet

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

 

 

Players work together to save their solar system from attack. 

Players upgrade their ships as they fight their way through asteroids and alien ships. 

 

 

Garden Guardians 

2 Players

30-60 min

 

What you get

132 Cards

How to play booklet

4 20 sided dice

5 Gem place makers

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

 

Players work together to help a snail get home safe while fighting bugs along the way. 

Players must find and collect gnome items to be used to fight bugs that are blocking the way home. 

 

Stretch Goal 15,000

Scouts is a game that is still in the works, but I would love to see it come to life.

If the stretch goal is met I will finish Scouts and add it to the collection.

 

 

 

Scouts

2-4 Players

30-60 min

 

What you get

80-125 Cards

How to play booklet

Something Limited Edition(to be announced later)

Limited Edition Indiegogo Campaign Box

 

Players try to be the scout with the most badges at the end of the game.

 
Players collect cards to be used in tasks that will earn them scout badges.

story:
Hi, I'm Toby Turner! 

Ever since my mom's dream of me becoming a dentist fell through, I spend most of my time making youtube videos and playing video games. 

As some of you may know Tobuscus Adventures is a web-cartoon about my character, Tobuscus, and his friend Gabe (Gabuscus). We go on adventures and sometimes zombies kill us. We actually made a new episode of the show to promote this campaign ... check it out!

 

 

We Are Making a Game (with your help)!

The game will be called Tobuscus Adventures: Wizards! and in it, Tobuscus accidentally incapacitates a powerful wizard and has to take his place to defeat the Wizard of Darkness!

In the game, you cast various spells of murder doom upon the incoming zombie armada.  To cast a spell, Tobuscus must draw the spell symbol on his spellbook (which is, naturally, a touch-screen tablet. He is a modern wizard).  

This game features fun and challenging game mechanics, as well as cut-scenes animated in the style of Tobuscus Adventures.  It even has a theme song.  Crossfire the boardgame had a theme song, why shouldn't a mobile app?   Here's some concept art:

I have a few games I'd like to make in the Tobuscus Adventures universe, and we're starting with a game that I feel is both fun and can be produced and launched relatively quickly.  If we can raise the money, this game should only take about 4 months of dedicated development to get into everyone's hands!

If Tobuscus Adventures: Wizards! does well, we will immediately begin to work on a few other really exciting game ideas.  The goal is to always have a game in development forever, so there's always something new and awesome to look forward to!

Some of you may be asking yourselves ...

"Why is Toby Producing Games Now?"

It's something I've always wanted to do! I love the animated show, and if I could partner with a real game studio to make a game around the Tobuscus Adventures characters, I think we could make something that's both fun and funny.  

I get bored really easily, so trust me, this game is gonna have to be awesome!

It takes more than just an idea to create something as epic as a Tobuscus Adventures video game. There are the game developers, graphic artists, animators, voice over talent, editors ... and that's just to name a few.

We Need Your Help! 

Every penny donated (after covering the awesome donation perks, etc) will go toward the production of this, and FUTURE games. Game production will begin as soon as funds start coming in. If we're able to surpass our goal, we can start production on the next game and more Tobuscus Adventures episodes!

The more we make, the more we CAN make.The goal is to always have something in the works to give back to the Audience.

MY, MY YOU ARE KIND!

Every pledge will help make this vision become a reality. Contribute today and receive the exclusive rewards available only to those pledging through this IndieGogo campaign.

The best part about making a contribution (other than being part of a movement that completely changes everything we've ever known about gaming forever because it has a theme song.  Some of that might be an embellishment) are the rewards of course! All of our give backs are exclusive to this IndieGogo campaign. These are all things "Tobuscus" that you've never seen before and our swag was created specifically with our contributors in mind. Check out the tiers on the right for some of the cool stuff you can get if you donate.

GET MORE COOL STUFF ... SPREAD THE WORD!!!

All you have to do is share using the "Share This Campaign" link above!

During the course of the campaign, we'll be running some ongoing challenges to get your community involved.

Use the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it every where so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action.  The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes!

  • The top three referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a chance to have an animated character designed around them and will appear in an episode of Tobuscus: Animated Adventures! You will also get an invite to the game's launch party!
  • The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will earn themselves an invite to our launch party!

So, that's the deal! We're excited and we hope you are too. Thank you in advance for your support and for helping us make this vision a reality.

Bless your face. If you sneezed during this campaign, bless you. Peace Off.

$10 CONCEPT ART OF EPICOSITY!

  • You'll get a free PREMIUM version of the game on release!
  • You may also now add '-BUSCUS' to your name! Forever!!!
  • Share the ENTIRE journey with us, START to FINISH!
  • 2x a month you get updates with NEWS and CONCEPT ART from the game and animated show!
  • Exclusive BTS footage of me working with the game designers and animators!
  • PLUS we'll send you the **OFFICIAL** "I donated brains today" twitter background / fbook wall image, and desktop wallpaper!
  • A FREE "Thank You Song" digital download!

$25 POSTER OF ULTIMATE WALLIFICATION

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • DRM free downloads of Toby's next 3 songs!
  • Your name in bronze on the thank you / credits page on the game website!
  • The OFFICIAL game poster sent directly to your door
  • A digital coloring book featuring Tobuscus Adventures art!

$50 - GRYPHON MINI CRATE SPECIAL!!!

  • Get EVERYTHING in the $10 Perk...
  • The EXCLUSIVE Gryphon "I Will Pee On Everything You Love" T-shirt...
  • The Gryphon Wizard Mousepad and new Exclusive Signature mobile phone background wallpaper!
  • *NOTE* this is a special perk and is not included with any other perks.

$55 - T-SHIRT OF EXCLUSIVITY

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • "Official" campaign t-shirt
  • Two exclusive Tobuscus Adventures: Wizards slap bracelets
  • Resuable cinch bag - all care of our buddies at Loot Crate!

$85 POSTER OF SIGNIFICATION

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • Access to the BETA version of the game!
  • Re-stickable Tobuscus Adventures character decals (see below)
  • A SIGNED OFFICIAL game poster sent directly to your door (please provide address)

$100 - TOBUSCUS POSTER OF EPICOSITY

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • A brand NEW, never before sold Tobuscus poster featuring me...and Gryphon...on a mountain!

$100 - GRYPHON CRATE SPECIAL!!!

  • Get EVERYTHING in the "GRYPHON MINI CRATE"
  • The EXCLUSIVE Gryphon "I Will Pee On Everything You Love" T-shirt...
  • The Gryphon Wizard Mousepad
  • Exclusive Signature mobile bkgd wallpaper!
  • GRYPHON BRANDED DOG TREATS!
  • AN ACTUAL PAW-SIGNED GRYPHON HEADSHOT!
  • The Poster of Epicosity!
  • A brand new Wizards Duo re-stickable decal for your laptop or wall!
  • *NOTE* this is a special perk and is not included with any other perks.

 

$100 - GRYPH + BOBBLEHEAD SPECIAL!

    • ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL 11:59PM ON MONDAY 6/24/13
    • Everything in the GRYPHON CRATE SPECIAL...PLUS...
    • A brand new EXCLUSIVE Tobuscus Bobblehead only available with this perk!!!
    • *NOTE* this is a special perk and is not included with any other perks.

 

$125 - CRATE OF LOOTIFICATION

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • Signed Tobuscus Headshot
  • A Tobuscus fan crate filled with cool Tobuscus collector items!

$250 - MAKE TOBY TALK

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • A 15 second recording of me saying anything you want (that won't get me into TOO much trouble) We'll send you an mp3 file so you can send it as a gift or use it as your voicemail recording or perhaps to prank your friends!

$500 - YOU'RE IN THE PRODUCER CHAIR

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • The coveted 'PRODUCER' credit featured in the actual game.
  • You'll also get a personalized thank you Vine video from Toby, and an **EXCLUSIVE** Tobuscus Adventures hoodie!

$1,000 - LAUNCH PARTY!

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • Get an invite (+1) to the exclusive VIP game launch party! You get yourself to LA and we'll get you in to celebrate in style and awesomeness!
  • You can also get a 15 second personalized video instead of the 6 second vine from me saying whatever you want!

$5,000 - BECOME ZOMBIFICATED

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS ...
  • We'll base a game character on you so other people can kill you :)

$10,000 - BE IN THE SHOW

  • ALL OF THE PREVIOUS REWARDS...
  • Executive Producer status in the game credits and website.
  • A BTS tour at the Tobuscus, Inc Studio where you will play games with Toby AND we'll animate you for your cameo in an in-game cut scene! Get yourself to LA for the launch party and we'll give you the VIP treatment!

FAQ

Q: Will the game be free or paid?

A: Their will be 2 versions of the game. One will be free and there will be a second premium version that will be paid. Exact price of the premium game has not yet been determined but it will be in line with other games of similar awesomeness.

Q. When do we get the perks?

A: That depends on the perk AND where in the world you are. For items that require physical shipment please give us 6 - 10 weeks beyond the end of the campaign. Please note that your perks could also come a lot sooner than that.

Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?

A: We are reading every single comment so please leave your t-shirt size or any other additional information you think we should know to make sure we get you your perks :)

Q. What if I left out the shipping costs by mistake?

A. You can make an additional donation in the amount required for your perk and just notify us through the comments. We will be reading them all.

Q. Why don't I see my comment anymore?

All comments that require a response will be recorded, responded to, and hopefully resolved :) We delete them because it makes it easier to track progress.

Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

A. Yes. You can donate the additional amount to bring you up to the tier level you want. Then, you will receive everything in that tier as well as all of the tier prizes below. Leave information in the comments so we can notate it and confirm that the donation information is correct.

 

tenk you!
