story:
THE PROJECT IN A NUTSHELL:

Those evil corporations have polluted our air and water so much that our friends, family and neighbors have been turned into kleptomaniac zombies! It’s YOUR job to manage them, and to defend your home and restore the environment to save humanity both in the game and in REAL LIFE.

In the meantime, you must train your recently zombified friends and family to defend your house and gather resources in this post-apocalyptic zombie wasteland. Careful - your new neighbors are watching YOUR house for things to steal!

Here’s the kicker: All the game items you will be using to improve and defend your house have real-world coupon counterparts, so you can use them to save massive bucks on that new lamp, water filter, fridge or washing machine purchase!

CROWDSOURCING ROCKS!!

Not only are we using the power of the crowd to raise seed money through IndieGoGo, but we’re also making crowdsourcing a key part of our game. We will accept art, items, and sounds directly from players, so you can add weapons, zombies, or whatever your heart desires to the game! Plus, there will be awesome cash prizes for the top rated user-submitted items!

OUR TEAM’S STORY:

Our team members have a diverse array of backgrounds - both from Venezuela and the US. We all have very different skills: great developers, incredble artists, passionate visionaries and more. But there's one we all have in common: Our commitment to help the world and make it a better place in a FUN way!

Our team members are:

Flavia Cassani, our CEO, is serial social entrepreneur, who was born in Caracas,Venezuela. Her experience with her previous companies and her passion to help the environment are fundamental qualities to lead this project.

For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/flavia?a=847751

Carlo Cassani is our lead artist. With over 10 years of experience in the game industry as a computer graphics genius, he has been producing very acclaimed pieces of art for games published by companies such as Disney and Namco. Now is his time to go Indie and turn that art into more than just another game. This time he wants to change the world.

For more:http://www.indiegogo.com/cass1210?a=847751

Joe Lang is one of our developers. He’s from NY, currently living in California, where his about to finish his studies on Computer Sciences, specializing on video games. Joe has proven to  be  very talented developer, possess infinite imagination and a genuine love for nature that are truly admirable.

For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/heyjoelang?a=916447

Charles Van Norman, a former 9-5 zombie turned world-hungry entrepreneur, is the producer and senior developer on the project, making sure the game looks, plays, and feels right.

For more:http://www.indiegogo.com/Charles-Van-Norman?a=268686

Dr. Nadyne G. Edison, Chief Rainmaker and Partner, a serial entrepreneur from birth, holds a Ph.D in Mass Communication emphasizing the social effects of media from Michigan State University. Nadyne's diverse  career has included being Director of New Media Marketing at General Motors, launching globally all of GM's Internet sites crowned by the launch of gm.com  in 1996, as well as,  functioning in every executive level from CMO to CEO on seven start-ups in the States, Canada and the UK..  She brings enormous experience, start-up knowledge. relationships, and great humor!!

Eva Markiewicz is our current operations master and engineering creative. With a background on mechanical engineering, she’s the mastermind behind all real life functionality of the game and its accuracy on environmental content.

For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/flavia?a=847751

Dave Arendash, our amazing Adviser, is a programming veteran and helps tutor our coding team on how exactly to make things work without too much pain.

For more:  http://www.indiegogo.com/DaveArendash?a=977655



WHY ARE WE IN AMERICA??

Chavez of Venezuela, A.K.A. Captain Killjoy, forced our heroic company to be established in the United States. You see, in Venezuela, video games, fun, and smiles are banned and punishable by stern looks, jail time, or death.  That’s why we now operate in the Land of the free and Home of the brave - where the pursuit of happiness is much more than a distant dream - it’s a right.


Chavez is a corrupt and violent dictator.  Besides handing out guns on the street to kids - he has ironically made violent video games illegal.  Sound too ridiculous to be true?  Check out this article:

http://www.globalpost.com/dispatch/venezuela/091120/violent-video-game-ban

 

WHO HELPED US WITH THE VIDEO:

MORF is a creative/video studio based in Venezuela and we have a very close partnership with their studio - in fact, we worked closely with them on the IndieGoGo video.  We plan to continue creating videos with them that capture the story behind the game.  We may even merge the studios in the next couple of years if the game really takes off!  Gerardo, Pericles, Alvaro, and Armando all appeared in the IndieGoGo video.  

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

For the past nine months, we have been pouring our blood, sweat, and tears...along with our personal savings into the project because we believe in the vision.

For the past few months we’ve been hunting for funding and have approached numerous funds, VCs, and publishers and we keep getting the same story - “we love the game, but aren’t crazy about the environmental part of the business plan”.  Well - the problem is that we are crazy about the environmental part of the business plan - we’re crazy in love with it!  We have two core reasons for doing this: first, we want to make a super entertaining 3D game for everyone to enjoy; and second, we want to create a new way for people to help others live greener lives.  VCs and publishers haven’t seen the light yet - they can’t see how popular and awesome a game like this will be - so help us show them that people want a fun game that also helps save the planet.  And just to be clear - in case you are a VC - we have nothing against accepting capital from a VC - we just don’t want to compromise our vision.  So if you’re a VC that gets it - give us a call!

WHAT WE NEED?

We need $50,000 to finish our game.  We’ve been bootstrapping the game for the past nine months and we’re running out of our personal savings.  We will not spend a single dime we raise frivolously - we’re going to put the bulk of it towards sustaining our artists, developers, and game designers.  The rest will go towards caffeine and servers.

WHY YOU SHOULD BECOME A PART OF THIS:

  1. First of all - we are offering some really awesome rewards - check out the full details below.

 

  1. Second, with pollution, destruction of nature, and climate change wreaking havoc on the world - we need people to be more aware of the problems facing the environment and what they can do about them, but we need a FUN way to confront them. We can have fun and safe the world at the same time!

 

  1. Third, in a world in crisis with a recession the likes no ones has ever seen before, entrepreneurs creating companies leads to more growth, more jobs, and a better life for everyone.

 

  1. Fourth, it’s really obvious, but we’re including it anyway - you’ll have an awesome game to play!

 

  1. Fifth, show the publishers and the rest of the world how the gaming community is not just a bunch of passive escapist kids, but a fully committed community of people who can save the world while having massive fun.

 

  1. Sixth, show Chavez that he can’t stop a dream.

     

SHARE, LIKE US, FOLLOW US!!

 

Share Our Story:

http://www.indiegogo.com/kleptomaniaczombies

Like Us:

http://www.facebook.com/myneighborthezombie

 

Follow Us:

http://twitter.com/gamespecies

 

Our Blog/Website:

www.myneighborthezombie.com

 

THANK YOU!!!

Thank you so much for your support - you are the only reason we’re going to be able to move this forward without compromising our vision.







Description of Perks!!!!

We have a lot of exciting rewards - there is something for everyone!

A) For $1:

- Your name on the honor role, plus a url to your personal website or company website onwww.myneighborthezombie.com


B) For $5:

- All of the above, PLUS...

- Desktop Wallpaper Background Pack, which will be delivered in digital form




C) For $25:  

-  All of the above, PLUS...

-  A set of paper zombies designed by our world-class artist Carlo Cassani.  We will send you the paper zombies in a .pdf for you to print out and assemble.  We will also record a how-to video and send you a link.  Check out how awesome these look - great gift for your kids or those of us who refuse to grow up!

- We’ll digitally send you a set of tattoos that you can print out on a laser printer by purchasing some special tattoo paper.  You’ll have to buy some special tattoo paper, but it’s cheap - $1 per sheet.  And you’ll need access to a laser printer - kinkos should be able to help.




D)  For $50: Bumper Sticker!!!

- A through C, PLUS...

- Your choice of 1 of several stickers (bumper sticker, oval-shaped sticker - great for your car or bike!)










E)  For $75: Zombie Makeup DVD How-To Video

- A through C, PLUS...

- A DVD How-To tutorial on advanced FX-quality zombie makeup.


F)  For $100:  In Game Perks!

- A through C, PLUS...

 

- Limited Edition – “genie steal back” – so 3 times you can get back your stuff in the game with no penalty – no matter how expensive they are (could be a car or a favorite house plant or a collectible or a beloved pet).

 

AND

 

- A Limited Edition, only available to our IndieGoGo backers - in-game trophy with “backer” written across it - you can place it in your virtual house and everyone who plays the game will know that you made it possible!



G)  For $300:  Custom T-Shirt!!!!

- A through C, PLUS...

- An awesome, high-quality designer T-shirt!  You get to pick the size, color, and cut from the options available to us (link coming soon - but check out the example below for now!) – shipping included if within the continental US, otherwise add up to $100 for international shipping





H)  For $500: Zombie Sounds (10 Total)

- A through C above, PLUS...

- You get to create sounds for the game - moaning of the zombies, satisfied burps/sighs for zombies having been fed, etc. - Must have access to a computer and willing to install recording software - if you don’t have recording software


I)  For $1000:  Custom Poster!

- A through C above, PLUS...

- Epically cool 24x36 in custom poster of YOU, a group of friends, you and your dog, or maybe your entire gang at work stylized into a zombie hunter poster - you provide the high-res digital photo of 300 dpi (basically you need access to a high end camera to take a photo of yourself or crew) and our artist will stylize it and put some custom fonts and phrases into the poster for something that is truly one-of-a-kind.  You’ll get to work with our artist over Google Hangout or Skype to perfect the poster.  Check out the example below! – shipping included if within the continental US, otherwise add up to  $100 for international shipping



J)  For $2000:  Design a weapon!

- A-C above, PLUS...

- You get to help the team design a weapon for the game - you’ll get to collaborate with our artist and developers to develop and name the weapon.  This is an opportunity to work with an incredible team of people and create something that’s truly unique and in line with the storyline!  It’s the perfect gift for a gamer who thinks he/she has everything.




K)  For $5000: EVERYTHING AND MORE!!!

- ALL OF THE ABOVE!!!!!!!

- Meet and greet with the team (you get yourself to Palo Alto, CA) - you’ll get to spend all-day with the team getting a crash course in what a start-up is all about.  We’ll also take you to lunch, you’ll get to demo a very early stage version of the game.


DISCLAIMER

We are in development and testing mode right now, and we can't guarantee the final look and dynamic of the game will remain exactly as it appears on the video. Nevertheless, we do promise our game will be loaded with fun zombie action and a strong environmental message!

Here’s the kicker: All the game items you will be using to improve and defend your house have real-world coupon counterparts, so you can use them to save massive bucks on that new lamp, water filter, fridge or washing machine purchase!
CROWDSOURCING ROCKS!!
Not only are we using the power of the crowd to raise seed money through IndieGoGo, but we’re also making crowdsourcing a key part of our game. We will accept art, items, and sounds directly from players, so you can add weapons, zombies, or whatever your heart desires to the game! Plus, there will be awesome cash prizes for the top rated user-submitted items!
OUR TEAM’S STORY:
Our team members have a diverse array of backgrounds - both from Venezuela and the US. We all have very different skills: great developers, incredble artists, passionate visionaries and more. But there's one we all have in common: Our commitment to help the world and make it a better place in a FUN way!
Our team members are:
Flavia Cassani, our CEO, is serial social entrepreneur, who was born in Caracas,Venezuela. Her experience with her previous companies and her passion to help the environment are fundamental qualities to lead this project.
For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/flavia?a=847751
Carlo Cassani is our lead artist. With over 10 years of experience in the game industry as a computer graphics genius, he has been producing very acclaimed pieces of art for games published by companies such as Disney and Namco. Now is his time to go Indie and turn that art into more than just another game. This time he wants to change the world.
For more:http://www.indiegogo.com/cass1210?a=847751
Joe Lang is one of our developers. He’s from NY, currently living in California, where his about to finish his studies on Computer Sciences, specializing on video games. Joe has proven to  be  very talented developer, possess infinite imagination and a genuine love for nature that are truly admirable.
For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/heyjoelang?a=916447
Charles Van Norman, a former 9-5 zombie turned world-hungry entrepreneur, is the producer and senior developer on the project, making sure the game looks, plays, and feels right. 
For more:http://www.indiegogo.com/Charles-Van-Norman?a=268686
Dr. Nadyne G. Edison, Chief Rainmaker and Partner, a serial entrepreneur from birth, holds a Ph.D in Mass Communication emphasizing the social effects of media from Michigan State University. Nadyne's diverse  career has included being Director of New Media Marketing at General Motors, launching globally all of GM's Internet sites crowned by the launch of gm.com  in 1996, as well as,  functioning in every executive level from CMO to CEO on seven start-ups in the States, Canada and the UK..  She brings enormous experience, start-up knowledge. relationships, and great humor!!
Eva Markiewicz is our current operations master and engineering creative. With a background on mechanical engineering, she’s the mastermind behind all real life functionality of the game and its accuracy on environmental content. 
For more: http://www.indiegogo.com/flavia?a=847751
Dave Arendash, our amazing Adviser, is a programming veteran and helps tutor our coding team on how exactly to make things work without too much pain.
For more:  http://www.indiegogo.com/DaveArendash?a=977655

WHY ARE WE IN AMERICA??
Chavez of Venezuela, A.K.A. Captain Killjoy, forced our heroic company to be established in the United States. You see, in Venezuela, video games, fun, and smiles are banned and punishable by stern looks, jail time, or death.  That’s why we now operate in the Land of the free and Home of the brave - where the pursuit of happiness is much more than a distant dream - it’s a right.

Chavez is a corrupt and violent dictator.  Besides handing out guns on the street to kids - he has ironically made violent video games illegal.  Sound too ridiculous to be true?  Check out this article:
http://www.globalpost.com/dispatch/venezuela/091120/violent-video-game-ban
 
WHO HELPED US WITH THE VIDEO:
MORF is a creative/video studio based in Venezuela and we have a very close partnership with their studio - in fact, we worked closely with them on the IndieGoGo video.  We plan to continue creating videos with them that capture the story behind the game.  We may even merge the studios in the next couple of years if the game really takes off!  Gerardo, Pericles, Alvaro, and Armando all appeared in the IndieGoGo video.  
 
WHY INDIEGOGO?
For the past nine months, we have been pouring our blood, sweat, and tears...along with our personal savings into the project because we believe in the vision.
For the past few months we’ve been hunting for funding and have approached numerous funds, VCs, and publishers and we keep getting the same story - “we love the game, but aren’t crazy about the environmental part of the business plan”.  Well - the problem is that we are crazy about the environmental part of the business plan - we’re crazy in love with it!  We have two core reasons for doing this: first, we want to make a super entertaining 3D game for everyone to enjoy; and second, we want to create a new way for people to help others live greener lives.  VCs and publishers haven’t seen the light yet - they can’t see how popular and awesome a game like this will be - so help us show them that people want a fun game that also helps save the planet.  And just to be clear - in case you are a VC - we have nothing against accepting capital from a VC - we just don’t want to compromise our vision.  So if you’re a VC that gets it - give us a call!
WHAT WE NEED?
We need $50,000 to finish our game.  We’ve been bootstrapping the game for the past nine months and we’re running out of our personal savings.  We will not spend a single dime we raise frivolously - we’re going to put the bulk of it towards sustaining our artists, developers, and game designers.  The rest will go towards caffeine and servers.
WHY YOU SHOULD BECOME A PART OF THIS:


First of all - we are offering some really awesome rewards - check out the full details below.

 


Second, with pollution, destruction of nature, and climate change wreaking havoc on the world - we need people to be more aware of the problems facing the environment and what they can do about them, but we need a FUN way to confront them. We can have fun and safe the world at the same time!

 


Third, in a world in crisis with a recession the likes no ones has ever seen before, entrepreneurs creating companies leads to more growth, more jobs, and a better life for everyone.

 


Fourth, it’s really obvious, but we’re including it anyway - you’ll have an awesome game to play!

 


Fifth, show the publishers and the rest of the world how the gaming community is not just a bunch of passive escapist kids, but a fully committed community of people who can save the world while having massive fun.

 


Sixth, show Chavez that he can’t stop a dream.
 

SHARE, LIKE US, FOLLOW US!!
 
Share Our Story:
http://www.indiegogo.com/kleptomaniaczombies
Like Us:
http://www.facebook.com/myneighborthezombie
 
Follow Us:
http://twitter.com/gamespecies
 
Our Blog/Website:
www.myneighborthezombie.com
 
THANK YOU!!!
Thank you so much for your support - you are the only reason we’re going to be able to move this forward without compromising our vision.


Description of Perks!!!!
We have a lot of exciting rewards - there is something for everyone!A) For $1:
- Your name on the honor role, plus a url to your personal website or company website onwww.myneighborthezombie.com
B) For $5:
- All of the above, PLUS...
- Desktop Wallpaper Background Pack, which will be delivered in digital form
C) For $25:  
-  All of the above, PLUS...
-  A set of paper zombies designed by our world-class artist Carlo Cassani.  We will send you the paper zombies in a .pdf for you to print out and assemble.  We will also record a how-to video and send you a link.  Check out how awesome these look - great gift for your kids or those of us who refuse to grow up!
- We’ll digitally send you a set of tattoos that you can print out on a laser printer by purchasing some special tattoo paper.  You’ll have to buy some special tattoo paper, but it’s cheap - $1 per sheet.  And you’ll need access to a laser printer - kinkos should be able to help.
D)  For $50: Bumper Sticker!!!
- A through C, PLUS...
- Your choice of 1 of several stickers (bumper sticker, oval-shaped sticker - great for your car or bike!)
E)  For $75: Zombie Makeup DVD How-To Video
- A through C, PLUS...
- A DVD How-To tutorial on advanced FX-quality zombie makeup.
F)  For $100:  In Game Perks!
- A through C, PLUS...
 
- Limited Edition – “genie steal back” – so 3 times you can get back your stuff in the game with no penalty – no matter how expensive they are (could be a car or a favorite house plant or a collectible or a beloved pet).
 
AND
 
- A Limited Edition, only available to our IndieGoGo backers - in-game trophy with “backer” written across it - you can place it in your virtual house and everyone who plays the game will know that you made it possible!
G)  For $300:  Custom T-Shirt!!!!
- A through C, PLUS...
- An awesome, high-quality designer T-shirt!  You get to pick the size, color, and cut from the options available to us (link coming soon - but check out the example below for now!) – shipping included if within the continental US, otherwise add up to $100 for international shipping
H)  For $500: Zombie Sounds (10 Total)
- A through C above, PLUS...
- You get to create sounds for the game - moaning of the zombies, satisfied burps/sighs for zombies having been fed, etc. - Must have access to a computer and willing to install recording software - if you don’t have recording software
I)  For $1000:  Custom Poster!
- A through C above, PLUS...
- Epically cool 24x36 in custom poster of YOU, a group of friends, you and your dog, or maybe your entire gang at work stylized into a zombie hunter poster - you provide the high-res digital photo of 300 dpi (basically you need access to a high end camera to take a photo of yourself or crew) and our artist will stylize it and put some custom fonts and phrases into the poster for something that is truly one-of-a-kind.  You’ll get to work with our artist over Google Hangout or Skype to perfect the poster.  Check out the example below! – shipping included if within the continental US, otherwise add up to  $100 for international shipping
J)  For $2000:  Design a weapon!
- A-C above, PLUS...
- You get to help the team design a weapon for the game - you’ll get to collaborate with our artist and developers to develop and name the weapon.  This is an opportunity to work with an incredible team of people and create something that’s truly unique and in line with the storyline!  It’s the perfect gift for a gamer who thinks he/she has everything.
K)  For $5000: EVERYTHING AND MORE!!!
- ALL OF THE ABOVE!!!!!!!
- Meet and greet with the team (you get yourself to Palo Alto, CA) - you’ll get to spend all-day with the team getting a crash course in what a start-up is all about.  We’ll also take you to lunch, you’ll get to demo a very early stage version of the game.

DISCLAIMER

We are in development and testing mode right now, and we can't guarantee the final look and dynamic of the game will remain exactly as it appears on the video. Nevertheless, we do promise our game will be loaded with fun zombie action and a strong environmental message!

story:
******************************MAY 2015 UPDATE*****************************

Hello everyone, 

I apologize for not updating the actual Indiegogo site.  I have been updating the Facebook page and completely forgot to update the Indiegogo page. 

As you know, we have had some trouble getting our decks out in a timely fashion. The reason behind that is because we had a huge printing problem with the company we were having our decks printed from.  To make a long story as short as possible...  After doing several test runs and being satisfied with the printing quality, we began the printing for the batches of all of the ordered decks.  Unfortunately, the printing quality on our final run was not acceptable at all.  

Because we did not meet our ultimate goal, the amount of fees that were taken out of the Campaign, no wiggle room for a mistake of this nature, as well as, not having any savings cushion for such a happening, we are now left to pick up the pieces and get the final batches ordered... slowly, but surely. 

Where we are now:  We are now staying committed to fulfilling all of the deck orders that were placed during the Indiegogo campaign.  However, because we are now having to put our own money into the fulfillment, it will be a slow process.  We are a small family business and have not had the opportunity to grow a cushion for instances such as these.  

We are now slowly getting decks out a few at a time.  We ask for your patience.  We are committed to fulfilling the orders for decks; however, there is only so much we can do at a time.  Creating our own game along with our first Indiegogo Campaign has turned out to be a huge learning process and a process that is going much slower than we ever anticipated.  

Thank you for your continued support!!  We again apologize for the delay and hope that you will understand the difficulties in growing a small family business without the capital for any hiccups.  We do hope to one day see our game in store counters.  Perhaps once the decks are out to you all, that can happen.  For now, we will focus on getting those decks out to you all.  Thank You!!  

*****************************************************************************


We are Matt and Kesha Hawk.  We began our company, The Hawks' Aerie, several years ago to combine and collaborate their multiple and diverse talents.  We strive to utilize our talents in ways that support and sustain our beautiful, zany, unique family while making an impact on people's lives.  It has always been important to The Hawk Family to bring our creativity and passion to the forefront with thoughtful care in how our pieces affect the clients that commission our work.   

Matt has been an illustrator for the past  14 plus years.  He has spent his art career working on video games, creating original artwork, and teaching children how to create their own pieces of original art.  Wanting to branch out, with the desire to create something unique and fun with original illustrations of his own, he has recently created an awesome new card game from his original illustrations.  

We have dabbled in lots of commissioned work across the country.  In most recent years, we have gained the support of our Eugene, Oregon community.  We are finally ready to present our first big campaign going out to the public from The Hawks' Aerie - Widdershins Card Game!!

This campaign of Widdershins Card Game is very important to The Hawk Family. We have put a lot of love, care, and passion into the creation of this game.  Our family loves working together and bringing what we love to those around us.  Now, it is time to do this on a bigger scale than we have ever done before.  To do this successfully, we need your help and support!


If you could be a part of the beginning of a card game aimed for any age that has the potential to expand into a World of Its Own, would you?  Do you want to be an integral part of the process of making Widdershins a household name?  

By contributing or simply sharing our campaign with others who can contribute, you will not only be helping an awesome card game garner success and availability to the masses, but will help us begin to delve even deeper into the backstory of all the characters - truly creating a World of Widdershins.

You will also be helping us get out to as many gaming conventions as possible. After all, it takes exposure to get a game truly out to the masses.  Exposure is done through conventions to get the game seen by business owners and customers alike. We want to see Widdershins in as many homes and game stores as possible across the country.  Will you help us achieve our goal?   


What is Widdershins?  What is this game all about, you ask? 

It is a 78-card deck.  The game is part strategy, part luck.  Good for ages 8 to 108. Below is a visual as to how the game plays.  

  

Here is a bit of the backstory, which will be a part of a future "History and Character Guide for the World of Widdershins"...   


Long ago before the time of man, the Fae ruled on Earth.  Their civilization was orderly and refined.  Using the powers of the four elements together, they created amazing works of art and expanded their evergrowing civilization.  Then, the Fae splintered into small warring factions across the World, and they have fought against each other for eons.  The curse can only be broken when the Fae learn to work together again and erase the curse of Murioche.  

Now, it is time for you to step sideways, from our World into the World of Widdershins to help bring this curse to an end.  Gather your armies and bring the Fae together again.  But beware - Murioche has tricks yet to play.  This is but the beginning of your adventure.  For now, you have to just get the Fae to work together again.  Wait until you see what happens when they find their powers again!! 

Remember, you are now in their  world where nothing is what it seems,

And sometimes, the best way to go is backwards!!


Our campaign is looking for at least $6,000 to get this game up and going to the masses.  These funds will pay for production and distribution costs to get the game to as many game business owners and customers as possible.  We want our name and our game out there!!  

With an additional $2,000, we will reach our First Stretch Goal of $8,000, which will allow us to get to as many conventions across the country as possible.  These could include the following conventions:  Emerald City ComicCon, San Diego ComicCon, Orycon, Steamposium, BayouCon, DragonCon, and more...  True exposure will happen at these conventions and help make Widdershins a household name!

Another $2,000 will bring us to our Second Stretch Goal of $10,000, allowing us to begin creation of the First Expansion Pack.  This will introduce a fifth element of Spirit, new characters, enhanced powers for character cards, more complex game play rules, and more!  It will also allow us to begin creation of "The History and Character Guide for the World of Widdershins," coloring book, travel game board, and the beginning of dabbling with the 3D character pieces for the game.  




1st Reward Tier:  $10 - With a contribution of $10, you will receive (1) signed print of Murioche.

2nd Reward Tier:  With a contribution of $30, you will receive the previous reward PLUS The Game!!



3rd Reward Tier:  With a contribution of $50, you will receive the previous rewards PLUS the following (4) signed prints of the #1 suit character cards from the game.

4th Reward Tier:  With a contribution of $75, you will receive all previous rewards PLUS a poster with all original 20 characters from the first run of the game.


5th Reward Tier:  With a contribution of $100, you will receive all previous rewards PLUS the vinyl 2 ft x 2 ft Travel Game Board that rolls up.

6th Reward Tier:  With a contribution of $500, you will receive all previous rewards PLUS a one-of-a-kind Character Card for your own personal deck designed by Matt Hawk.


Obviously, financial contribution will help us attain our goal.  However, we understand that some of you who have the desire to support us will not have the ability to support in a financial contribution.  No worries!!  You can STILL help in a huge, major way!!  

We need people to SHARE our Indiegogo link and SHARE our Facebook link.  We need people to get the word out to others that we do not know.  This is an important aspect of this campaign.  

We thank everyone who is able to make any type of contribution of our campaign, including the simple act of just SHARING!!   

For those who prefer to pay via Paypal, we are Paypal verified!

story:
About the Game
Survival Games is a multiplayer survival adventure set in an ever-changing world full of secrets, traps, wildlife and treasure. Pit yourself against up to 31 other players over LAN or ONLINE as you fight for your survival in order to be the last person standing! Never play the same game twice with our unique game world that dynamically changes with every new match you play! 

Powered by the Hazzah Engine, a powerful rendering and terrain engine built from the ground up to support the next generation of games, featuring real-time physics, per pixel collision, dynamic per bone animation and large scale multi player interactions in dynamic destructible environments. 

This is a standalone title written in C++ and DirectX 11 that we have been working on since 2010. As such our proprietary engine supports advanced graphical effects such as Depth of field, Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion and many other effects generally found in AAA games. 

We are a small and passionate team that is based in Melbourne Australia, we thank you for taking the time to check out Survival Games and we are eager to finally release on PC. 

Features
▶ Track your foes 
With our dynamic footprint and blood simulation engine you can track your enemies as well as beasts and creatures. 

▶ Traps and explosives 
Heaps of traps for you to lay for your enemies, bear traps, C4, land mines, pit traps and many more.


▶ Character customization! 
Create your own unique player with a number of clothing, race and gender options as well as cosmetic items and hats! 

▶ Explore a beautifully hand crafted yet ever-changing world! 
With over 20,000 different variations of the world you're guaranteed to never play the same game twice! 

▶ Hunt or be hunted! 
With persistent blood trails and footprints you can track down your prey or set ambushes with a number of deadly traps that keep you out of harms way. 

▶ Combat! 
With a diverse set of melee weapons, ranged weapons and armour sets you can choose the path of the warrior and take the fight straight to your enemies! 

▶ In-depth survival. 
Manage your health, stamina, hunger and tiredness in order to keep your character in tip-top shape or else you might just die of exhaustion!. 

▶ Supports 4k resolutions

▶ Gluten free!
▶ Will support English, French, German, Italian, Russian and Spanish. 

Minimum Specs: 
Operating System: Windows Vista®/Windows® 7/Windows® 8 
Processor: Any single core CPU 
Memory: 512MB RAM 
Video: Intel® HD Graphics/ NVIDIA® GeForce® 7200 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ X800 XT/ Any card supporting DirectX 9.0c or above. 
Storage: 1GB Available HDD space 
Resolution: 1024x768 

Recommended Specs: 
Operating System: Windows® 7/Windows® 8 
Processor: Any Dual Core CPU 
Memory: 2GB RAM 
Video: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ 5450/ Any card supporting DirectX 10.0 or above. 
Storage: 1GB Available HDD space 
Resolution: 1920x1080 


Join the Community at http://forums.2point0studios.com/ for news and updates!

Pit yourself against up to 31 other players over LAN or ONLINE as you fight for your survival in order to be the last person standing! Never play the same game twice with our unique game world that dynamically changes with every new match you play! Powered by the Hazzah Engine, a powerful rendering and terrain engine built from the ground up to support the next generation of games, featuring real-time physics, per pixel collision, dynamic per bone animation and large scale multi player interactions in dynamic destructible environments. This is a standalone title written in C++ and DirectX 11 that we have been working on since 2010. As such our proprietary engine supports advanced graphical effects such as Depth of field, Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion and many other effects generally found in AAA games. We are a small and passionate team that is based in Melbourne Australia, we thank you for taking the time to check out Survival Games and we are eager to finally release on PC. Features▶ Track your foes With our dynamic footprint and blood simulation engine you can track your enemies as well as beasts and creatures. ▶ Traps and explosives Heaps of traps for you to lay for your enemies, bear traps, C4, land mines, pit traps and many more.▶ Character customization! Create your own unique player with a number of clothing, race and gender options as well as cosmetic items and hats! ▶ Explore a beautifully hand crafted yet ever-changing world! With over 20,000 different variations of the world you're guaranteed to never play the same game twice! ▶ Hunt or be hunted! With persistent blood trails and footprints you can track down your prey or set ambushes with a number of deadly traps that keep you out of harms way. ▶ Combat! With a diverse set of melee weapons, ranged weapons and armour sets you can choose the path of the warrior and take the fight straight to your enemies! ▶ In-depth survival. Manage your health, stamina, hunger and tiredness in order to keep your character in tip-top shape or else you might just die of exhaustion!. ▶ Supports 4k resolutions▶ Gluten free!▶ Will support English, French, German, Italian, Russian and Spanish. Minimum Specs: Operating System: Windows Vista®/Windows® 7/Windows® 8 Processor: Any single core CPU Memory: 512MB RAM Video: Intel® HD Graphics/ NVIDIA® GeForce® 7200 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ X800 XT/ Any card supporting DirectX 9.0c or above. Storage: 1GB Available HDD space Resolution: 1024x768 Recommended Specs: Operating System: Windows® 7/Windows® 8 Processor: Any Dual Core CPU Memory: 2GB RAM Video: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ 5450/ Any card supporting DirectX 10.0 or above. Storage: 1GB Available HDD space Resolution: 1920x1080 
Join the Community at http://forums.2point0studios.com/ for news and updates!

story:
$50,000 is ambitious, but we can achieve something at several levels of funding:

Raise $20,000 and . . .
Weâ€™ll create â€œRaise the Villageâ€ for Facebook, and youâ€™ll get to play this revolutionary social game.

Raise $30,000 and . . .
Weâ€™ll accomplish the above and travel to Africa to revamp our infrastructure. This will allow quicker correspondence with the village and incredible interactivity for the player.

Raise $50,000 or more and . . .
We can take the gaming and giving experience to a new plane of existence. This means production value beyond anything youâ€™ve seen in the realm of social gaming or giving, including instantaneous communication with the village that lets players see the impact theyâ€™re making in real-time.
 

What is â€œRaise the Village?â€
â€œRaise the Villageâ€ is a game that lets you create a highly personalized virtual village while you simultaneously transform an actual village in Africa. Supporting this campaign will allow us to release this game on Facebook.

When you make purchases in the game, you arenâ€™t just changing the village you see on your computer screen, youâ€™re making a donation to the towns weâ€™re helping. Currently, weâ€™re focused on the Ugandan village of Kapir Atiira, and once itâ€™s a sustainable village, we will expand and begin helping other impoverished villages reach sustainability.

The game will be social in nature, allowing you to connect with all your friends whoâ€™re playing, but it will also challenge you to make the right choices for your village. Youâ€™ll progress through a heart-warming and compelling narrative where youâ€™ll make meaningful decisions about the progression of your village.

While you attempt to reach virtual sustainability within the game, you can also step through a portal and enter the world of Kapir Atiira. If you decide to explore the portal, you can absorb the culture and lifestyle of the village youâ€™re helping by reading blog posts, watching videos, and viewing pictures.

Obviously, you can give money to help Kapir Atiira, but you mean more to us than a few quick bucks: We want you to become part of the team! Through the portal, you can directly contribute your thoughts and ideas to specific projects happening in the village like building a water well, and youâ€™ll be updated in real time about their status. Send us feedback in the form of videos, comments or pictures, and you can easily become a part of the decision-making process.


Where can I play â€œRaise the Village?â€
â€œRaise the Villageâ€ is going to be a Facebook game; however, this isnâ€™t the first time itâ€™s left the starting gates. In fact, there is already a version of â€œRaise the Villageâ€ available for download on iTunes for play on iPhone, iPad and iPod. However, the version weâ€™re creating for Facebook is no simple port from one platform to the next.

â€œRaise the Villageâ€ is, essentially, being remade for Facebook. It will have a brand new art style, game mechanics and connectivity to Kapir Atiira. If you've played and enjoyed the old â€œRaise the Villageâ€ on iPhone, youâ€™ll be blown away with how much better the Facebook version is.

The initial release of the game was made by an outside development team very early in the existence of New Charity Era. Because of this, the final version wasnâ€™t entirely what we envisioned it to be, but it still contains the most basic concepts we want to incorporate into this fully fleshed out version of the game. Since the original release, the team at New Charity Era has grown to include our own developers and artists who can make the game we originally intended â€œRaise the Villageâ€ to be.

â€œRaise the Villageâ€ on iOS has given us the chance to learn more about the process of deliveries to the village and communication with both Kapir Atiira and our users. With this pertinent information, weâ€™re poised to make an incredibly immersive game for Facebook that also provides a never-before-seen level of interactivity with the village youâ€™re helping.


What has â€œRaise the Villageâ€ done so far?
In the short year that the old version of â€œRaise the Villageâ€ has been out on iOS it has allowed players to give enough to make four deliveries to the village a possibility. It was also featured twice by Apple in iTunes under "new and noteworthy" and "what we're playing," it was ranked sixth on the App Store over both "Angry Birds" and "Facebook," it was nominated for 2011's Best App Ever by 148Apps, and it's been downloaded over 300,000 times.

Weâ€™ve already created a new method of giving, and weâ€™ve seen that itâ€™s unequivocally more effective than the archaic operations of charities in years past. Weâ€™ve already brought charity into the 21st century, now itâ€™s time to bring it to the largest audience possible via Facebook.

The previous version of â€œRaise the Villageâ€ received accolades from: 


Who is behind â€œRaise the Villageâ€?
New Charity Era is the team behind â€œRaise the Village.â€  While the team is currently six guys with a vision, weâ€™re growing. Some of the team is in America, working on our game, while the remainder of the team is located in Kapir Atiira, on-site and ready to help.

Weâ€™ve also brought on the help of a top-notch developer, Puppy Punch Productions, to fine tune this release to perfection. With these resources, we think we can change the world -- no, scratch that -- we know we can change the world.

While the task of changing the world may sound grandiose, it can be accomplished one village at a time. With enough people behind the cause, sustainable villages all over the entire continent of Africa are a highly viable possibility. After that, we move on to the next continent, and we donâ€™t stop until the job is done.

This mentality is at the very core of our teamâ€™s mode of operation. We work tirelessly to make our vision a reality. There are no insurmountable obstacles. As of right now, no one on the team has seen a single dime from â€œRaise the Village.â€ We have all worked for free for the benefit of Kapir Atiira, every penny has gone into helping the village and operation costs.

But weâ€™ve all been rewarded with something better than money: the opportunity to make a meaningful impact in the lives of those who need it most. Weâ€™ve received so much from this venture, and we want to extend that opportunity to you as well.

Our definition of â€œteamâ€ isnâ€™t as stringent as other companies, because to us, if you support our cause, youâ€™re on the team! So jump on board and head down the road of change with us. First destination: Kapir Atiira.


What have have people been saying about â€œRaise the Village?â€
â€œâ€˜Raise the Villageâ€™ is an innovative platform that takes advantage of mobile apps to provide a service that can actually have a positive impact on the world. You can't say that about many other apps out there. This one's actually worth something.â€ 

-- Abhi Lokesh, CEO, Fracture


â€œThey don't just drop-ship a bag of rice, but instead they invest in farmers from the local village to plant, grow and harvest the native staple crops of millet and yams. It's not about giving â€˜hand-outsâ€™ itâ€™s about creating long-lasting, impactful investments in Ugandan communities.â€

-- Kristin Joos, Coordinator & Founder, Innovative Sustainability & Social Impact Initiative, Center for Entrepreneurship & Innovation,  Warrington College of Business, UF


â€œIâ€™m an entrepreneur myself, and so I know the hard work thatâ€™s required to do something like this, and [the people making â€˜Raise the Villageâ€™] just have it together. Theyâ€™re really determined, and I know they will achieve their vision.â€

-- Kristin Hadeed, Student Maid CEO and TEDx presenter

story:
My Story

Hi. My name is Bernie and I've been a gamer since the day I was born. :) But I only got into the hobby seriously when I opened my first Magic the Gathering booster in 1996. Ever since then, I've been into various collectible and non-collectible games - Mage Knight, LOTR CCG, VS CCG, and most recently, back into Magic again. I also collect and play board games, DnD and TONS of iOS games.Recently, I have also developed an iOS game - Grammar Police, a game which teaches the basics of grammar to children and 2nd Language learners.


The idea for this new game - PvP, came about as a way to meld all the good things I love about gaming - cards, dice, strategy and more importantly, having a game with friends.


In PvP, you choose a team of 3-4 combatants from a roster of up to 12 unique characters. Each character has special abilities that trigger when a specific dice combination is rolled. Each combat turn, 6 dice are rolled three times and the player can keep any number of dice between these rolls. (aka Yahtzee mechanics) After the final roll, the player allocates the dice to the cards. Watch the video for a sample of game turn!


Throw in faction abilities and additional factions/characters updates, the options for customization are near limitless!!


The game is already available as a free Print-n-Play format (download it at Boardgamegeek) and I really want to see it materialize in a digital form.

The Impact

Your contribution will go towards hiring an artist and designer for the card art (The current art is drawn by an internet artist - Peter Sekler (pseckler13@msn.com). Funding will also go towards hiring a developer to code and develop the game for an iOS format. 


Additional funding above the limit will go towards developing it for the Android platform.


If funding goal is not met, I will still go ahead with development. I really want to see this game come to life! However, I really need your help to do this! 


The game will come with 4 factions (3 characters per faction), with additional factions and characters available either as IAP or free updates. The game will be fully asynchronous multi-player-enabled (single player vs AI game dependent on funding)


Perks

While I don't have much to offer, my levels of "perks" are as follows

Challenger - Thank you warrior, for your kind contribution. In light of this, you will get a personal email from me commending your kind donation. Your name will also be engraved in the credits.

Duelist - Well fought champion! Your records will go down in history as a contributor by having your name engraved in the credits and a FULL printout of the Print-n-Play version.

Gladiator - Crowds cheers whenever you appear! You will be remembered forever by having your name in the credits, a FULL printout of the Print-n-Play version AND having a future character be named after you in an upcoming update

Praetor - Heralds trumpet your name! The arena trembles at the mention of your presence! Your name will be held onto the highest honour in the credits. You will receive a FULL printout of the Print-n-Play version. A future character will not only bear your name, but also an ability of your choosing! AND you will receive a free copy of the game and all future updates! (limit 40)

story:
Short Summary

You asked for it, so here it is! The Ultimate Gaming PC Project is officially live! Our aim is to build the Ultimate Gaming PC through the use of crowd funding. The entire process will be documented component by component on the Unbox Therapy YouTube channel. The project will conclude with the official build video & eventual giveaway of the Ultimate Gaming PC! 

What We Need

The goal is to raise at least $5000 (any less & it would be hard to call the system "The Ultimate Gaming PC"). If this campaign raises more than $5000, every last penny will be poured into the final build in the form of superior components and customizations!

The Impact

Let's make history! Together we can build the Ultimate Gaming PC & document the entire process. We'll also test it's capabilities on video, through the use of modern benchmark tools & the latest video games.

Only $5 bucks

For as little as $5 you can help this project move forward. It will provide you with hours of entertainment + you get the satisfaction of knowing that you're a part of it! Besides, the system will go back to the fans (I won't be keeping it once completed).

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Patrick Fricke, I am 29 and I am the Co-Founder of the Minglemind Ag, Berlin, Germany.

 3years ago, we founded our start-up with the goal to create the "Game of Life".

We were playing a board game that nite, when we realised that there is no actual game for the real world. We were searching the internet, the app- and google play store, but there was no game to be found.

But what is (the game of) life about? 

Your life is a sea of endless possibilities. As you grow and change, you have infinite paths to choose from and multiple roles to play. Only you can decide how to live your life.

Get to know the world around you by exploring every opportunity. The earth has 7 continents, 196 countries and more than 7 billion people. Where will you go? Who will you meet? How far will you venture out of your comfort zone?

With youdare, your life becomes limitless. Take on dares from the role of an engineer, artist, globetrotter, athlete or mingler and complete them in your real life.

Create you own dares and challenge yourself, your friends or even the world. Then upload your proof as a picture or video and inspire others to follow in your footsteps.


What We Need & What You Get

We just need you to go to www.youdare.com or directly in the app and /or google play store and download our app for free. We have an offer saying once we get 400000 downloads we will be funded to finish what is yet only at the very beginning of where we are heading to. If you want to fund us we do really appreciate,  

BUT:

WE DON'T ASK FOR YOUR FUNDING DIRECTLY.PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE APP. ITS FREE.AND SPREAD THE WORD. WHEN WE GET 400000 DOWNLOADS WE WILL BE FUNDED!!!

The Impact

The game of Life is about you and you only. What you consider a challenge for yourself and for which challenges you want to go,  is for you and you only to decide. We just want you, to ask yourself what you think your life should be about, and than inspire you to go for it. What greater impact on society can there be than that the single individual goes for his/hers/- own personal goals and dreams.

 Right. NONE.

Risks & Challenges

We already took a great financial risk and we are willing to go even further. If you download the app you will see where we are at right now, but you will also see what is still missing. To implement the necessary features (like a virtual Map, Messenger and so on) to compete with the "Big guys" we need serious funding. But we think its worth the try and the risk besides the fact that we already risked a lot.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can either donate (which we would appreciate) or even better go to www.youdare.com download the app like us on Facebook, tweet about youdare using #youdare and spread the word that the next big thing is just about to happen very soon. Life is what you make. Let's  go for it together.

Again:

WE DON'T ASK FOR YOUR FUNDING DIRECTLY.PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE APP. ITS FREE.AND SPREAD THE WORD. WHEN WE GET 400000 DOWNLOADS WE WILL BE FUNDED!!!

We have an offer saying once we get 400000 downloads we will be funded to finish what is yet only at the very beginning of where we are heading to. If you want to fund us we do really appreciate,  
BUT:
WE DON'T ASK FOR YOUR FUNDING DIRECTLY.PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE APP. ITS FREE.AND SPREAD THE WORD. WHEN WE GET 400000 DOWNLOADS WE WILL BE FUNDED!!!
    The Impact The game of Life is about you and you only. What you consider a challenge for yourself and for which challenges you want to go,  is for you and you only to decide. We just want you, to ask yourself what you think your life should be about, and than inspire you to go for it. What greater impact on society can there be than that the single individual goes for his/hers/- own personal goals and dreams.
 Right. NONE.
    Risks & Challenges We already took a great financial risk and we are willing to go even further. If you download the app you will see where we are at right now, but you will also see what is still missing. To implement the necessary features (like a virtual Map, Messenger and so on) to compete with the "Big guys" we need serious funding. But we think its worth the try and the risk besides the fact that we already risked a lot.
    Other Ways You Can Help You can either donate (which we would appreciate) or even better go to www.youdare.com download the app like us on Facebook, tweet about youdare using #youdare and spread the word that the next big thing is just about to happen very soon. Life is what you make. Let's  go for it together.
Again:
WE DON'T ASK FOR YOUR FUNDING DIRECTLY.PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE APP. ITS FREE.AND SPREAD THE WORD. WHEN WE GET 400000 DOWNLOADS WE WILL BE FUNDED!!!

story:
Hi I'm Álvaro Benavides, a blogger from Venezuela, I'm also known by the IGN: Oriceles.

A computer with modern specs would make my dreams come true, help me to return to the Video Edition business, make my life easier, and allow me to Stream and record videos for YouTube.

My country is on a really bad situation, I have 3 jobs but I barely can buy food, feel free to search on Google for Venezuelan situation with socialism and being a colony of Cuba. We are even worse than Africa.

• Which are the 15 most miserable countries in the world? - The Telegraph
• Venezuela should be rich, but its government has destroyed its economy - The Washington Post
• In Venezuela, The Financial Crisis Means Banknotes Are Cheaper Than Napkins - Buzzfeed

I can't run away from my country until I finish my university studies. I'm trying hard on that.

Since I can't go out and live freely because of crime and lack of transportation methods, I spend my free time as a forum moderator at treeofsaviorgame.com and playing a lot of games with the members of that community, they are the ones that convinced me to start this campaign.

If I manage to meet the goal of this campaign I would use it to import a decent computer from ibuypower.com, (import fees covered by the goal) If I rise less than that I would use the money to buy over priced old parts and increase my current computer power.

My current hardware is the one shown in the picture, which consist of:

• Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 @ 2.40GHz (800 Bus)
• Motherboard: AsRock G41M-VS3 R 2.0 (Socket 775)
• RAM: Kingston KVR1333 DDR3 4GB - Single Channel
• Graphics: Built-in GPU Intel G41 Chipset (this is able to play Blade and Soul on the lowest setting at 15 fps)
• Hard Drive: 160 GB Maxtor DiamondMax 20 (I have to choose carefully on what to store and as we speak I only have 50GB free)

Probably your smartphone has more powerful CPU than this PC. This is what I was able to buy back in 2009, and right now a computer like this costs 120.000 Bs., I earn around 40.000 Bs at month and spend around 5.000 Bs on food every week, a 2015 computer costs 539.000 Bs. on Mercado Libre which is the Latino America version of Ebay.

story:
Look and Point Measurements

Using the latest augmented reality technology, a new app will let users measure objects just by 'selecting' them with glasses!  What is augmented reality?  It is a digitally enhanced view of the real world, in this case, done with glasses.  Other companies are developing this hardware technology to be released in the next few months.  We'd like to follow up with the software technology to make it shine.  This measurement application will streamline daily activity for quality control inspectors, home improvement contractors, architects, and any other who does measurements on a daily basis.

What We Need

We have some tools and talents now, but will use your support for:

  • Augmented reality glasses and development kit (prefer Atheer labs)
  • Unity3D export licenses
  • Marketing

Will This Change the World?

Yes!  Well, a little at a time works too, right?  This application will have many uses that serve a higher purpose.  

Is This Possible?

Certainly!  The heavy lifting is in the hardware that is developing as you read this.  But the software applications need to be there as well.  That is where we come in.  We have over 15 years of experience writing software for many different purposes and can make this application a success.

 - Patent Pending -

story:
Live Twitter Mention During The Competition:




Who Should I Start?

Fantasy football players are DESPERATE to get this question answered accurately each week.  

Go on Twitter during a football game week and see the mass of tweets requesting "Pick 1 of these 2 QBs" or WRs, FLEX, etc.  

Many of the paid experts just don't have the time or interest to answer tweets so who can you truly trust?  Some random guy who answers your tweets?  Not quite.  In fact, who is really accurate in their fantasy advice?  Where's the PROOF?

                 


Rotochatter.com takes care of this by tracking the accuracy of our users in their lineup decisions and promoting interaction with these users and those seeking lineup help. How you ask? Simple.

Contest Setup

We run a weekly fantasy picks contest grouping 4 similarly valued players (ie. Manning|Stafford|Newton|Brady) and ask the question: "Who will score the most fantasy points" in that group using a preset PPR scoring system.  

 We do this for all positions (QB, RB, WR, TE, FLEX, D) and track each user's accuracy not only overall but also within each position group.  

One user might not be great overall but have very high accuracy picking the FLEX group so why not pick his/her brain if you have a tough FLEX decision?  No-brainer!        

When you Follow any Rotochatter user on Twitter, our system recognizes this via Twitter's API and you gain Bonus Access to their Current Week's Locked Picks (contest locks 1-2 hours prior to 1 PM Sunday Games).  This is HUGE for daily/weekly players for difficult last minute decisions. 

Win/Win For All Users

Not only does Rotochatter help the average fantasy player seeking lineup advice but also gives the fantasy player seeking to be a 'guru' the platform to prove themselves accurate.  Want to start a fantasy blog or grow your Twitter following for fantasy purposes and just need proof of your expertise?  Start here.


Does the Fantasy Community Agree?

2013 was our first year and was driven to prove the concept and get our feet wet.  Our initial users loved the site and what we offered.  We were so confident others would love it too that we took our concept to the Fantasy Sports Trade Association (FSTA) Conference in Las Vegas in January and competed in their Elevator Pitch Competition.  The competition featured 15 up and coming fantasy businesses and Rotochatter Finished in 2nd place!  The concept has been validated.


How Can You Win $1,000,000?

One thing we learned from 2013 was that our setup was difficult.  So much so that we have brought in the Industry Leader in Large Scale Contests, SCA Promotions (Yes, those Big Check Holding Guys for Basketball Half-court Shots), to offer any Rotochatter user who gets 28/28 picks correct in any single week $1,000,000 cash.  

                         


That's it.  Nail the picks and you're a millionaire from using your fantasy knowledge.  SCA Promotions has you covered!

Who wouldn't want a shot at a million dollars for simply making fantasy football picks?  Sure the chances are against you but no worries about beating out millions of other players in some daily fantasy setup or putting up $1,000 for a chance.  Just you, your brain and crossed fingers and 17 weeks to give it a go.  

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What Will We Do With the Funding?

  • Mobile App - For 2013 we built a desktop only platform that was also mobile compatible which worked well however requires some updates to meet all of our 2014 goals.  A fully functioning mobile app will be necessary to reach all of the fantasy players we are targeting on all devices.  
  • Outreach - We need to get Rotochatter in front of every pair of fantasy players' eyeballs and have them join in on the fun.  The more users we have the greater the pool of great fantasy minds to interact with.
  • Features - Our advanced stat features we have planned for 2014 will be a game changer for fantasy players.  Adding the 'social data' element of our contest to compare to the Experts picks will help you make better decisions.


Any Potential (Clint) Hurdles?

Because we do not currently have all of the features w/i the Pledge levels active right now, we will require some time to bring these together and get ready for the 2014 Football season once our project is funded.  This is why we are starting this project now so early we are giving ourselves plenty of time to complete our 2014 version for you.

Seeing this is the first contest of its kind and the fact that we are offering $1,000,000 for a perfect week of picks, we are expecting a barrage of fantasy players to give it a try. While this is our goal, the sheer amount of new users will certainly be a major challenge for our team and we're ready for it.

We will be taking input from our current users to create the ultimate user experience on all of our platforms for 2014.



          
        
 
   
              

    


   

                                      

 


** LEGAL NOTE:  RESIDENTS OF IOWA, LOUISIANA, ARIZONA, MONTANA, PUERTO RICO, VERMONT, QUEBEC AND WHERE OTHERWISE PROHIBITED  WILL NOT BE ELIGIBLE TO WIN ANY CASH PRIZES DUE TO STATE RESTRICTIONS ON FANTASY RELATED CONTESTS OR LEAGUES. 
EVEN THOUGH USERS FROM THESE REGIONS WILL NOT BE ELIGIBLE FOR ANY CASH PRIZES, WE STILL APPRECIATE ANY PLEDGE YOU CAN PROVIDE AND WE WILL BE SURE TO GIVE YOU GREAT VALUE ON ROTOCHATTER.COM!



Please Use the Twitter Link Below to Pass Us Along...

story:
Playing a Goblin Team is having fun. They are despicable, cheater and stunty so everything can happen on a game with Goblins. And you know it, even your opponent knows it. If YOU want to have fun with them, we want to bring you the best sculpted miniatures for a goblin team ever.

ABOUT US

Willy-Miniatures is a small company producing high quality miniatures for fantasy football and other miniature games. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams.
You can see our full catalogue and contact us here
http://willy-miniatures.blogspot.com.es/
We count with Poncho to create this Amazing Goblin team. Poncho is one of the best sculptors on  Fantasy Football scene, he has sculpt  many FF teams every of them with a great quality.

WHY CROWDFUNDING ... AGAIN ? And AGAIN?

We had an amazing experience with our late campaigns, shorten the time to cast former team in a incredible way. In addition, all our former campaigns founders are 100% satisfied with our service due to the fact that we care about communication with our customers, quick shipping, quality of our miniatures and best price possible. We still need you to rise funds, that helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures, obtain feedback from you and it gives us confidence to keep working on. You are essential, YOU make this team a reality.

Da Goblins an' Da Big'Uns - Da TEAM

Miniatures will be casted in white metal.

How do i can support this campaign?



Stretch Goals


Hungry Troll "Saturno", Exclusive Indiegogo Miniature for our Funders.


Referee Goblin Added to the Staff Perk


Wizard Goblin and BunnyGobbo Added to the Staff Perk


CrowGobbo Added to the Staff Perk

BearGobbo Added to the Staff Perk


Willy-coins (The more support, the more freebies)



Da Goblinguild approves this campaign ¡
you can see more goblin miniatures from the same sculptor on
https://www.facebook.com/Goblinguild
Complete your team¡

story:
It is time, Heroes. Beautiful Disaster Games is proud to present the effect of nearly 16 months of evil machinations, mild headaches and shedding hardcore tears of joy. The result is this evil game of adventure, cooperation and highly tactical battles. An epic game of infinite possibilities.


It is a cooperative game of medium weight, for 2 to 4 players.
It plays in about 2 to 3 hours. It can be played solo.

You will generate a hero from two cards, creating adventurer like Sadistic Paladin, Stinky Rogue or Epileptic Mage. Gain your basic ability cards assigned to the class and an unique ability attached to the trait card. Grab your set of game components and you are ready for an adventure!



Face the challenges of the adventure mode. Form a 9 card adventure deck from over 16 area cards. Complete quests, face various events and explore dangerous areas. Execute your plans, while making your way to the Doomrock mountain, where the final battle awaits.

Travel the land in search for glory and silver. Visit shops, trainers and set up camps to recover and level up. Gain as much power as you can, before the next battle starts. Glorious treasure awaits! Improve your hero by equipping items and spend silver to gain new skills and extra dice.


Hungry for more power? It is time to level up. With over 23 starting ability cards no game will start the same. Furthermore an all unique 48 card level up deck will ensure that every hero develops differently. During level up, draw 3 cards and keep one. Look for combos and synergies between your party members as you level up your character in surprising ways. In Assault on Doomrock a warrior may suddenly start shooting fireballs. A mage may instantly turn into a death dealing machine, wielding two handed axe while shooting rays of doom from his eyes. Anything that works!

Geared up? Well, ready or not, it is time for a battle. In order to win the game, each party must emerge victorious from 3 increasingly difficult encounters.
For each battle, an enemy card will be drawn from 9 possible encounters.
This card instructs the players on enemy setup, enemy properties, abilities, victory conditions and points out which artificial intelligence deck to use.


The battles play out in an abstract environment, where characters may be either adjacent or distant from each other. The tactical nature of the game is reinforced by battle conditions such as 'engaged', 'surrounded' and some status markers like 'shielding' or 'exposed'.


At the start of a battle round, players will roll and re-roll dice, in order to place them on their ability cards with matching die results.
This is a planning phase, where party tactics are discussed.


After party is done with planning enemies will perform their actions, following the instructions on the artificial intelligence cards drawn by each player.

And of course some time during the round, dice may be spent from abilities, to perform actions in game - moving, attacking, healing, shooting, supporting, etc. There is a broad spectrum of abilities and some of them work together in unexpected ways. There are abilities that provide passive abilities as well as initiative enabled abilities - these may be used before enemy has a chance to act.

Can you plan the round properly, relying on your various hero abilities and supporting equipment? You will need to anticipate the events, take risks and hope for your fellow heroes support if you want to survive the battles. The enemies will often perform surprising actions, creating fresh situations on every play through. The various aspects of the battles ensure delivering a simple to grasp, yet deep experience.

This description touches lightly on how the game is like.
Please take your time and watch the introductory play though videos, where setup, adventure mode and battles are explained in greater detail:
Video 1 - Introduction and setup
Video 2 - Adventures on the map
Video 3 - The battle


Cardboard tokens:
6x large hero tokens
39x large enemy tokens
111x smaller tokens representing various assets and events in the game.

Large cards:
17x map area cards
6x setting cards
6x hero cards
6x hero trait cards
9x encounter cards

Small cards:
24x starting ability cards
48x unique ability cards (for level ups)
32x card common item deck
30x card epic item deck
20x wilderness event cards
20x mountain event cards
72x encounter AI cards
10x epic challenge cards

24 page rulebook.
25x 6 sided dice (12 mm)
The box dimensions are 270x187x66 mm

Over 300 cards and more than 150 tokens!
It is a big game!

All the components will meet the highest industry standards.
The final component count may vary slightly.

The game is nearly finished. All we need now is your support in order to produce and deliver it. Estimated delivery time is early November 2014, with a possibility to pick the game up sooner at our booth at Essen Spiel 2014.

As a thanks to the supporters, all perks are rewarded with a name or nickname mentioned on the specially designed sides of the box, found on the lower part of the box (visible once the lid is taken off).

In other words, supporters shall be forever cursed, their names engraved upon this Wall of the Dooomed (in random order). : )

Additionally, supporters who pre-ordered the game will receive some promotional cards:
1 extra trait card with a matching ability card.
2 extra common item cards
2 extra epic item cards

If the funding goal is met, then some additional stretch goals and rewards may be added throughout the campaign.

Beautiful Disaster Games is a one person company, placed in Poland. The owner - Tomasz Stasiak is the designer of the game and a graphic designer by profession. Huge gaming enthusiast, fan of both board games and computer games. This project is a labor of love by Tom, supported by a couple of young, talented illustrators and friends.

A kind request to all the contributors and those who do not want to contribute, but acknowledge this project's value. Please share this campaign on social media. It is a huge help by itself. Thank you!

Free print to play game mode with achievement progression and rewards.

More information on BGG thread:
http://boardgamegeek.com/article/16169022#16169022

Upgrade from 270x187x66 mm (Race for the Galaxy size) to a more appropriate 315x225x70 (Agricola size box).

Adds 2 interesting setting cards to a total of 8 cards.


Major card quality upgrade.
Adds another 2 setting cards to a total of 10.
